title: Excellent place
review: A nice and peaceful hangout place. A very old and well maintained garden.You can see mountain peak from telescope here. Also, you can enjoy boating, can have maggie and local foods

title: Dil garden ho Gaya
review: The beautiful place and impersive environment different varieties of trees and plants it's good for picnic

title: Spend couple of hours amidst nature
review: Plan for couple of hours to spend here

title: Please avoid
review: Please avoid unless you dont have anything else to do. For a fee of Rs 50 per person, the place is absolutely useless. It is a small nursery more than anything else with few games/rides for children. Boating area is a joke. There ia sad wax museum with an additional fee.

title: Gets You back in 90's movie location
review: Excellent ...Flowers all over there perfectly arranged in garden &  give you the feeling like  80's & 90's movie's song location. You can also visit wax museum here, little lake with paddle boats, restaurant. All makes here come Worthy.

title: Fun time
review: This place has good scenic view and has lots of potential to develop to a better tourist place. Also maintenance of garden area is not impressive. Overall average rating.

title: good place
review: Though off season, well maintained. Many eatery outlets around which can be given a try. Very minimal entry fee.

title: Beautiful
review: Very beautiful and full of colorful flowers. There are various varieties of flowers and plants. Many got spots for clicking pictures.

title: Good place
review: Have visited this place with three families and young children's during Snow fall this year

title: Small garden
review: Entry fee for the garden is 25/- per person.  Its a small garden surrounded by shops inclunding haunted house,  wax museum,  eatery,  gift items.  It also has a small fall and a really small lake for boating.  The garden is well maintained and has beautiful variety of (in pot)  flowers however the park is too small. The place also has gaming activities for kids and a food court for kids however there is not much to do for adults.

title: Nice to visit though its man made
review: We made a visit after coming to know from hoteliers...nice place though  man made garden with joyride a small falls...lot of photographers push to take some snaps..some crazy people n couples..though not pristine still not to miss the flavour

title: Just a Garden
review: One can go just to time pass as this is not a must visit place. Same like every garden you will find trees, swings, some food joints etc. No specially maintained flowers or major attraction.

title: lovely area to relax
review: the visit to company garden is real worthy and there are foods also available. wellmaintained. viewing lots of types of flowers and plants gives good happiness.

title: Beautiful garden.. with activities for children,
review: The place had lots of activities for children like swings and boating. There is a food court inside that offers reasonably priced, delicious snacks.

title: Time killer place
review: Company Garden - Company Bagh is a garden located 3 kms from Mussoorie towards Kempty falls. This is a garden outside the city for relaxed time for family. It has got couple of glass houses, a small pond like structure for boating, an artificial falls and flowers. This was lesser than average place and we moved out fast. One thing was that we saw some ice - late night snow in here in the garden. It has an entry fee of Rs.25 per person.

title: VISIT TO COMPANY GARDEN
review: One must go there to see and feel beauty of flowers blooming to give it a new name 'flower garden'. couples can romance there.

title: Not wel maintained!
review: Good location but markets and other attraction in th garden making it inferior. Too noisy! Some plantations are good

title: Small beautiful garden ....well maintained..
review: If you love to visit a well maintained garden than company garden is the best place in mussoorie. Boating , flowers , artificial waterfall , and full of natural views.

title: Nice place
review: Really beautiful place to visit ...it was neat and clean ..awesome feel of nature ...loved it enjoyed the moment

title: Must see location in mussoorie
review: Company Garden was the first place we visited in our trip to Mussoorie. I was very well maintained and nice for all age groups

title: Must visit
review: Awesome garden... With some small water falls... I think they are not real... But you will get some good pictures for sure

title: Mussorie trip
review: Horrible place this. Don't even bother visiting. Nothing in there. Need to get past the word limit. Nothing really to describe this let down of a place.

title: Regular garden
review: It's just regular garden.only difference is that it's situated at height. The small stall outside serve good parathas in morning.

title: Ok ok
review: Had heard alot aout the garden and was very keen on visiting it. But after going there I felt it is very much hyped. It is lyk other normal gardens. Its just that thre is a waterfall and small manmade boating area. And there are few games for kids which are all payable.

title: Parking is a big issue
review: If you are driving your own vehicle please avoid this place as parking is a big issue here. Plus not much to explore unless you have small kids as it has some rides and all for kids.

title: good place to spend time but dont fall for DSLR pics
review: One can spend around 2-3 hours at this place. the place is just beautiful with options of boating (but lake is quite small and dirty). there is one man made water fall for clicking pics (dont fall for DSLR people moving there, they are the cheaters).

title: Great place to visit with kids
review: Great place for kids to enjoy various activities. However, the boating ride is very small and nt worth it!

title: Just another garden
review: Its just like any garden in all cities. If short of time you can avoid it nothing much to miss. Of course the variety of flowers do differ.

title: Good place
review: This place has very nice, surrounded by pure natural environment. It has good parking and eating places also

title: good place, nice entertainment and eating joints
review: its lovely garden not so large but big enough to roam around, do boating and take pictures and have hot coffee watching clouds passing in valley with chilly winds.

title: Average
review: if you have absolutely nothing to do in Mussoorie, then you can think of a visit to Company Garden. as the name suggests, its just a garden that too not a great one......

title: A fairly well kept garden
review: We loved this place as it has lot many scenic picturesque places. Garden, mini artificial waterfall, some rides, food stall and everything was relatively well kept.

title: Nothing great
review: Just avoid that stupid Haunted House inside.. haha! embarassing to even admit that we actually  bought tickets and visited it.. was just plain lame!

title: Its Just a Gardeb
review: Its is a Garden with few activity for Kids such Hunting house, some restaurant, boat in very small Artificial lake.

title: My Mussoorie memories
review: Though a Municipal park, it is well maintained with lot of variety of trees and plants. Can spend good time and have an album to preserve.

title: Nice place for kids but some thing is missing
review: We visited recently wherein we had three kids of the age range 3 to 6

title: A Normal Park which will make you to collect memories
review: If you have taken your kids do visit this place ,2-3 hrs here would be fine. You would get all the eatables inside and also you have a Wax museum which is not that much famous, Just for time pass

title: Nothing special
review: You can definitely skip this place. nothing much to offer. Still of you want to visit, can take a rickshaw from library chowk.

title: Just walk
review: I would recommend people to walk all the way from their resort in mussorie to company garden. It is only 2.5 km from library or gandhi chowk. You can spend close to 3 hours here.

title: Dr Paramjit
review: Nicely and beautifully maintained garden in Mussoorie good and clean wax mueseum.there are eating joints but could not find place littered

title: super
review: Nice view of garden.Driving there is bit difficult but you can forget the tiredness once you reach there.Food is concern there especially south India is too costly in any of the hotels or any tiffin centers there.Better to tavele with some snacks.But you can enjoy local food.Muncipal park and kempty water falls are most visited places in Mussoorie.

title: most beautiful garden of mussooorie
review: Company garden is a place for families that have children and ladies. Boys and men would not like such place much because of the surroundings but then there are many males also who like to go to such calm and peaceful places. So company garden is one such place to enjoy the flowers and greenery. It is 4-5 kms away from main city so we need a taxi or own vehicle to visit this garden. It offers the best roses and other flowers to tourist and they can have some lovely pictures.. There are food shops and other shops too for buying stuff for the dear ones.. There are swings and boat riding for children so everyone can enjoy the place and make some great memories..

title: Ideally located
review: Company garden is very close and convenient to market. Ideal for kids family and couples. Nice, green, water bodies make you feel close to nature.

title: beautiful clean garden
review: Company garden is location at around 3-4 km from the library chowk end of mall road, Very neat and clean and well maintained garden.

title: Good. Better than Average. Less than very Good. But *avoid* K Dev Bhoomi Wax museum
review: This was a nice place with lots of flowers, if you're interested in them. There's a restaurant inside. And a bouncy ride for the kids. A few other shops for gaming experiences and a haunted house, that I skipped. Entry fee to the place was Rs. 25/- per person.

title: 11DMovie
review: Wooooooowwww 11 d movie. Varieties of flowers, water fall, Scary house, lots of fun... But need more washroom at that place. Rest very good.....

title: Peaceful and Beautiful
review: It is one of the peaceful location in Mussoorie. There are so many amenities are there like,

title: Best place
review: It is one of best place to visit..if your flower loving then please visit you will love the beauty and please yourself in heaven

title: For nature lovers
review: More of a nursery. Should visit during summer or season as some flowers are seasonal. Overall, can spend a couple of hours in this place. There is a small man-made waterfall and a small lake (not maintained well). A few good views of Mussoorie. The best attraction is a variety of flowers and a few trees. Entry fee of about 25 Rs and parking fee of 40 Rs

title: Absolutely good
review: It's quite well maintained. Enough guards inside to ensure that it remains that way. You would have loads of picture opportunity with vivid background. With nominal entry fee of 20 bucks it's worth a visit.

title: Beautiful Garden
review: Company garden have natural beauty, very well maintained. Nice for clicking pictures. Beautiful water fall

title: Visit  to  Company Garden. Mussoorie.
review: It is  quite far from  the  mall road but is beautiful  however very small. Flower beds are good. Rides are average. Cafeteria  is good.wax museum is a disaster.  Overall an average  experience.

title: Floral tribute
review: The garden is small and has variety of flowers though not many but does sooth the eyes with wild roses,and well maintained flower beds

title: My recent visit here
review: We visited this garden while our stay in Mussoorie. This is an average garden. Movie theater is also there inside the park. One wax museum is also there here.

title: Fantastic flora
review: Just like all other places in mussorrie, this place has also been commercialized. However,  the natural flora is a treat to the eyes especially the begonia plants and glasshousev at the end of the park.

title: Beautiful garden
review: Nice one but very cold during winters....food court and the museum is a must..View from here is spectacular....boat ride was ok ok...

title: destination for name sake
review: Boating is done in a pond which is no bigger than a swimming pool and wax museum is a tiny hole. Apart from that the garden and food court are decent.

title: Beautiful park
review: This is very beautiful Garden. This place is approx. 4km from Mall road. There is Wax museum, Fountain and restaurant inside the garden.

title: Neat Garden!
review: a neat place just alongside the Vermont Estate where we stayed.. kids enjoyed the few rides there and the weather

title: A must visit for tourists of Mussorie
review: Company Garden is about 3 km from Mussoorie Mall Road and a must visit for tourists of Mussorie.  There is small lake with the facility of paddled boating and a small water fall. There are few gardens with wonderful flowers which are excellent for photo shoot Also there is a good food court and adjacent wax museum in the garden. Lifelike statues of great personalities like Mahatma Gandhi, Einstein, Jawaharlal Nehru, Mother Teresa, Michael Jackson, Princess Diana and Barack Obama are displayed. Only bad thing is traffic jam we faced while reaching this garden.

title: Great garden
review: It's a nice garden on the way to Campty Falls so near to Mall Road that one can go there by a rickshaw too

title: Excellent Place to visit
review: Excellent Place to visit, You can have food drink and small rides there....

title: A nice garden up in the hills
review: This is a good family place, it is a garden and park that is very well maintained. They have a small waterfall and a variety of flowers.

title: Just keeps getting better
review: This is a must visit place simply because of the way it is maintained even after so many years of inception. For reaching Company Garden, either you can take a rickshaw or in case if you are 4 members or more then take a cab (negotiate with the cab driver rather than booking from Taxi stand directly). Has sufficient things for all age groups, food courts, games, boating, calmness.

title: Place was good for relax
review: It is good place and too many types of flowers. Plants and trees are available.

title: beautiful flowers
review: should go in case you want to be photographed amongst flowers. lots of games for children like boating, and swing rides.

title: Fun filled for Kids
review: Traffic Jam is a Problem at its entrance. Prefer a Rickshaw to come here. Do get your modelling pics with beautiful background from a candid photographer. Kids too enjoy boating and joy rides. Beautiful place it is actually.

title: very nice place
review: It is nice place to hangout with family, gardens, flowers, meals, 11D cinema experience, small lake and Joy rides.. all on single place.

title: Include this as last point in your itinerary
review: It is pity that people come to Mussoorie all the way from towns having desert, rivers, oceans but not mountains and valleys and then waste their time in an enclosed garden which can be found in any of the town. This garden offers no great views of Mountains and valley but has  few third class recreational facilities, a cheap wax museum with costly entry ticket and a few eateries including one central one. Someone who is on a short visit can skip this but may be if you are with kids you will be advised to visit here.

title: Good Maintained Garden
review: Beautiful place to hangout with family. It having Gardens, flowers, meals, small lake and joy rides. Museum inside the garden. Traffic jam is problem at its entrance. Garden is well maintened. It looking nice like Pictures.

title: Garden with colorful flowers
review: Normal garden with colorful flowers. Lots of activity and rides for Kids. Very crowded place in peak season (May to June)

title: Beautiful garden
review: The garden has beautiful flowers and is well maintained. However there's nothing much to do here except click pics. There are some fun activities like a horror house and boat ride but we didn't think it was worth to visit. Go here if you love flowers and nature!

title: Flowers!!! Neatly Maintained
review: Just a Nursery Kinda garden with a wide variety of flowers and Plants an Artificial Water fall inside , lot of people forcing to take Photos!!! Has a few Green Houses which were closed , has a Maruti 800 car which is used as a Potvwith flowers growing in the bonnet and dickie n roof , a few kiddy rides and a Wax Museum which we didn't bother to enter , has a food court which sells different variety of food items etc and a few stalls inside selling toys , gits , show pieces etc etc...

title: beautiful garden
review: Its 3 km from mall road... one can walk, drive or take rickshaw. The entry fee @ Rs. 25 per person. It has beautiful flowers, kids rides @ Rs. 20 per ride, boating and water fall. Few average food points.  Wax museum @ Rs. 100 is waste of money and time.

title: company garden a place to visit after a hectic morning
review: After having visited kempty falls and other site seeing , a nice break was the need of the hour.We landed in company garden which has a good restaurant .The food was delicious  partly because we were really hungry.  There is a wax musuem which has statutes of famous personalities. The entrance fee was costly but nevertheless a place once to be seen.By the way got admonished for touching the charlie chaplin wax statue.With the abnormal heat in mussorie two scoops of icecream there was divine.

title: Not too sure why it is still called a garden.
review: Too much of many things. Not too sure why it is still called a Garden. They have a small water fall, a small man made lake for pedal boats, a small wax museum, a small joy ride etc etc.

title: Nice
review: It is a nice garden and well mantained.one time visit.dont miss the boating experience within the hills.

title: Sameeksha By Sachin - Beautiful Garden with Multiple Activities
review: It is a well maintained beautiful garden with a flower garden within it's campus. There are different varieties of beautiful flowers. There is an artificial but very beautiful water fall, a small artificial lake for boating, different rides for children and adults, a horror show studio, food stalls etc. It seems to be a complete picnic destination in itself. Must visit place, highly recommended.

title: Walk in lap of nature.
review: Certainly one of the best place to visit in Mussoorie. Full of green surrounding. Beautiful flowers. Superbly maintained. Simply u can't miss it when you are in Mussoorie.

title: Company Bagh
review: Company garden is a beautiful place to visit. It is about 3/4 KM from Library chowk. I would rather suggest if you are young and energetic go walking and enjoy the walk. You will enjoy the walk and beauty. Excellent greenery and cool weather. Its good place to visit and you can spend at least couple of hours there . There are rides for children like giant wheel etc. Than there is a small lake with boats . So you can enjoy boating also. There are few cafe's also where you can get refreshment also. Good scenic beauty and nice place to have some photos.

title: Company garden
review: Its a rip off both for time and money, as it is meant to be a check the box for people looking for a typical hillstation family holiday. The garden is used as a prop for photos, yes, you cant enter the gardens as the tourists would destroy it. The place caters to tourists who have children interested in dummy rides and boating in a pond which appeared manmade. This used to be a fantastic place to spend time many  years ago. Now its avoidable unless you like to sit in traffic jams to get there and in 3rd grade amusement rides.

title: Good for kids amusement.
review: Good for kids and family. Boating and waterfall was nice to view and enjoy.

title: Nice place
review: You feel Nature good place for family must visit this place.good for kids.but entry fee is much higher 25rs per person.and they charge 5rs for using wash room also.

title: Company garden
review: Ok but not so great need more cleanness.

title: Nice for kids.. naah for elders!!
review: Nice place to spend time with family.. few activities also available. Tickets for wax house a bit on higher side. No ice creams plz... I saw myself the worker putting back an ice cream lop that fell on floor. Even parking tickets are high!!!

title: Nice place
review: Nice place to see flowers, if you love to be in nature. Only good place in Mussoorie now days. Lush green and good

title: Stayed at Vermont Estate with Friends in Summer 2018
review: Lovely view and very personalized stay experience - Kudos to all their local staff - majority of the employees are local and that makes all the difference.

title: Average place
review: This was recommended by many as one of the must visit place. But somehow I didn't like much and have my own reasons to say so.

title: Beauty at its best
review: Beautiful memories of Company garden. A must visit place. Very beautiful scenes. Nicely maintained garden and various range of flowers. Beautiful water fall there perfect for pictures clicking. Wax museum was okay.

title: Company bagh
review: Company bagh is around 3km from mall  road.you can easily reach there by walking. It's worth visiting this place. The entry fee for this place is Rs. 25 per person. It is full of different kind of beautiful flowers. The garden also has rides for which you have to pay extra. I think it's Rs. 20 per ride. You can also do boating here. There are many food points available here. K devbhumi wax museum is situated in company garden only which has a entry fee of Rs. 100.

title: Company Garden
review: It's just a regular garden with some shopping and games and other rides for kids upto age 15 years.

title: Visit company garden
review: It’s good for children and fun there is nice gardens and boating facilities. Restaurant has good food.

title: Well Maintained Garden, with fun activities for kids
review: This Garden is not very far from Mussoorie town. It is full of flowers and you can get your picture taken in HD camera's even in local dress if you want. Garden is full of flowers which makes it good place for photos. But the main attraction is the Kids activities. Kids can enjoy a lot there and even adults can play some of the games. Lets just say there is no boating, because once you look at the boating place here, you'll never go for the same. Overall a good place to hand out and spend some picnic time with Family.

title: Beautiful Flowers
review: This garden is having beautiful flowers collection. One can enjoy the artificial waterfall and boat ride. There are also food joints to grab something to eat. Also, there are couples of ride that one can enjoy. The entry fee is 25 per person

title: wonderful garden with full of flowers variety.
review: wonderful garden with full of flowers variety.You will find good photographer too here who are able to shoot good clicks.

title: Perfect Family place
review: A nice place for the whole family to go. It has something for every age group and that makes it a fulfilling experience

title: Pleasing colors
review: My initial thoughts were that the Company Garden would be a huge place. It wasn’t. The entrance was lined up with shops selling local products and souvenirs. The garden has very colorful flowers. Every body seemed busy taking pictures! A small waterfall at one end was a popular place.

title: Nicely maintained garden
review: Some beautiful flowers here. Nice setup. Some pedal boating also available in a small place like this. Lot of walking needed here. Activities like museum, play area also available. Some nice places for clicking family pictures.

title: Just average
review: A few flowers and a few adventure and maggie shops. There are the kind of places people just go to as they have to do something while visiting a hill station.

title: Beautiful place
review: This place is located at some distance from mussorie you can go their by rikshwas available on the mall road. The place has small beautiful waterfull. It also has a garden full of beautiful flowers. Its taickeg cost you around 20 to 30rs. A good place to go.

title: Garden
review: Well maintained garden with beautiful waterfall best picture point ..rain can start at any time and temprature differ is too much soo keep ur self ready. In my whole trip rain disturbed a lot. Right from dehradoon to masuri also

title: Good timepass
review: You can spend good quality time with family for around 2 hours. You can find food, water fall, games, rides

title: Picturesque place
review: Lovely garden providing idyllic surrounding. Boating available.  Had to cut short visit due to unseasonal rains.

title: Worth a picnic
review: Cycle rickshaw ride recommend to and fro from Jhula ghar. Accommodates two people for INR 300 only. They give you one hour at the garden. Waiting charges applicable if you need extra time. The route from Jhula ghar is beautiful and covering it in an open cycle rickshaw adds to the charm. The garden itself is very beautiful. Has a variety of flowers, man-made waterfall, man-made lake to boat in and a beautiful food court. The food is okay. Kids would love a trip to company garden.

title: Holidays
review: Good place for kids with somany rides,swings

title: Average place
review: The place is not far from the main city. Tickets cost 25 rupees (40 US cents) per person for entry. Swings costs 40 rupees each time and boating 100 per boat. Place is a good one to kill time but nothing so special that you plan to visit the place seperately

title: Beautiful garden
review: This is a beautiful garden in the mountains. The authorities has maintained it very well. Entry tickets are required and parking is also a paid one. The food options are there and few rides are also available for kids.

title: Good place
review: We took the cycle Riksha from library chowk of mall road for 300 RS for me , my husband and my son. He took us there , waited for an hour and got us back to mall road. It took us little over half and hour one way in cycle Riksha. If you have a cab then you can go there in it. But I guess the climate and view can be best enjoyed by travelling like the locals..

title: Excellent spot for Kids.
review: Lots of natural beauty, though parking is not very ample, lots of games, boating, a small man made water fall. Overall a good place for kids...

title: A paradise for kids
review: If you are travelling with kids .One must visit this place.

title: Have changed and renowned since last 4 year
review: I have already visited the company garden 4 year back. I those days it's used to be a usual garden but now garden has a big food court, wax museum, boating, few ride like toy train, dianasour ride, and some more.

title: Its good
review: It's good main think that is amazing seeing their is famous status that are made of moom all over it is a nice place.

title: Beautiful garden
review: This is very beautiful garden. There is also wax museum in garden. Fountain in garden is very good. There is different color of beautiful flower.

title: fine
review: Amazing place full of beautiful plants of all types and flowers which mix their aroma in the air to rob you of your sorrows

title: Nothing great
review: This place was a disappointment in terms of places of visit. Except you can click pictures in traditional outfits to take back home. Restaurant is self service highly priced considering the location.

title: Amazing Garden with Varieties of Flowers
review: I am not sure if the flowers come in every season but i was lucky to see a garden full of flowers and fountain. Must visit this point.

title: Nice garden
review: It was a nice garden with lots of activities like small train boating marry go round kids really enjoyed the garden also you get lots of nature fresh juices.  I took apple cider vinegar

title: Very nice place and kids loving.
review: For kids specially ! Nice garden with couple of playing & enjoy options for children. Food court inside with a small pool for boating.

title: Floral beauty
review: It is a big garden of flowers. Very colourful. It also has a wax museum. There is a small fountain & lake for boating.

title: Much a fo about nothing
review: Some beautiful flower beds, but is it worth make a special journey through busy street? Not my cup off tea. Small park compare to big parks that we get in the west.

title: Good for children
review: There is nothing much for elders except clicking pictures in traditional clothes. This is the best spot to click pictures in natural surroundings instead of an artificial background. There are a lot of activities for children though. So a good place for families with kids. Average for adults.

title: Good place to hangout
review: A good spot in Mussorie to hangout with family. Combination of outdoor activities and the food makes it worth try.

title: Over hyped - the lake is smaller than a swimming pool
review: What a farce. Good for people who have never seen a garden. The worst is the 'smaller than swimming pool' lake. The Wax Museum is horrible. They charge you 100 rupees for pathetically made figures. Absolutely waste of money. Do NOT go theree

title: Fun for kids
review: Garden with a man made waterfall, lake and some rides for kids makes Company Garden an ideal place to hangout with your family. There is also a wax museum that charges 100 bucks per head. Well landscaped and maintained properly. You can spend 1-2 hours in this garden. There are few eateries also so you will not starve to death.

title: Exercise palace
review: You can do exercise with there guidelines and properly owasum palace to visit every time and excellent natural.

title: Very Beautiful garden!!
review: Different experience. Very nice and lovely flowers.You can click some beautiful photographs. Refreshing place.

title: If you have nothing to do...Then Only
review: Nothing much to do with Garden. Of course Flower & plant lovers would like. But when we visited FEB-MAR, not much flowers.So visit only if you have nothing else to do and ample time. Entry Fee applicable. Near by Wax Museum is also there with a food court.

title: Beautiful Flowers, Lot of Economical Kids Activities
review: Many fun filled activities in the Garden

title: Beautiful Garden & Flowers
review: Company garden is so well maintained. They have kept plenty of flowers and it is very different kind of garden. Very beautiful and nice flowers. They have made man-made waterfalls. Wax museum is also there. You can click some beautiful photographs. Food joint is also there.

title: Don't go
review: Full of shopping zone play area for kids but no flowers no Garden fun all commercial rights and very low quality must avoid if you have less time and Discover something else the maximum what I can find and showing in the pic

title: Garden for Children and Tourists
review: Basically a Garden with artificial small pond for Boating, artificial waterfall for photography, small horror house, play area for children and view of Mountains on one side to take selfies. Not a must visit place but can relax for some time. The local shikanji sharbat(tastes great) and maggie of the garden restaurant is good to have.

title: Must visit place in Mussoorie
review: Company garden is a must visit place in Mussoorie. The place can be reached via a taxi or a cycle rickshaw. Not far from central business place in Mussoorie. One can spend a good time there with family.

title: Must visit
review: The park is very beautiful and well maintained by the Mussoorie municipal authority. Neat and clean atmosphere nice fountains. The place is just about 3 km from the Library point. The different variety of local and exotic plants can be enjoyed. There was a lot of things for kids toy trains, boating, different types of jhulas etc. recommended this place for couple & Family.

title: Normal garden
review: The garden is normal garden you can get anywhere.However it is good if you arelooking for tourist destination in Mussorriee

title: Normal garden...not great
review: Normal but beautiful garden with lots of flowers. Good for kids to spend time. It has boating, a toy train for toddlers, some activities, small cafeteria, chargeble entry to wax museum, greenhouse and an waterfall to take snaps. Good for spending couple of hours.

title: Simple but nice garden
review: Company garden is nice with varieties of flowers .... artificial water fall is superb.... wax museum is inside it,, boat ‍️ ride is also there... it wa school and rainy when I visited

title: In Mussoorie
review: good place to have fun specially for children. boat ride, swings and nice view. food stalls also inside.

title: Nice place to relax
review: It's a simple and beautiful flower garden. Not something extraordinary that you won't find anywhere else, but a decent place to relax a little. It has a lot of flowers, a small water fall, wax museum and a food court inside. A place u can take all the pretty pictures :)

title: A good place to visit
review: Company garden is among a very few places of Mussoorie which is actually good, surrounding with tall mountain trees & play area for kids as well. Nicely maintained with different types of flowers. Good place.

title: Q  charges are Rs 100 person in additoon of entry ticket of Rs 19
review: Average. Wax museum charges are Rs 100 person in addition to entry ticket. Staff not friendly...scope for improvement

title: Greenery all around
review: Ot is a good place there you will find photographers who insists you to where their local dress and get clicked by them so I did.overall gud place green and calm.as it was an off season no much crowd found.

title: Flowers, Flowers, Flowers Everywhere
review: This is the best place for the person who love to see the different varieties of flowers. A peaceful garden very good for families and the couples who want to spend some time in nature. This places is really good for taking pictures and selfies. However, its not maintained properly. Wax museum is average.

title: Not great
review: Very average . Not many flowers there. The wax museum is not that great too. Could be more beautiful . Nothing great to write about.

title: Nice place to visit while in Mussoorie
review: The garden abounds with flowers. Located in the midst of mountains, it offers magnificent vistas into the valley below. There are a few stalls as well. The municipal corporation should do their bit to enhance the beauty of the garden.

title: Good Place
review: Company Garden is a very nice place to visit in Mussoourie.

title: Garden in Mussoorie can be given a miss
review: Company Garden is located about 3 km from Mall Road.  It has flowers, a small boating area, children play area, and some food shops.  I needs to me maintained a lot better.  Views of the valley are decent.  Surely not a must visit attraction.

title: not maintained
review: once i went to company garden few years back somewhere in 2015 and it was so beautifull so i forcefull took my friends to this place and now in 2017 it was in such a bad condition .

title: Not that Great place
review: Good to spend an hour or two. Advisable if you have klids otherwise pretty boring place for couple or family.

title: Cool and quite place
review: Company garden is a really cool and attractive place where you can boating, eating in restaurants. you can go in parlor and children play games. This is all over a perfect place to spend your whole day.

title: Great place to be
review: This is the place which always attracts me the most in Mussoorie. The flowers planted there takes you to all new world. Just wonderful. The restaurant inside is best in terms of food and price.

title: Everything other than flowers
review: The best time to visit is only March April. I went there last week and it was fully dry shedded leaves. Kids have many rides there to have fun and a nice restaurant to have tasty food served. Mountain bike rides are available at the entrance.

title: Nice place
review: Nice place for family outing.View was good at company Garden. Beauty of Flowers was well managed. You can do  also at small pound.

title: not worth it..
review: cannot match the gardens at Kodaikanal or ooty.. not worth the time.. the surroundings are not good..

title: Good One
review: On my visit to Mussoorie , I went there and there is a big park here . You can spend good one hour here. Also main attraction is the Wax Museum here where you can go and see statues of Mr Bean, Michael Jackson, Mother Teresa etc. There is also a garden maintained of beautiful flowers there.

title: one of the most beatiful park in uttrakhand
review: one of the most beautiful garden near by ITBP camp . there are many adventures or task here for children and adult both bull riding. horse riding, boating n food snacks roaming around there in splashes and flora and fauna one must visit there when travel to Mussoorie beautiful scenic views from here to enjoy

title: It is dead
review: The company Bagh in Dehradun once star attraction is almost dead

title: Poorly maintained !
review: This place is a park - again over rated - don't have to visit this place just because all the tour guides says so since it's very poorly maintained and thers is nothing to be amused about

title: Company Garden-Mussorie
review: Very close to Mussorie town .and suitable for a 1-2 hrs visit. Garden is not well maintained and doesn't have any flowers .There is a food court and children's play area with a small boating area.

title: Over-rated and not worth much of your time
review: If you are in Mussoorie for the first time you can visit the place once but you can not go there again and moreover there is nothing much to see or explore.. Just a few shops to eat and flowers to see..I would suggest rather go to gunhill or George everest. You will be delighted. Such a boring place.

title: waste of time
review: this place is real waste of time, shall not recommend anyone.. its doesnt even have garden.. next to wash room there is haunted house, u place ur self in washroom hearing the devil voices..

title: Typical Garden sort of place!  Dont expect much
review: This is a Garden maintained and run by municipal council Mussoorie having a restaurant and few small eating joints inside. Entry to the Garden is paid , ideal place for families with kids. Food in the restaurant is average and we preferred to eat Maggie ( regional instant food of hills ) rather than eating oily junky food in the restaurant.

title: Its just average
review: Here is nothing to do everything is artificial (lake, Waterfall etc).

title: Poorly maintained,and unnecessarily hyped park
review: The place is just ok,it has poor approach road so please be mindful about your tyres. Parking fee is 50 Rs and there is a 19 Rs per head entry ticket.In return of of risking your tyres and time,what you get to see a below average park.After visiting I have started realising that MCD in Delhi is not really doing a bad job,parks maintained by them in most parts of Delhi(which i guess will be thousands in numbers) are far better.

title: Close to Liabrary Chowk
review: Its a garden in the routine style. Its 3 kms from Liabrary Chowk so easy to visit. Even a cycle rick will take you there. Small amusement park for kids & a parking contractor who fleeces you and provides no parking.

title: Company garden review
review: One of the famous tourist spot in mussoorie .The garden has a nominal entry fee.The garden has fountain ,waterfall, nursery artificial lake and few shops .

title: Good weekend
review: Nice place to be with family and kids,kids enjoyed a lot and had great fun gaming , Boating and had good food

title: Vaccation
review: Its one of the beautiful garden with different kind of flowers of mountains in one place,it is really beautifull garden ,one can sit relax do photosession with loved family ,or of flowers,it has a wax meuseum also with different stautues made of wax ,one has pay for going inside wax meuseum !

title: Lovely garden.nice hats available.I bought some and using it everyday.
review: could not visit other places as we loved strolling on the mall and a visit to the IAS academy as well as the waverly church which was beautiful.Also visited a budhist temple.

title: Nothing much
review: Its simply a garden, nothing much. The wax museum was not worth the money and so is the horror house.

title: Just a tired looking park
review: It's a normal crammed up park. Rides small children will like. Rest can be avoided.taxi takes RS 500 from mall road Chowk (to n fro ). This destination can best be missed.Horror show was bad. Columbus boat was good. Fountain was fine.Wax museum was so so.

title: Disappointed
review: After hearing a lot about this place my friends and i decided to visit this place. To be very honest i was very disappointed. I expected something more but the garden was not properly maintained, there is one lake which even smaller to a proper swimming pool and there some people are enjoying boat ride. NA d the worst part is the lake was not even clean enough. Need due care and maintenance.

title: Nice garden!!!
review: It's a very nice and beautiful garden.My son loves to play in the garden. Very clean and we'll maintained

title: Divine destination
review: Beautiful place to say the least .. One of the most visited destination India. Better to say nothing less than a Tourist's Paradise. We went there with family and enjoyed thoroughly while we stayed there ..The gardent is just beautiful.. It was a 10 days long trip and I have memorized it in a way that want to go there all over again ..

title: Good place to spend few hours
review: Good place to spend few hours and enjoy maggi with coffee . It’s good for photos and comparatively colder than. Usual . Overall  good

title: Nice
review: Good for one time visit. You have a place to see so many flowers which give you a nice feeling. Its a small place by the way...

title: Family trip
review: Beautiful garden having area for kids and a restaurant. Kids can enjoy in their playing area. Also have shops outside park where local items can be purchased.

title: Colorful and soulful
review: Amidst beautiful flowers, a waterfall, boating, photography and a picture perfect backdrop lies this colorful place...

title: Really nothing to see- if u are coming to mussoorie thn only one time watch it is!
review: If u want to have some pictures with those gorgeous flowers or that jarna thn its ok! Otherwise

title: Waste of time and money
review: Far away .dry garden without flowers blooming.unimpressive . No match with pictures publicized . Wax museum is there. Wax figure s are unrecognizable. It is actually municipal garden.

title: Avoidable
review: This is your typical tourist trap.

title: Enjoyed there a lot
review: Very nice place. Wax museum is a class. Fountains, see saw, kids ride etc.were there. Food shop is there. Basically amusements for all is there. No age bar. I visited there with my 1 year old daughter, sis n parents n I can say it was fun n lifetime  memorable moments..

title: Small but well maintained garden
review: You can spend sometime here. Well maintained garden. There were not many flowers in this time of the year .

title: Well maintained garden
review: While returning from kempty falls one can have a stopover here. Small entry fee. Boating and some fun rides for children.

title: Waste of time
review: Nothing to do there. Have a small artificial lake for boating, a wax museum (which we did not enter), an artificial waterfall and couple of eating joints. However there was a nursery to purchase plants.Too crowded, waste of time

title: Nice place
review: Good outing for the kids.Nice lil

title: Not a lot to draw you in
review: Went there with my niece - she enjoyed some of the rides - the plants were great - and met a fabulous Gardner who enjoyed her job which was the main draw. Small boating pond - would not call it a lake -rides were average and the usual tatty touristy shops to avoid at all costs

title: Calm place
review: Nice place for photo session.

title: Nature paradise
review: You can have a perfect click for your family at this place as the scenery is nice. A small waterfall and boating area for leisure time but the wax museum is a little disappointing.

title: Average
review: They don't care wether flower are their or not. If you don't have to do anything then only visit here otherwise avoid & go for Mussoorie lake.

title: Not as good as before
review: Garden has not been maintained properly, but old charm still exists, visit once if not visited earlier.

title: Visit to company bath. Good scenic beauty
review: Good time pass for 2 hrs. Nice place to click pic with family.younger kids less than 15 yr enjoy more.

title: Nice park and many things to explore
review: It's very beautiful park and well maintained. It is amidst lush green forest. There are good shops and boating options also. Avoid boating. The entry fee is 18 rupees per person. If you are coming through your own car then the parking and toll charges are rupees 50.

title: Just an average garden with fountains, amusement park, food court, boating etc
review: Just an average garden with fountains, very small artificial lake with boating, amusement park for kids, food court, & Wax Museum. LOcated 3-4 Kms from Library Chowk & can be reached by Cycle Rickshaw,  a unique local mans of transport.  Approx time reqd to explore - 30 minutes. Approx time to reach - to & fro - 30 minutes.

title: Very beautiful and well maintained  gardens that rejuvenate your soul
review: Company Gardens , is situated in the Happy Valley area of Mussoorie. It is located at 3 kms from the Library point .The entry to the Company Gardens is by way of admission tickets priced at Rs 19 each .

title: A good refreshing place
review: If you travel alone with kids.

title: great park
review: it is very beautiful park in mussoorie. from mall road we take a riksha and we pay 280 rs. very nice park with many variety of flowers and one artificial water fall. good for photography. must visit place in mussoorie

title: A garden.
review: Not a lot to say, except that it is a nice maintained garden. Little children will enjoy the park and the rides. Adults can take selfies around the place , especially near the small artificial water-fall.

title: Nice place to spend time !!
review: Well if you are in mussoorie and have some spare time then you must visit this garden. Its not simply like a park or local garden. There are lot of things to do like:

title: Had been with family
review: Beautiful garden. Lot of activities for kids. Lovely location. Must visit when in Mussoorie. Very pleasant.

title: A garden gone wrong
review: Company garden is in urgent need for repair, renovation and landscape work. Not even worth the 19 rs entry ticket.

title: Fun time
review: It's a place which has something for everyone.... shikaras..... wax museum and not a bad one..... Photoshops..... eating joint... swings.... nursery....all in all a full fun time place to indulge in ur childhood and natural surroundings

title: Visit to company bagh
review: we visited company garden.  It is 3-4 km from library chauk of mussoorie near LBS IAS Academy.  Well the season was quite a good and garden was full of various types of flowers.  They also have a nursery.  The wax studio was good but not price worthy.  The restaurant inside were quite expensive.  one can come back to mussoorie to have food.  Rickshaws are available every now n than.

title: Something to do if you have spare time
review: The only attractions were the flowers and the small artificial waterfall.

title: Garden on hill
review: Company garden 2-3 km from mall road . Garden many varieties of flower and small fall but I am not sure it is artificial or natural but good place for photography . There is rs 19 entry fee .inside park a wax museum and extra rs 100 entry for wax museum . Some tea coffee stall with one large restaurant . There is some Hammock with extra charges .

title: Garden Having Boating Facility
review: The garden houses a large variety of flora and birds,making it popular among nature lovers.Tourists can enjoy boating in the artificial lake,recently constructed within the garden.

title: Good
review: One time visit. Amidst nature. Wid a man-made waterfall and lake. The ride to the place via rikshaw is awesome. Preferable time would after 4 till 6

title: Normal Garden nothing Much to Do
review: Well we took 3 week paddled rickshaw from Cable car mall road . They charge approximately Rs.400/-  Return with one hour halt at the garden . There is small wax museum which is very economical for Rs.100/- per person . But they statues of few celebrities don't even reassemble original personality . The garden has man made lake for boating quite small  and man made waterfall which isn't very amusing . The utilities like washroom etc also aren't maintained properly  . There is small food court also present serving different varieties of food but don't know how fresh they would be in off season because I could hardly see any client. Still if you are in Mussoorie one can visit for 2-3 hours trip including traveling time .

title: Garden full of spl flowers
review: Amazing Garden, there is like facility of boating, rides for kids and youngsters, relatively much chiller wheather, good arrangement for snacks, awesome collection of flowers in nursery.

title: Nicely maintained
review: Garden full of activities for kids. Boating, rides for kids, small waterfall, restaurant, etc.

title: Nice place to hang out in Mussorie
review: The Company Garden is just about 4 Kms away from the mall road and is a well maintained park. The man made water fall and greenery are good. There is an eatery in a corner of the park, which serves the purpose to grab a bite after a good stroll around the park. The park maintains a good greenhouse also for various varieties of plants and flowers.

title: Nice Place to relax
review: Company Garden is a park with quite a bit of amousment for kids. Kids as well as adults will enjoy the place. This park gives a good view of mountain in the back drop. Park is spacious with lots of sitting arrangement , boating facilities, toy train, swing, slips, bull riding for kids.

title: Nice place to hangout with family
review: It is a nice place for family, has joyrides and  has good space and serene landscape, have a good restaurant inside and other eatery shop. You can enjoy here if you are accompanied by young children

title: Overrated....
review: OK, so there is a nice pathway through flowers and there is a waterfall... is this enough to make the place special? OK, so I add the view... if there are no clouds and there is no fog... but, other then this.... not worthy your time... OK, so you do do boating for, like, 50 meters or so... no... I am not buying this....

title: Garden fun
review: Best place to have fun with your partner enjoy beautiful flowers and artificial lake and boat ride too.mut visit place

title: Beautiful garden surrounded by lush green forest
review: We went there early around 9 A.M it was raining in the morning. The entry fee is rupees 18 in the garden. And if you're going through your car then rupees 50 would be parking and toll charges. It offers few good restaurants. The beauty of this Garden is that it's surrounded by lush green forest and the feeling is amazing. There is a boating facility also but that's not worth. Overall it's a good experience and a must visit place in Mussoorie.

title: Good experience worth remembering
review: Visited this place in mid sep 17 with family. Very conspicuous board on road showing the way around 2 km from mall road. Parking is available if off season. Roads are good. 100 rs parking charges and 19 rs per head entry fees. There are rides for children 20 rs per ride. Columbus, small train, frog ride etc. Boating area is too small. Didn't try. Haunted house is worth visiting. 70 rs per head. Take a snap un traditional dress. Food court is ok. Paid toilet is available inside. Wax museum is inside, 100 rs per head. Some of the figures are good, Luke gandhiji, nehruji, einstein, vivekanandji, teresa etc.  Children will have a good time in garden.snall waterfall is also there.

title: Nice garden but not maintained
review: We visited this garden we liked the ambiance but its not maintained well.

title: Many flowers!!!
review: Garden is full of beautiful flowers. Many butterfly were flying on the flowers. It looks really immense beautiful.

title: Beautiful Garden
review: Company garden is at a distance of 3 kilometers from Library Chowk. You can hire a cycle rickshaw at Library chowk to go there. The cycle rickshaw charges 65 INR per person as on Sep 2017 to reach there. If you want, you can go there on foot. A lot of different types of flowers were blossomed there. The park was neat and clean. You can enjoy boating there in a small pond.

title: Good time in garden
review: Trust me this is place kids enjoy a lot. The place has decent varieties of trees and flower garden. Besides that it also has lot of kid playing area were children will enjoy thoroughly. Lot of paid rides, boat ride are there to spend atleast 3 to 4 hours here. Good thing is that it has decent hotel and relatively better paid wash room are there. It also has a mini  waterfall or man made one where people are taking lot of pics. Overall it is a good site seeing place to visit.

title: flower garden!!!!!!
review: whoever suggested this place as a pace of tourist attraction ...well if you have nothing better to do go ther or skip it and enjoy a stroll by mall road.

title: Lush green gardens
review: The lush green gardens in this property make you feel so close to nature.. the birds chirping and the music in background adds so much to the ambiencs... a big thumbs up

title: When weather is awesome this place is Heaven
review: I visited this place last week when it was raining not heavily and this place seems amazing. If you are visiting Mussoorie in July-August do not miss this place.

title: Must go there
review: It is one of the beautiful garden in Mussoorie. It can be easily visited by hand rickshaw from Library end. The garden was clean and you can spend hours enjoying nature there.

title: Sid
review: Nice garden amongst the hills, road to the place was crowded and there were lot of rash drivers.

title: Decent for Hill station
review: I have been there with friends on one of the Sundays nonetheless, did not find it to the level of interest of mine.

title: Lovely oasis in the midst of green hills
review: My wife and I spent a few hours in the garden, which is very pretty, though could be better maintained. The wax museum was weird with statues of Adolf Hitler, Saddam Hussain etc.

title: Company Garden
review: Away from the hustle bustle of mall road, one may find the old school charm at company garden. Taking you back to the early 90s era, company garden reminds of old bollywood era. The park is a good walk, with many eating and recreation options

title: Beautiful Garden full of Greener
review: I visited Company Garden when I visited Mussoorie this month. It was really a wonderful experience walking in this garden. There were flowers everywhere and waterfall in middle. Also there is a Wax Museum in this garden.

title: Little disappointed
review: The view was good with different varieties of flowers and plants to look at but not that worth of traveling till that place

title: Lovely gardens
review: A picturesque garden with colorful flowers and host of amusement for an entire family. You can buy some antiques at the Govt stalls inside. The food court was lousy.

title: Nothing special
review: Nothing special is there except some trees of flowers. It is just a garden with some trees. So, I have not enjoyed it.

title: Kids loves it
review: Kids really love this place.

title: Decent place
review: The garden is quite modest but has a decent variety of floral delights. A lot of colors around. Not the best but a good place nonetheless.

title: The garden for the masses
review: Everyone in town will come here. Don't go here thinking you will have a peaceful walk and good time. Crowded, and people from all strata come here. Small games for kids and as you will realise once in the kids will want to do it no matter how practical and careful you are. Small local good places are there. Maggi and tea is a safe bet it and if you want to eat something which I personally would advice against. But as I was telling someone, we won't go to Mussoorie planning to visit such a place. It if you end up there it will remind you of how some of us around 40 years now, used to go and have fun in gardens back in the days. An old time sake visit ....

title: good place for childrens
review: its nice garden operated by local municipality. garden with different variety of flowers. rides available for children's

title: good place
review: a very good park in mussoorie. we booked a rikshaw from mall road to garden for 260 rs. 1 hour stay. it is very great with variety of flowers. and artificial fall. you can take many pictures here. visit in evening.

title: Average Experience
review: First time I went to this place on November 2012. and 2nd time went to this place on July 2017  It's very good place basically in rainy season. There is something special you can see - there is an artificial water pump. That's all about flowers gardan in mussorie.

title: Rushed romance
review: The location is a bit difficult to reach. All the attractions are in a compressed geography, a bit loud in seeking the tourist's attraction. But provides many selfie locations. So if you have to tick off the places to be visited in Mussorie and are in a hurry get all your photos snapped in this place. Loud Tourists go there, locals do not love visiting this place. Reduced to a crowded and noisy place.

title: Picinc
review: Nyc place to visit..Well maintained..Beauty of the place is lyk a treat fr the eyes .. Restaurant is also good..One should visit this place while their stay in Missouri.

title: Downmarket crowd and very conventional place
review: Highly avoidable. Too crowded by plastic bag throwing, insensitive tourists, shouting and eating maggi. Not for nature lovers.

title: Good picnic spot
review: It has a variety of colorful flowers, well maintained. A mini Lake with a small and artificial waterfall. Boating facilities is also available. Food court and children ride too. Nice place to visit with family. A telescope view makes you feel close to himalayas. Timings 9 - 6.

title: Excellent place
review: This is a privately maintained garden having lots of swings for children. There is also a nicely maintained garden. Nicepicnic spot

title: Visit to Company Garden
review: It is worth a visit. The restaurant inside needs little more cleaning. There are water falls and nice gardens for taking pictures.

title: One of the Best Garden in Alwar
review: This is the very peaceful place for meditation with Gym. This is the very Greenery place and it has mini Shimla inside.

title: Good picnic spot
review: A well maintained garden. Very beautiful flowers. But the toilets are not very clean. So many eateries spoil the beauty

title: don't waste your time visiting this place
review: This is a small part with a very small artificial lake for boating..there is nothing here to see...uf you are on a short trip..save time and skip this...just waste of time..

title: Company bagh
review: Well I personally did not like the place.. Kind of a small play area for kids.. Stay away from leeches.. Overall I'll give it a 2*

title: A small Garden
review: Company Garden is a small garden in Mussourie. Kids may enjoy. Boat ride is for kids in a very small pond. There is a restaurant. There is a wax museum with a entry fee of Rs.100/- If you have not seen a wax museum then you can go. Otherwise nothing much worth mentioning in the garden

title: Very crowdy
review: It took 2 hours to reach, as there were about 1000 taxis and cars on the road. But the place was nice. It was good fun for children, as were rides, boating, shooting activities. But because of huge crowd, most of the fun was lost.

title: Collection of bunch of flowers and Orchid
review: Situated at around 5km from Mall road Mussorie. One can take ricksaw from Mall road and enjoy the beautiful view of the road up to the Garden. The garden contains some of the beautiful collection of flowers and Orchid and one artificial water fall. The Wax museum inside the garden have statues of world famous personal. Entry fees is around 20 bucks. Wax museum entry fee is separate and it is 100 bucks.

title: One visit to company garden
review: A park hidden amongst natural surroundings. A place that can be visited with family and friends. But one must help in maintaining its beauty.

title: Decent park
review: Nothing more. The park is big and maintained well. Has a wax museum inside - don't expect Tussadesque... In fact you have identify certain wax figures by reading the boards only. You have photographers who will be behind you to take photos. They are good ones and they had full frame high end cameras and they take memorable photos. A set of play area is present. Had a good restaurant inside which surprisingly was tastier and had good variety from dosas to noodles to fried rice to other North Indian specialities. Worth spending an hour if you have small kids but don't have too many hopes especially if you have been abroad and been to Mme. TUSSAUD'S.

title: Good for kids below 7-8 years
review: This was the average place and good some kids to have some fun on the rides. The museum is not worth to visit.

title: Nothing great in the place, only few rides
review: There is nothing great in this place but only has few rides. Can go if you have kids. Boating is the worst attraction.

title: Feast to the Eyes
review: After enjoying at Kempty Falls and on oour way back to our hotel @ Mall Road, we decided to halt at Cmopany Garden to see the Wax Museum. When we entered the garden, we changed our perception, actually the main attraction was the garden itself. Full of beautiful flowers and landscapes. you can spent couple of hours there enjoying the beauty. Wax Museum is another attraction which is inside the garden itself. other attractions are rides for the kids. You can satisfy your taste buds at the restaurant.

title: beautiful spot to vist
review: We visited on july 6. its was mist weather and weather was so good to walk to company garden. Must visit this place.

title: Bhrigu yoga event
review: Company garden is good place for Entertain and enjoy the tourist, I was here in last week with my students, I hope this will be more entertaining and beautiful place in future

title: A treat for the photographer
review: If you love photography or you love clicking selfies. Yes this is the point you would love most.

title: Visit To Company Gardens Mussoorie.
review: Looks good with nice flowers.  But the maintenance is poor. No proper dust bins are placed and the visitors throw things every where.  Parking is a nightmare with no one to regulate.  The staff in the Food Court are casual.  The Wax museum was closed as there was no power.  Should they not have a back up generator.  The girlie the counter there was very rude.

title: Lovely place
review: This place is not a entertainment park.. if someone is looking for activities... its not there.. but it has beautiful flowers all over the place... well maintained and wonderful fragrance..

title: Lovely place
review: Lovely garden, although small. Must go for anyone going to Dehradun. It is better to go there in the evening.

title: Nice Place
review: Garden is well maintained , variety of plants and flowers. Food courts available, nice view points are there

title: Good experience
review: Nice little walk from my hotel. Beautiful place. Nicely maintained. Excellent for kids. Lots of rides n fun activities in offer.

title: The wonderful spread of flower arrangements.
review: Its a good place for either early morning stroll or late evening walks amidst the beautiful flower arrangements.

title: Good place for Plant lovers
review: A small tourist spot for plant lovers but don't expect more. One can see different types of Plants/flowers, click photos but don't touch. Mountain range can be seen from here and IAS academy too.

title: Used to be beautiful a few years ago,spoilt by the crowd now
review: I had a picture of Company Garden in my head as a huge garden,with a large fountain in the middle,along with boating,and a restaurant with a mountain view, but all of it was destroyed with this visit.

title: Great place for children
review: Great place.... Tasty Food.... Children have all types... fun ... play.. eat... My dear son Rajvansh have taken all jhollaas.... Good to take photographs....

title: More than expected
review: Good place for children small amusement park nice restaurant serving some really delicious items ..must visit in mussoorie

title: I enjoyed very much.......
review: I enjoyed very much .......it was a great place ......it is a family place...... there was a wax mueseum all the statues are looking real

title: Good place to spend time with young children
review: Good place to spend time with young children. Has wax museum inside and surely1 time watch. Well Maintained and has games for kids

title: Loved it
review: When we went there , though the place was bit crowded but , each and every part of company garden was amazingly maintained. The flowers , the scenic views that you get here will just make your day.

title: Place for flower lovers , Couples, young children
review: you will see lot of flowers with one waterfall inside ( for photo-shoot), 2-3 rides (for children 8-12 years), boating.

title: Good place
review: This place was good to make one time visit.  this is maintained well and enjoyable place for kids.  flowers, rides and museum were attractions

title: A Silent Spectator in the Hills
review: Located at about 7-8 Kms from the main town, this place is probabaly one of few places which can be enjoyed by entire family as it has boating facility, games, a wax museum(which is not good) and decent eateries.

title: Excellent place
review: People of all generations have something or other to enjoy! Food court has many options..ambiance is good..Garden is well maintained...

title: Beautiful Greenery Garden
review: Go there with children, there are some rides for them. It is beautiful park, greenery is everywhere.

title: Company garden
review: Must visit. Very low ticket rate just 18 per person. Children enjoy here. Many types of swings are available here. Water spots. Cheap and good restaurant

title: Perfect Family Outing Place
review: While Mall Road and Kempty Fall are the major attractions but this is the best place to visit especially with family and kids. It has beautiful flowers, artificial water fall, food court and food stalls and best of all reasonably priced rides for kids apart from boating.

title: Nothing much to rave about.
review: A typical garden with artificial fountains & waterfalls. Went walking from Mall Road but not really worth the trouble.

title: Not Much to Do
review: Its an Average place to visit. Avoid if you can

title: An assault on the senses
review: The original planners of this Garden will be turning in their graves. The Municipal Authority of Mussoorie in their infinite wisdom have converted this Garden into an open air food court and shopping mall. We had gone early in the morning so were saved from the full assualt as most of the shops/eateries had not opened, but just imagine the crowd and noise of Mall Road in Mussoorie in the height of Summer with a few green patches and trees thrown in. Definitely a place to be avoided.

title: Amazing place
review: This place is worth going as it is very near to mall road. There are various games shop rides boating in this park. There is a nice artificial water fall too. Small food joints are also there.

title: Nice and peaceful place
review: I liked the wax museum inside although the ticket is overpriced...it's Rs. 100 which is not of worth. Taking about the garden, it is a nice garden with a fall. Nice, calm and peaceful place with abundant eateries and entertainment.

title: Lot of traffic- Nothing special
review: I visited in peak season. I used rickshaw which was very costlier but seen a long queue of cars stuck in jam. Rickshaw take 15 mins cars taken 40-45 mins. There is nothing special inside. Kids can enjoy various rides and view.

title: visit to company garden
review: ideal spot for children with fun activities around. not many flowers in full bloom compared to other hillstation flower garderns. too many people and very narrow pathways.

title: lovely place to visit
review: park your car very very far and come walking to this place. The road leading here lacks parking space... so expect a jam in the evenings. LOVELY GARDEN TO BE IN... ENJOY.

title: As per the name it was ok
review: We just wanted to visit a good place at Musoorie. This is good garden with a water fall, little pond for boating a trampoline for kids.

title: Nice place
review: A nice must visit place. Around 10 km from the Mall road take rikshaw from mall road to company garden for a natural ride.It just cost Rs 150 for round trip.

title: beautiful
review: beautiful garden with lovely flowers...very serene,,, not very far from the mall road... mainly for kids..

title: Complete package for Family visit
review: Properly maintained garden with nice places for photo shoot as well as for fun. It has artificially made lake for boating and few rides for kids enjoyment. The wax museum in food court was awesome. Must visit place in Rikshaw to enjoy mussorie

title: Ok just like other gardens
review: This is good and you can go at least once. Nothing special and like other gardens only. You should at least have one photo there for your memories.

title: Well maintained gardens for All
review: The garden is well maintained with varieties of flowers and bushes.There is a boating area with boating available throughout the day.A toy train for kids and waterfall for photography.Good canteen area serving all types of snacks & icecreams.

title: A good place
review: This is a good place to visit in mussorie. It ha nothing extra ordinary to offer but it gives a good scenic beauty. very well maitained garden and well organised. I could sit there for a while longer. this place is closer to mall road.

title: For Flower Lovers
review: Good maintained garden. There are variety of flowers and bushes. Good scenic beauty and there is also a wax museum, The food quality in restaraunt is average.

title: Kid's Garden
review: Excellent place if you have small kids with you,the kids will definetly enjoy and you can easily spend 2 hours.

title: Normal flowers nursery
review: Normal garden with flowers nursery, boating facilities, unhygienic food facilities, funny haunted house show.

title: Flowers & much more
review: Situated at a little distance from the city, this is a well maintained garden with many varieties of flowers.

title: Beautiful place
review: Nice place to enjoy happy moments with the kids n family...must visit if u come to mussoorie...

title: Good for time pass
review: Good place to spend some time walking and sitting around. Garden is beautiful and has lots of rides, eating areas and a small water fall as well.

title: Nothing great
review: This is just an average artificial garden , commercialized and not big enough for it to stand out. If u have been to gardens in ooty or even Bangalore, u can give this a skip or plan for an hour max.

title: Mrs Usha
review: It's a very small garden, with a very small wax museum. There is not much to see but as a tourist you can spend some time there and relax in the restaurant having snacks

title: Break time for a family at Mussoorie
review: It is a nice place with gardens with lots of variety of flowers, fountains, restaurants, fun and games for children and a 'not so good' wax museum. one can spent one or two hours roaming around enjoy the beauty of colours.

title: A good place to visit with kids
review: This is a must visit place if you are traveling to Mussoorie and have kids with you. There are multiple attractions (all outdoor) for kids including toy train, rides, etc. There is a small place for boating as well. The restaurant in the garden serves good vegetarian food.

title: Attraction for entire family
review: The best thing about Company garden is that there is something for the entire family. For the kids there are train rides, boating and other joy rides. For the adults there are beautifully maintained gardens, fountains and the wax museum. There is also artificial waterfall and a glass house with good succulents collection. It is best to go early before the crowds start swarming the place. Well maintained, the flowers are a delight .

title: Serene and Beautiful
review: The place is very well maintained with lovely beautiful colorful roses, hibiscus and lots of different flowers. The falls and the view from the top is also very good.

title: Good to visit
review: Visited today. The garden is well maintained but requires some more flower trees. The wax museum is not at all at its excel. Some of the figures are not at all recognisable unless it is written their. The food court is good. The quality of the food is very good. The price is reasonable. Overall worth to visit.

title: Good spot for spending 2 hours with family
review: Nice picnic place with small water falls, place for boating, scenic beauty, shops, swings for kids etc, must visit if you are in Mussoorie

title: Green!
review: Good place to visit, accessible from Gandhi Chowk by cycle rickshaws - a ride not for the faint hearted! Wax museum nearby has many exhibits..

title: good to visit
review: nice place to visit full of greenery. it have waterfall also. in it there is haunted house. it also have WAX MUSEUM . which is not good. the wax character doesn't look same at all. they are very very different. they have games which are chargeable also .

title: Good place for children
review: I travelled with my 3 year old baby and family. He enjoyed a lot and was happy to see a lot of varieties of flowers.

title: Perfect picnic spot!!
review: This place can be considered as the best picnic spot while you are with your family or friends. This place offers beautiful collection of flowers with great entertainment facilities for kids.

title: Pleasant walk
review: One of the most visited places in Mussorie  company garden  surprisingly well maintained , it was heartening to see railings painted and not litter within the garden , the flower collection is good and lawns are well maintained , some additional attractions like wax museum are also available ,there is a nominal entry fee of about ₹ 20 , the parking a is ₹ 50 /-  worth an early morning visit before the crowds .

title: beautiful 360 degree
review: Its very beautiful place,peaceful and feel so connected to nature.

title: Nothing new
review: This is a garden which has nothing new to offer except beautiful flowers. It is commercialized by different hawkers. People can pass their time clicking photos with flowers,  fall etc. Boating is also very ordinary type. There is wax museum which is at many tourist places. Me and my  wife just pass the time. We got literally bored.

title: Company garden visit
review: Nice variety of flowers. There was snowfall the earlier day so the place was covered with snow which added to the beauty. Overall good experience

title: Company garden
review: Nice garden with great collection of flowers. It's not far from Mall Road. Should be on your list for Mussoorie

title: Beautiful Flowers
review: Company is located around 8 kms from Mall Road. Me and my wife travelled in tricycle auto from Mall road to Company. The scenic beauty of the journey is excellent.

title: Serene garden
review: The Company garden is a popular place for tourists visiting the queen of hills.

title: good place to visit
review: very good place to visit in mussorie. very near to mall road Library chock.. this is the place where you have reached without taking costly car higher in mussorie...you will spend lot of time of your day at mussoorie.

title: NOT WORTH IT!!
review: When I heard about the company garden, I was really happy to know that Company Garden here referred to East India Company and a garden from that time was still preserved.Not only that all through our way to company garden we saw huge billboards advertising a "Wax Museum" in Mussoorie and it made me all the more excited to go there.

title: Excellent place to see the beauty of the flowers
review: Company  Garden in Mussorie is about 7-8 miles from the Library, on the way you will pass the IAS Lal Bahadur Institute , where all our brightest young officers are taught , the future to Adminstrate india and run the country , then after a few km we reached the garden , we were in cycle rickshaws , the garden was beautiful in brilliant colors , looked like a planned English Garden , a lovely place to click photographs , a guide is available , I used the guide to click photos with my camera , his knowledge of getting the best shots with the best flowers is incredible , we then went to some waterfalls where we took some incredible shots , as you walk a few hundred meters you come to the children and adult rides in the merry go around. And the Ferris wheel, I tried them and had a ball , remembering my childhood , the guide also took our photos on the Ferris wheel , then you come out , and there are some shops selling Parathad , hot , which are delicious , we passed some shops but what caught my eye was shops selling magic trick for children , very very interesting

title: Garden with beautiful flowers
review: It is around 5.5 KM from library chowk.  You can take cycle riksha from mall road to reach there. You can get the entry by paying Rs. 18 for entry ticket. Inside the garden there are different small sections of different flowers.  You will see roses of many colors.

title: The Only Garde in Mussoorie
review: Visit this place only if you are found of gardens. Otherwise there is nothing special in here. There are a few good food joints over here. The only thing I liked in the garden is the bull fight.

title: nice place
review: on kemty fall road well maintained with beauty full flowers best picture place its for all kids, family , couple . i enjoyed lots the riding of polaris motorbike.

title: Nice Park with beautiful flower, Wax Museum and Play area
review: Visited this place with family. It is nearly 5 KM from Mall Road. It was not in our itinerary but visited due to curiosity and it became one of the best place we have visited in Mussorie. Lots of different colour flowers - mainly Roses. It also has small fall which is good for taking pictures. Wax Museum has more than 20 vax statues...It was Ok...Food and ice cream served at Food court are good. Children can also enjoy in rides. Overall Nice place.

title: a good time pass
review: beautiful garden very well maintained by the muncipal corporation. variety of flowers and also some eateries built inside for quick bite.

title: A short break on way back from Kempty falls
review: We visited company garden on way back from Kempty falls. It isnicely maintained. The adjoining mountain with huge plantation  adds to the beauty of it. There are some electronic toys for children to enjoy rides and a restaurant to have some tea and snacks.
