title: Nothing exceptional
review: Nothing to enjoy but best to click pictures . boating is there in dirty water.  Overall, I didn't  enjoy much after having a long walk to this place.

title: Good option for bit of fun
review: Good flower garden.. good amount of activities for kids..

title: Awesome place for kids
review: Lots of activities to do at one place. Kids had fun on rides and jhoola. A must go place for kids in Mussorrie

title: Much smaller for all the hype
review: If you compare Company garden with botanical garden at few other hill stations then its too small and doesn't come any close but if you are in Mussoorie for a leisure trip and have low expectations then you may have good relaxed half a day here enjoying small things like dart games, horror shows, wax museum, etc.

title: Okay okay place to visit
review: Since you dont have too many options in mussoorie...this place can be visited.

title: Company garden
review: Beautiful place. Has a decent restaurant and other eateries. Children like the swing that is manually operated by boys. Haunted house was mundane.

title: Company Garden
review: This garden has a beautiful flower nursery along with amusement rides for children. It also has a wax museum, where they charge 100 bucks per person which is not worth I guess. Overall a place for family and couples only.

title: A Refreshing Place to visit
review: Company Garden is a place which I would recommend strongly for to visit. I am told the name Company Garden has its origin linked to East India Company. The Garden is beautiful and when we visited there were lots and lots of flowers on bloom around and in the nursery. The place has a fountain, waterfall, and other  facilities which could be of interest to kids, like boating, rides,etc. It also has good restaurants, and a clean toilet facility. Good place to spend a couple of hours.

title: O. K...
review: The Company garden has a lot of flowers and a nursery too. The layout of the garden is good. There are fountain and waterfall and a small man made water body where boating facility is available. For children there are amusement rides for which one has to pay. Also a Wax museum where entry fee is payable.A food joint inside the garden serves good food. A place to while away your time during your holiday.

title: Fabulous variety and display of flowers
review: Fabulous variety and display of flowers. Good place for some cost effective entertainment for small kids too.

title: Well Maintained and Great Place if you have kids
review: Properly maintained garden with lot of eating options. Joy rides available for kids. Quite corners for couples or peace seeking people.

title: Company garden visit
review: Small garden with beautiful  flowera and a small waterfall. Has a small pond too very boating . Must visit

title: Good well maintained garden
review: Small but good and well maintained garden. Clean surroundings. Some shops and wax museum in the premises. There is also a small waterfall at other end of the garden providing nice view for a photograph

title: Small garden good for kids
review: Company garden is small garden with Boating facylity.

title: Average place
review: Much better parks available in OOTY or Nainital. Good to spend less then 60 Minutes, not much activities for Adults.

title: Average Garden with Wax museum
review: Company garden is located near to mussorie around 5 km from Mall road. Hand pulled rickshaw are available from Mall road. Garden is average with boating facility. Some shops are there in garden. Wax museum is the main attraction in company garden. Entrance fee is Rs 100 per person.

title: Good
review: Well I wont say its must visit but you may. the wax museum is good. If you havent visited wax museums before it could be a start

title: Breathtaking
review: Wonderful people and view! The DSLR cafe was great! Mountain view was mesmerising. The oaks were gradually replaced by conifers as you go up. And not forgetting the ever bending roads.

title: Kids had fun
review: It was an ok garden. Nothing much. The kids enjoyed the rides. At least it wasn't as crowded as the kemptyfalls.

title: Only Visit, If you love flowers.
review: It is simply a garden (although a variety of flora is maintained) which is more of an amusement park, having a couple of fun rides. Not a "Not to be missed location" but worth a visit.

title: Company Garden - flower heaven!
review: Well maintained garden with lovely displays of flowers. Nice place to hang out with family, kids etc. Accessible from Mall road. Rickshaws ply as well. Nature lovers and easily spend 2 to 3 hours admiring various plants and flowers. A small wax museum in the area as well, which we did not visit. Worth visit.

title: average garden
review: There is nothing so British about this place. It is modern day small park with few rides and amenities. commercial tourist stuff.

title: Small but good place to visit
review: Small garden with nice flower display. Worth a visit while you are in mussoorie. Wont take more that 1/2 hour to see the entire place.

title: photographers paradise
review: the best place to klick pics ... wonderful backgrounds full of greenery and flowers

title: Average place.
review: This place is for couples who are on their honeymoon in Mussorie. This is just my opinion.

title: A garden with a soul
review: Company garden is located close to LBS acedamy in Mussoorie.  Its a well maintained landscaped garden with pergolas, flower themed arenas. It has a food court which offers variety of Indian continental and Chinese food. Company garden also houses wax museum which houses wax statues of celebrity figures. However it's entry charges are separate @INR 100/- Adult.  The garden also houses make shift hotels for food though not upto the mark and needs major improvements. The garden has good collection of flowers both trees and shrubs ground cover etc. Good place for photo enthusiastic travellers as well as previously wedding shoots.

title: Wide range of botany
review: This botanical garden has a large range of flower varieties and it is very well maintained by the state government

title: Nice changes made
review: The nature in the garden continues to be enchanting but some of the man-made additions have been changed. The Wax museum isn't all that great though!

title: Garden with small water fall and wax museum..
review: Garden with colorfull flowers... Waterfall.. Good scenic beauty.. Entry ticket required..But the things sold are costlier than Gunhill..

title: Just for fun
review: A good place to visit. But with time it is getting too crowded. Moreover with lot of rush in Mussoorie it is difficult travelling. Still a good place to visit along with children.

title: Beautiful Place, Perfect for a Day's Outing
review: Company's Garden is the hidden gem of Mussorie. This place has everything that you can ask for. From the serpentine road through the hills that takes you here, to the stunning array for flora, a small lake for boating, restaurants, wax museum, rides and waterfall, Company Garden is a great option to spend your day, without getting bored.

title: Well Maintained Garden
review: Good place for Kids to play & everyone.

title: Very repetitive palce....no changes
review: This place is little boring for a person like me who is so much fond of nature. There are same old flowers with same old restaurants providing typical maggi or parantha.

title: Activities and Flowers
review: The company garden has a nice assortment of flowers, though at the time we went they were not in full bloom yet. There are a few attractions (rides) as well as boating accross a rather small artificial lake.

title: Must See in Mussorie
review: One the most beautiful thing to see in mussorie. I had taken photo's there and enjoy local food. boating is also available. feel like we are on vacation. must see spot in mussorie

title: Leisure
review: It is created place for outdoors in mussoorie,  nothing so great about it but considering fewer options one can visit

title: Good family fun!
review: The place is fun for all in the family. Boating, food, rides, everything was enjoyable.We had stayed there for almost 4 hours so that everyone could spent good time there.

title: Ok Ok
review: Worth going once as it has fountain and small waterfall. Good place to enjoy scenic view of valley over Lunch

title: Colourful getaway
review: A not very far-off attraction from Mall road where you can easily spend hours admiring the valley view or the botanical garden, plant and flower nursery, or even enjoy a shikara ride in the park. There's a mini waterfall that attracts the bulk of the visitors and there are enough grub joints inside the park to eat if you get hungry. (There's even an indoor food-court which has fair choice of cuisine). Overall very well maintained with a fairly priced entry charge. Ideal amount of time to spend here: 1.5-2 hours.

title: Good family spot
review: company garden is a nice  spot for family. you will love the vast variety of flowers. Children will love boating in small pools.you can visit this place with your parents or whole family. Many activities are available for all age groups.to visit there you can have shared taxi or Rikshaw from mall road.

title: Nice Garden
review: Its a noce small garden offering good photo opportunities besides artificial water fall & numerous variety of flowers. It also offers boat ride on a small artificial water body

title: Good place
review: Not into flowers and gardening so not really in a position to appreciate, but there are plenty of varieties here that are good to look at. Decent place to check out with the family.

title: Mussoorie visit
review: Average garden, however Nice Variety of flowers and a small man-made fall. Visit if you have already seen other attractions.

title: Floral wonderland
review: Its an average place..nicely done gardens, never seen before flowers and a warmth of subtle sun rays. The company garden is a refreshing break from the hustle n bustle of mall road..their are good rides for kids and adults. Their are few eating joints but I would recommend the food court for obvious reasons..the biggest turn off for me were the photographers!,!!! It was irritating...

title: Beautiful Flowers
review: The garden is well maintained and has beautiful flowers planted all around. The garden also has a wax museum.

title: Company garden
review: Coompany garden is the another gem of mussorie.i visited it with my family.lovely gardening,tibeten little market outside the garden and offcourse beautiful view of the lakes.increase the beauty of garden.wow!

title: Nice place
review: If You wanna spend some great time with your partner this place is the good option

title: Bakwaas
review: Dont visit here

title: Great Place to spend with family.
review: Located little far from Library Chowk. Very nicely maintained. Entry fee is minimum - Rs.18/- per person. Great selection of flora and fauna. One  could enjoy boat ride inside the park. Food court is well managed and affordable. One could visit the Wax Museum situated inside the Park. entry Fee is Rs.100/-. Please try the ATV Bikes available for short ride outside park against a nominal charge.

title: Best way spend your time "Nice Place"
review: Such a nice place for outing. Good environment, children park,  boating and other exiting game. Good eating & shopping place.

title: Only nursery is worth it !!
review: It's like a normal park and I fail to understand why is this on one of the things to do as it has nothing worth the time with exception to the nursery where you can't buy any plants !! But if you love flowers do go to the nursery.

title: Garden with activities
review: This is located near library bazar. Good place to visit with kids. Lots of activities and well maintained garden. There is a boat ride and toy train for kids. lots of open space and a nursery. One time visit for family and nature lovers.

title: Nothing interesting to do
review: Nothing of much interest here, unless you go as a couple/family and just want to sit and talk, in which case it seems ok. Even then, the gang of "photographers" who pester you to take "scenic" photographs follow you around and trouble you. Strictly average place.

title: Nice Picnic Spot..But many more better places to go in Mussoroie
review: Company Garden as the name says is a big garden with beautiful flowers. The garden located on hill top with long green trees forming a canopy. The place has small rides for both adults and children. Carousel/ merry go round type ride for kids. Big swing boat ride for both kids and adults. There is a horror/scary house for people. Its not really scary or great, but kids might enjoy it.

title: Waste of money
review: Only food court & very small boating area.

title: Nothing's there unless you have kids who can play there
review: The garden is another place of looting the tourist. Everything  is expensive  there nothing  for a normal person  even the dhaba like eateries are so expensive. Only attraction is the false waterfall and the flowers.

title: Ordinary
review: Just ordinary,kids or Young ones may enjoy. One can avoid and save money and time to spend on some other activities.

title: Not worth visit
review: This is one of those attraction which you should keep if you are visiting Mussoorie for more than 2 days.

title: Nature
review: Company garden is the beautiful and the best place to visit near Mussorie

title: Nice Garden for Family
review: This garden is near to Mussoorie Mall.It has a artificial Fountains and Flowers.It has special garden especially for flowers but Photography is prohibited.Wax Museum is good.It has many shops with good quality.Some more improvement is required.Overall it is good for relaxation.

title: Public Park
review: A popular relaxation destination for tourists, though both my wife and I found it over rated. There is a restaurant in the premises that could do with more hygiene, and better quality food. There is a wax museum which is unfortunately quite an apology. The flowers are quite ordinary.

title: Nice garden, with few rides & boating
review: Company Garden is a garden, about 2-3 km away from Mussorie. Few rides along with boating are available.

title: Beautiful Garden
review: Just 4 km from main stream,one can reach on foot beside than own conveyance even rickshaw puller can drop u here,one can see different type of flowers and fountains beside than food court to enjoy

title: Nothing much
review: Its a quiet park. Can't call this as amusement park as there is nothing much here what an adult can do. Plant Nursery. Couple of rides for kids, small boating area a haunted house. But you can get plenty of food. As they have couple of shops and a dedicated food court too. It was fair but I don't think I will visit there again.

title: Very badly maintained
review: We went to visit this garden with lots of excitement but we're so disappointed after seeing the dirtiness.

title: Worthless
review: Just dont waste your time going there. There is a wax museum inside the gardens. Just dont get fooled by the adverts, it is useless.

title: GARDEN WITH GRACE
review: This garden is about five kilometers from the musoorrie , it is a great experience for the natural beauty and charming fountain, one can enjoy the boating which is chargeable, there is also an entry fees , , beatiful nursery of many flowers is inside.

title: Nice Garden.
review: This is a well maintained garden. A small water falls is also there. A wax museum whose ticket price is 50 RS also there. I found best restaurants in there.

title: Mussoorie..!!
review: A place to enjoy with friends n family..!! Lots of things to do here. A place full for fun n enjoyment. Rides for children as well as for adults make it very much entertaining. A place one must visit once..!!

title: Beautiful garden
review: beautifully maintained with a small lake (with boating), a waterfall, a huge food court with excellent views and a wax museum, you can easily spend 2 hours here. check out the quad-bikes

title: Great family picnic
review: Company garden offers you beautiful gardens, kids entertainment, wax meuseum, fountains, boating, waterfall, food....pheeew! Yes its a complete package for your ultimate family outing. Highly recommended.

title: Visit something else
review: So if you're planning to go company garden and you are a couple or you are with your friends I will not recommend this to you is the activities which are there all children's oriented.

title: Bad experience
review: Totally disappointing. Plastic flowers have been tightened in trees. There is a water park in all places which kills the scenic beauties of mountains and trees. No maintenance at all, very untidy

title: A great place to spend leisure time
review: The garden has everything..from a waterfal to artificial lake ..from 100's of species of flowers to various activities..its a much better place than mussorie lake!

title: Blossom of flowers
review: Walk down and visit this place if you are a walk lover...good place to hangout ....avoid weekends as it's too crowded

title: An idyllic break with family
review: This is a lovely green belt with beautifully landscaped lawns, a waterfall and even a little pond for boating... throw in a food court to unwind and have some hot snack and the sitting is ideal for some quality time spent with family

title: Very beautiful garden . Must visit place .
review: This garden is very beautiful with full of attractions . flora is at high peak in this garden. There re many things to do and to see . But like many places of uttrakhand there is no arrangement of security for eve teasers and the nonsense persons . This is a family garden but some sikh punjabi men were abusing here for they are famous for loudly in front of the families . These type of people have to banned here . Sikh punjabi men are famous for there idiot behaviour everywhere .

title: Can be missed
review: Located 5 kms from Gandhi chowk, company garden has all the required entertainment for a family. This includes haunted house, play area for kids, restaurants and waterfalls

title: Nice Visit
review: It is a cool place, where you can find some respite from the hyper activity of Mall Road Mussoorie. It has an excellent wax museum with a small waterfall and some flowers. Overall nice visit

title: Really nice place
review: It's approx 3 km from Mall Road and very charming destination specially for honeymoon couples.Really it's worth visit here and you can enjoy the walk to this destination.

title: good place for kids
review: it has activities for kids( babies) rides suitable for them...they also have boating here which you can enjoy..average place to go with family

title: Good place to visit
review: AS we visited in January, flora was not great. Good recreational area for children with haunted house, boating and other attractions

title: Simply pathetic
review: The garden has entry fee on INR 18 per head and exorbitant parking charges of INR 100.  However once one enter no sign of greeneries,  lack on maintenance and few annoying hawkers insisting to take photos with local costume. Will advice to skip.

title: lots of greenery
review: about 3 kms from library chowk, the municipal gardens or the company gardens as it is called has a small park,  a small lake for boating, some rides for the kids. can be avoided if you have seen similar gardens in other hill stations.

title: Better skipped..
review: It could be one of the sightseeing spots in Musoorie around 5 km from Mall Road.

title: Good Place
review: You can see variety of trees and plant in the garden. Its a good place for the visit and person can relax over there

title: Good during spring
review: Good during spring but not for the winters.

title: After tiring day - A paratha shop just outside the company garden must try
review: A good place to visit after getting tired for whole day visit of the city, a green garden having nursery inside, beautiful flowers, tall trees and water fall, good for clicks, a paratha shop just ouside the company garden must try a chilly evening and garam parathas.

title: Lookable park
review: A good park in mussoorie you have to visit this park in evening and a good boat riding and for children's here's you find some good rides for kids

title: way to the company garden is excellent
review: i went there and i think it is very good choice the way to the garden is very nice beautifull

title: Nice Place
review: Another nice place to visit specially for children. There is a Wax museum inside it and lots of rides and toys. Has a nice little water falls. Also has a food station.

title: Good scenic beauty, flowers and vax museum
review: Different types of flowers, good for pic lovers, vax museum(entry fees around Rs. 100), eating options. You can try, if you have time elapsed in your bucket.

title: Company garden way of earning money
review: It's a grand with a entry fee. When you enter in garden other activity chargeable separately just like boating, wax museum etc..... place is very small. West of money.

title: Good time pass
review: It's good time pass for small children

title: Not much to talk of
review: It was a smallish garden with a few basic activities. We liked the flowers, trees and foliage, and walking through in the sun (as it was cold). But the activities were not great. You wont miss much of you dont visit here.

title: company garden visit
review: Company garden was visited by me in second week of december. It was fall so no flowers or greenery... its average place to hang out, we had chole bhature from resturant inside. There is one wax museum which is not worth at all to spend 100 bucks per person.

title: A must-visit at Mussorie
review: This is an excellent spot at Mussorie to spend some quality time with your dear ones. They garden is well-maintained. There are enough games for keeping the kids busy. There are a number of restaurants inside the garden but the main restaurant in the middle is the best. This is pure vegetarian but you will really enjoy the food. There is also a small lake inside the garden in which you can do some boating. A few water-falls, an excellent nursery etc etc. On the way to this garden, you can also see Lal Bahadur Shastri Institute of Civil Services.

title: Can avoid in December
review: Not really a well maintained place. Not much to see too. We'll expected a lot as mentioned in the reviews.

title: Average place to visit!!!
review: Around 4-5 km from famous Mall Road in Mussoorie.

title: Peaceful
review: A major picnic location in Mussoorie, Company Garden is a colourful garden located at 3 km from The Mall. Also known as the garden of flowers

title: A waste of time
review: The garden is a sheer waste of time, poorly maintained and not much to explore. You can easily skip it and enjoy elsewhere.

title: Can be Skipped
review: Nothing so great about the garden, can be skipped for something else. In off season even the way to waterfall is closed.

title: Company Garden- An Amusement Park
review: Comprising Numerous Plants And Variety Of Colorful Flowers, Company Garden Is One Of The Most Alluring Gardens That Are Located In Mussoorie. The Place Is Best For Family And Couples.The Place Also Has A Mini Lake That Has A Small And Artificial Waterfall That Adds To Its Beauty And Richness

title: Waste of time
review: Please please do not visit this place. It's a cheap filthy place. It stinks.

title: Tacky, dated amusement park, not really a garden
review: We decided to visit when out walking in the area. Wished we hadn't even bothered going in - its just a front for a number of tacky amusements, rides, shops and so on. Hardly any actual gardens to speak of. Very poor indeed.

title: Only for kids
review: It's an extremely small garden with absolutely nothing much to watch. More of entertainment for kids. Has a small nursery.

title: Greenery..Greenery..Greenery..!!!! + Wax museum
review: Company garden is near to mall road and can be covered any time of the day. The place has definitely maintained its hygiene and food court in the mid is also nice. You will find lots of picturesque places where you can click 'n' number of selfies and pictures, An artificial waterfall is beauty to watch. The best part was the newly made wax museum.Though the entrance fees seemed bit higher but worth a visit.

title: A miniature botanical garden...
review: This is a mini botanical garden....few 100+ years trees and a nice nursery of exotic flowers.... attractions for kids as plenty of activities for them....the ride from the Mall Road by cycle rick offered quite good close view of the snow peaks and surrounding valleys.

title: place is decent to spend an hour
review: wax museum here is good, restraurants are also good, prathas are must try here in the comapny garden restaurant

title: Overhyped place..
review: Company Garden is just like a normal garden that you must have visited in your city. It's a little chilly area, maybe a degree or two less than Mall Road.

title: Nice place to visit.
review: It is a good garden to visit once if you are in Mussoorie. Addition of a good restaurant and wax museum has added a lot of value to this place.

title: Beautiful garden
review: Nice garden just 7 kms away from the Mall road.They have a nice wax museum ,& a very small boating area basically for children. They also have some fun games for children.

title: Nothing exceptional but the scenic beauty!!
review: This place is good to go in the evening times as the weather and view is good; otherwise the place is just another garden.

title: Can be skipped
review: The garden does not have much to offer except for a few photographs and a few gift shops. Although its well maintained and is lush green (as evidenced by sudden drop in temperatures inside the garden), it is just plain boring. Can be skipped, from the tour itinerary.

title: Too cold
review: It was too cold for my small kids. So zoomed in n out quickly.we were litttle late in evening so didn't get enuff tym to explore it.

title: I loved it
review: Very nice garden. I loved it very much. I went there on my birthday. It was great experience. Happy to go there.

title: Good for family outing
review: Good place to enjoy your day.have few kids activity and few small tea joints.waterfall is artificial.

title: A hangout place surrounded by greenery!
review: The one thing that will attract the masses is the green environment. Its a well structured and beautifully decorated garden, with flowers, fountains and artificial water falls. It also has a food court and a wax museum. Basically it is a one stop spot to roam around, enjoy the greenery and spend some time relaxing amidst the refreshing weather.

title: Not worthy
review: Just wax museum inside is good.and photography can be done.nothing much for kids also.a good food court is inside.

title: Avoidable place
review: There is very little flower or other attraction. You can avoid going to this place and save time. The restaurant inside is decent, so if you are hungry or tired you can visit this place otherwise avoid.

title: Beautiful Garden
review: It's a very beautiful Garden has verify Plants. Good to see at least once. Well arranged plantations and staff do hard work to maintain the Garden.

title: Decent garden to spend some time
review: Went to Company Garden primarily because it was super close to our hotel - locally well known but nothing to really write home about. Is more a local picnic spot (with attractions like a haunted house, ethnic wear photography, small eateries) than a garden per se.

title: Best place of Mussorie to hang out
review: It has everything.. Lake, boating, waterfall, flowers and lotz of restaurant.. avoid the wax musuem unless you need to see it.. Not far from Mall road.. a must visit place..

title: Please avoid
review: If you are from Mumbai and have been to any public garden there, you can certainly avoid this place. Feels like one of the BMC Gardens that was started with lot of fanfare and has now aged considerably! Nothing there is exciting and we cane back feeling terrible.

title: An OK place to visit, though kids can enjoy the rides and the boat ride.
review: It is a little far away from the town, but since there isn't much to do in Mussoorie you might as well visit this place. It has a small garden full of flowers, small waterfall , and a small lake where you can do boating, plus rides.

title: Just a garden nothing spectacular
review: Don't bother to visit as it's average, the locals just want to take photos to sell to you and not much to see. There's an artificial waterfall that's a nice feature and children's play area needs updating.

title: Interesting
review: Not bad and worth a visit. Could do with being cleaner and updated in parts. Still an oasis in the mountain.

title: Fresh air and beautiful flowers
review: Nothing extraordinary but a calm and peaceful place to spend some time. fresh air and beautiful flowers all over.

title: Refresing walks
review: I visited ths place after 12 yrs, it ws worth visiting, lots of development hs been undergone. Wax statue museum ws grt bt can miss it. Lot of games fr children.

title: Not maintained
review: It's okay for time pass. The entry fee is 18 rupees....there is a wax museum.... cleanliness is disgusting

title: One must visit the Garden
review: Very nicely been maintained.

title: A Normal garden
review: After reading reviews (must visit etc) in various travel forum, i decided to spend some time here during my visit to Mussoorie in Nov'16.

title: Small, but full of family activies
review: Decently maintained old garden. Probably developed by British . Has a small water fall n fountain. Children play area and boat rides etc.

title: Pristine
review: Serene garden by the mountain side with flowers blooming. Quiet and peaceful.Nice place to spend a lazy afternoon.Good food court inside.

title: Good For Fun if on 2 to 3 days trip
review: We went with our parents, its good and advisable only if you have atleast two days in your kitty otherwise can be avoided as it does not have anything unique. Its a kind of park with option of various games and activities. Yes you can click few photographs in local dresses. Wax museum in this park is okay but the fee charged is too high for the kind of display available. Its 100 inr per person. It has various wax models, of various world personalities. But disappointed to see hitler, saddam hussain and Benjeer bhuto statues i think they don't deserve to be there for kind of their approach towards humanity. The wax models are also not like originals, they look more like mannequines. Lots of activites for Kids. Parking for car is available

title: Small and nice
review: The company garden is a small cute place. Mostly to take photos between the green plants. The boating are is very small. There are shops inside if you wish to buy souvenirs.

title: Go if you have extra time
review: This place can be at a very low priority in your itinerary. Nice flower nursery to see and nothing much there...

title: Beautiful Place to Click photographs
review: The garden is beautiful and full of flowers. A very nice place to click a few good photographs with your family and friends

title: Small Garden
review: its a small garden approx 3 kms from mussoorie library chowk

title: Good Place
review: Good Place with lots of tourists. You can click photo in traditional dress. You will see variety of flowers there.

title: A well maintained with few fun rides
review: Its a huge garden with many variety of flowers blooming. This gives garden a nice scenic and fresh view. The garden also has few rides for the children and some for adults too like Bull riding, Overall a must visit place for Family and couple tourists.

title: A nice place to spend 2 to 3 hours
review: Beautiful nursery of flowering plants. General quality of upkeep was poor. The wax museum was terrible. None of the wax models had any close resemblance to the people they were intended to represent.

title: Fun time at Company Garden, Mussoorie
review: Company Garden is a must visit place if you are travelling with kids, because kids would enjoy most of the things here.

title: Cramped Garden
review: It is small garden cramped with rides , restaurants and pool like pond.

title: Is it "#3 of 37 things to do in Mussoorie" ?
review: Off-course no, It has nothing - have more flowers in my garden. Why they have entry fees - why they have nothing to show?

title: Poorly maintained!
review: Huge disappointment! The garden is poorly maintained.hardly any flowers. Not worth the visit. You can take a cycle rickshaw from mall road if required.

title: Fun time
review: I had a nice time visiting this place. Lovely colorful gardens and fountains in the middle of it.. Picture perfect views. They have a green house full of colorful flowers. Visitors are not allowed to touch any plant. We found so many varieties of flowers. Negative : no photography allowed inside green house :( There is a small artificial fountain. Ppl take a lot of photographs there. Small boating area where I found couples enjoying their sweet time. Wax museum is average. They have a huge capacity restaurant. They serve decent food. But overall... a wonderful lifetime experience.

title: Only for children
review: As the name suggets, it is a garden with many rides and activities for young kids only.

title: Good scenic view of flowers as well as fun activities
review: as i have mentioned company garden is good place to watch in mussorie, having boating, Wax museum and also some fun activities

title: Lovely Garden Worth Visiting
review: Nicely maintained garden with lots of amusement rides and boating. There is a nice Food Court which serves delicious vegetarian food.

title: A VERY WELL MAINTAINED HUGE GARDEN
review: A little far from mall roan Company Garden is one of the main attraction in Mussoorie. We casually walked this distance from mall road and enjoyed a lot that few hours walk. This beautifully maintained garden also have several exiting rides both for the children and the adults. We enjoyed the rides apart from eating in the cafeteria inside the Company Garden.

title: Nice visit
review: Nice garden and well maintained place. There is a Wax museum too where they have 8-10 wax figures.There are other amusement parks too for children. We enjoyed the garden especially.

title: Panorama
review: It is a must visit place in mussoorie.. such natural beauty.. u gotta visit the place to experience the enchanting surroundings..

title: Nice compact place for entertainment
review: A beautiful fall,a wax museum,boat riding,good restaurant ,place for kid entertainment etc.In nutshell a good place to be in.,

title: Nice beutiful place
review: Place is nice, but I have a complaint against The Kashmiri Stall . The person sitting there requested to come inside their stall. They showed a article for Rs 13000/= including five Gift items ,and pressurized us to buy. When we said we will think over they started misbehaving.

title: Nice garden but very small.
review: Nice garden but it will end once u will start enjoying it. It has some rides also for kids and one wax museum also.

title: Avoid, waste of time and energy
review: Just a garden with joy rides. Waste of time and energy, not much to do unless you want to picnic or take pics in traditional attire.

title: Don't bother going
review: An absolute abomination! Horrible place. A beautiful garden completely ruined with shanty shops selling rubbish and some awful plastic rides.

title: Good rikshaw ride destination!
review: you may read others point of views but really its person wise, for me n my husband as we stayed at the fortune the savoy , this was just a rickshaw ride away with 20 min travel time , seeing some amazing sites from the rickshaw viewing the valley the hills the clouds passing by your face in speed and the open rickshaw brings another level of exp to it, he charged us Rs 260 for a round trip as per the Union rate which is written as well on their charts , in this he will wait for you as well.

title: Kids only place
review: As d name suggests it's a public garden with nicely maintained lawns and decent flowers. It's got two water features ( fountain & waterfall) and a Tiny bating area for kids. Some small rides & a wax museum that can easily be given a miss. The only reason to go there is if you have small kids who will definitely have a good time running around and taking the joyrides.

title: best place for relax
review: a small garden, children playing area, flowers garden, food park .....means full enjoy and relax at one place

title: Nice place to visit
review: This garden is a nice place to visit, it also has a Wax museum which is average. If are fond of flowers and gardens you might enjoy the visit too.

title: Nice Garden For Kids n Their Parents Too....
review: A well maintained garden,Park offers some very good rides at cheap prices,Best for family picnic. Specially best for childrens lot of things to do there. Jhulas, boating, bull fight and artificial fall lots of flowers, Food of Food Court Was Also Awesome... Overall A Must Visit Place....

title: Nice Place
review: Company Garden comes in the way if your travelling to kempty falls.. its a nice garden with beautiful flowers, and a fountain and a water fall in place lovely place to enjoy. it has a restaurant inside where you can have a good view of Mussoorie Mountains range and pine forest. there are also many rides for youth and boating which is actually too small for the price that they charge. there is an entry fee to the garden .. overall a good place to visit once if your in mussoorie for a couple of days and you have visited many other places nearby mussoorie.

title: Pretty Average
review: Not up to the hype of a beautiful garden.

title: Beautiful.
review: This is a beautiful garden.  The flowers were awesome.  So picturesque. It is a must see site in Musoorie.

title: Beautiful garden
review: This not one of the best places but then it is really pretty. If you think of the most Romatic nature's and yet family place in Mussoorie then this is it.

title: fun filled garden
review: a great escape for family with kids having good rides, water falls and a great wax museum. good food outlets and great place to go very closed to library square

title: Full of flowers & greenery !
review: Very well maintained and huge garden . It has a Wax museum , boating area , restaurants , food stalls , fountains , waterfalls , separate area which is loaded with flowers. A must visit tourist spot.

title: Walk to Garden
review: The company garden can be reached by walking on the kempty road for entry of INR 20/- was worth to visit because of lots of fun and flowers with water fall and other entertainment like wax museum.There are variety of flowers can be found which is worth watching and the main attraction was the water fall for visitor to photo shoot.There are food stall inside the park with sitting benches.

title: nice garden
review: its a man made garden with a variety flowers and plants a fountain, small waterfall, a restaurant and few rides. boating is also available the pond is too much as compared to the price. the garden is good to visit once restaurant is located at a place where you can  get a good view of mussoorie and the hills and forest

title: A nice Garden
review: This is a nice garden with a lot of flowers to add to its beauty, visited by a lot of people in the evening .

title: nice place
review: I have loved to visit this place whenever i am in mussoorie and usually take a walk to garden from sterling resort

title: nice garden and wax museum at company garden
review: an all in one place....has a beautiful garden, a good restaurant, kids play area and wax museum! A must see on a visit to mussorie. Only wish that the approach road to company garden would have been better

title: A small park that has a lot of things to expereince
review: The garden is 4-5 Kms away from the main market/chowk and one can take a rickshaw to go there(Rs 100(Per person) + Rs 60(waiting charges)). The ride is good on a rickshaw. The park has a small waterfall, beautiful flowers, a small lake, rides, food court etc. One can spend half a day there.

title: a nice garden could be maintained better
review: For the hills it is nice but could be better come on they could have a Herb Garden , A Flower show Seedlinig place the flowers are not even named

title: Nothing great about this place
review: Its an average place one can go there but don't expect great things there

title: Neatly maintained park
review: Best for relaxing and filling up your itenary. The food available was way below par. Even saw few people were complaining about it. We didn't tried the wax museum. There was no takers for it.

title: most beautiful gardens
review: a great garden just 15 minutes away by rikshaw. waterfalls, masses of flowers planted in large areas, lovely waterfalls, a boat, we took lot of pictures. only downside were the photography touts who bothered us all the time inside the garden. They should not be allowed by the mussorrie local minister or person incharge. a disgrace to trouble tourists who bring money to the place. the place itself is worth visiting

title: Loved the place. Osum plant nursery
review: Loved the place, very clean and well maintained.

title: Average location
review: Its just a garden with places to take pictures and its always crowded. I look for some serenity when I visit a hill station. This place is like being in the heart of the city with so much people around. It feels more like a eco park in a metro. I would rather prefer to go to some place with more personal space. If you go there, you might want to have a picture taken by those cameramen and also have some snacks, especially peanuts chaat.

title: Well maintained park -- must visit
review: Park is located around 3 kms from Library chowk. They charge an entry fee of 18/- per person. It is well maintained. There are plenty of things viz. fountains, waterfall (not natural), rides, boating, plenty of flowers. There are plenty of photographers prompting you to get the pictures clicked. Kids really enjoy the place, rides are cheap as well, 20/- for most of the rides. Lake for boating is small but can be enjoyed.

title: Picturesque Garden , goof for kids ,
review: A good garden with lots of rides for kids , boating was a plus, lots of Big colourful flowers, Must visit if u fo with kids

title: kids entertainment
review: its nice place for kids.they enjoy boating ,seeing beautiful flowers,eating maggi there.its lovely place for kids.beauty of nature is here and there..

title: Garden with lots of greenry
review: Garden is well maintained. Lots of flower, greenery there. Surrounding is very amazing. Perfect place to capture memorable events.

title: Good to see it
review: It's not really a great place, but for half a day is good to visit. If you love flowers you can find some.

title: Children Park!!!
review: Good Place for Childrens only...for Gods sake dont go to WAX Museum.Its waste of money.They charge Rs.100 per person.not worth it

title: just woow awesome place for nature lover
review: awesome place for flower lover different type of flower just love it must visit if u visit mussoorie once

title: Beautiful place
review: beautiful place, must visit

title: Wonderfull Gardern for nature lover
review: If are nature lover and love to see flower, Then this place small heaver for you. Here you can see flower which are planted in such a manner you can't guess it is artificial.

title: Good to visit for couple of hours
review: Food is okay. Some good slides for childern. Wax museum is average, one may avoid that. Morning and evening are the best time to visit during summer.

title: Great day out
review: Company Garden is a place which needs to be visited on a trip to Mussoorie. The place has something for everyone. abundance of varieties of flowers, rides, a small beautiful waterfall, wax museum, boating, Green house....you name it and it is there. Situated on a quite road leading to Kempty  falls, Company garden achieves full marks for a day well spent.

title: Good but crowded
review: This garden is in the heart of mussorie so is a bit overcrowded in season time. Has some rides for children. has a wax museum but mind it, it's not Madame tussads! Good to go with kids but better option is dhanoulti, 35 km from here.

title: Stopping point during a walk
review: By the sounds of it one would expect gardens galore, that is not the case and I dare not compare it to Kew or other Royal Gardens in UK. People on holidays seemed happy there, so I guess it's a decent place if you come from the city and don't have any gardens.

title: Must Visit
review: One of the few places in mountains that's different from the other. It is a definite visit on priority.

title: Must visit to spend time
review: Developed as a garden and amusement park. The small wax museum is here, along with boat rides in a small lake. Few small fun rides for kids including Columbus. The gardens were very beautiful but packed with well-maintained flowers and crowds. A small waterfall was also there. Lots of places to eat, including a food court.

title: Nice place
review: Wax museum is good. There are Rides and boating as well. Prefer going in morning only as late u go u will get traffic jam

title: NOTHING MUCH TO CHEER ABOUT
review: Visited Company Garden after taking alternative route due to closure of road. But the extra effort made was not much fruitful. It was very crowdy. I enjoyed much more at Hotel rather than here.

title: Dont Go...
review: i felt nothing so special about this garden. with artificial waterrfall n small boating area its only for kids. if u dont have much time in mussorrie then you can avoid.

title: Nice and calm place
review: A very nice garden with amazing horticulture. Well maintained. Also have a new attraction added that is Wax Museum. Cafeterial available. Activities like photography, boating, some kids rides available. Flee market is present outside. Located on convent road at a distance of 6 kms from Gandhi Chowk.

title: Best for family
review: Best for family picnic. Specially best for childrens lot of things to do there. Jhulas, boating, bull fight and artificial fall lots of flowers.

title: A very Big park with lots of different flowers.
review: Compony garden is very peaceful place in Mussoorie. It is about 5 kms from the library square near mall road. It has lots of different types of flowers. There are many other things to see also. There are lots of rides for kids and adults. There is a small lake where you can boat. There is also a wax museum newly opened. Restaurant is very big inside. There are also street food vendors. Best time to visit is at evening.

title: Flowers valley
review: This place is located 5 km mussoorie, i went their via rickshaw .

title: Nice
review: A well maintained garden . Nice breather . The wax museum is very small and only for people who have not yet seen Madame Tussauds.  There is a food court though we did not try it.

title: SHABBY PUT UP
review: One water fall that becomes the backdrop for photos, a stinking pond for boating in broken down boats, rides that stop midway for lack of power back-up and a mafia of vendors...

title: Good for kids only place
review: A commercial place with inexpensive swings and games and playing options for young kids. I personally did not enjoy but my kids had a good time on the giant wheel and some other swings. The boating is really not worth it - like a large tub with some boats put in. Did not try the good court. Still worth a visit with young kids

title: Must visit for Small Children!!
review: Best place to enjoy for kids...2-3 kms from mall road....it has rides for kids like frog, baby train, Dragon, Bouncy, Boating etc....It has wax museum which I have not visited,..Must have cone Ice Cream and Avoid food in food court as it's not good...its easily accessible by car...Can take rickshaw from mall road .the fare will be for to and fro,,,,

title: Good Place to Go with kids
review: Park offers some very good rides at cheap prices. Washrooms at the garden are very poorly maintained..Still not able to understand why municipalities cannot maintain washrooms at public plaes

title: Best place to visit in Mussoorie
review: We went to Mussoorie Company Garden and got surprised by presence of a Wax Museum there. The Garden was beautiful and had a nice unnatural water fall, boating and some Rides for Kids. Great location for taking selfies and pics.

title: It's so so, not great
review: It's a small park kind of place, good if you are visiting with family and kids. There are few activities for kids which they will enjoy. The wax museum is also not extraordinary, the only few statues resemble original persons

title: Nothing Extraordinary
review: An artificial garden with an artificial fall... the flowers were very few variety and they were not allowing pictures of some flowers no idea why??? A small pond for boating and not much just charged excessively by taxi

title: its like a normal garden.
review: Its a very average place to see. If you go by a rickshoaw you will be charged 360.00 for up and down. Its around 5 kms away from the liberary chowk. If you go by your own car, they will charge 100 INR for parking and still you wont find place for your car to park. there wont be anybody at the parking site to assist you. They are just making money and charging the customer for nothing. Entry ticket is 18INR per person and you will see nohting. There is one un natural pond to do boating in very old style. There is one dirty water fall and its more or less totally commercial place to charge customer money. IN short "Total time waste".

title: Beautiful little garden
review: Approachable from the main city by foot if you are a walking enthusiast otherwise even on a rickshaw, its a small lovely garden to spend some peaceful time on your vacation. Dotted with lines of different beautiful flowers, its a nice walk in the park plus you have a quaint boat ride in the small lake present inside the garden.

title: Good collection of flora
review: The garden is having sound collections of flowers and staying in garedn for a small time makes you rejuvinate from all tieredness. The best season to reach is summer before mansoon

title: beayutyfulllllll
review: flowers and flowers every where

title: good for kids
review: Its a good place for kids to visit otherwise the Garden is nothing but like a 'COMPANIES' garden ........

title: Well maintained and colorful
review: A well maintained garden with many flowers. Clean and good food in the hotels around. Can spend hours there.

title: Good place for hang out with childrens
review: The company garden is one of the most famous tourist point in mussoorie for children and youngsters also.

title: Good for childrens
review: There are so may activities in company garden for childrens and definitely they will enjoy going there, with lots of small shops for the food lovers and shopping.

title: good for family picnic
review: Beautiful garden and nice environment for a family picnic. Beautiful scenic garden.. Good for photography..

title: Nothing Good to Visit Company Garden only Children will love to visit
review: Food Joints were not up to mark. As we were during the lunch time lot of rush and people were forced to eat below average quality and taste of chinese item. Must Avoid Eating Chinese Dishes

title: Nice garden. Worth a visit with kids
review: Beautiful garden. Wide variety of flowers. Lots of riding options for children. Reasonable priced. Boat ride facility available (Fare varies from Rs. 60 to Rs. 150). Entry fee to this garden is Rs. 18 per person above 3 years. Worth visit....

title: Don't miss this if you are in Mussoorie
review: Beautiful garden maintained by government.  It has many variety of flowers, artificial water fall, train and other rides for kid, boating for everyone. If you are in Mussoorie, don't miss to  visit this place.

title: GARDEN WITH A DIFFERENCE
review: visited the garden having beautiful land scape and a large number of variety of flowers. Enjoyed our stay at garden

title: Nice Garden for entire family
review: A place where you could take your family and friends and spend time. Nice greenery and tress will ensure that you don't get bored and inhale enough fresh oxygen at all times...!

title: beautiful garden
review: beautiful garden with lot of fiowers and tall trees. well maintained with water fall and lake for boating.

title: A treat to watch
review: The place is full of natural vegetation and the green landscape. Fresh flowers blooming makes you feel in the state of perfect bliss. The garden is well maintained and has a small water fall with paddle boats.

title: You must visit Company Bagh
review: Surprise our group of friends and set out for the Company Garden. We enjoyed a lot at this place. Nice garden variety of flowers at garden and nice landscape.

title: Strictly avoidable
review: No real garden. Just a host of food stalls and a few rides for the kids. Very overcrowded in June. Had to walk more almost 2 kms as there was no traffic and parking management.

title: Full time fun
review: Nice place to visit especially people with young kids. Minimal entry fee for all excusing kids below 3yrs. Large variety of flora and fauna with lots of green belt.Equipped with rides for young kids and adults and a self service food plaza offering all types dishes. Also, houses a wax museum on paid entry basis.

title: company garden
review: place to visit in Mussorie apart from its Hills and Mall road. nice plantation , boating and all . fun place for family and couples

title: nice place to spend an evening but nothing out of the world!
review: a good experience! nice natural beauty. the garden was good and fresh experience to spend some time in the evening if you have an extra day at mussourie

title: Nice place to be in evening
review: Nice place to spend in evening. Well maintained and it's near to city so less travelling. A kind of must go I would say.

title: Good
review: It was good place for children... Or those people who love rides. Not so good Not so bad... If u want to go with kids then it's a good place.

title: Average
review: The best part is the flowers in this place.That's it.And the food court sucks.Never order anythind.The wax museum....price too high when you don't even know what's inside.

title: Must Visit
review: Great place to be. Nicely maintained garden. Good views of the hills nearby. Very picturesque ride to the garden. There is a small lake for boating and several rides for the kids.

title: Best place to be in Mussoorie
review: Even though it is done up artificially but its location in the lap of nature makes it a gorgeous must-visit garden in mussoorie. It was my 1st visit and i felt so full of energy that I just could not stop at 1 place. I kept jumping from here to there.... the falls, boating, tress with lovely flowers, swings.... I am so not out of that trip. Must visit check. Period.

title: Flower Garden with some activity
review: It's a flower garden with lots of activity. A small water fall and nursery make it more attractive. Boating in the lake is awesome . Children can have fun there with their gave facilities. Wax museum is  good idea. foodie can eat maggi, parantha, umlet. If you want to relax have a cup of coffee here.

title: An Average place with maintained garden and some views of mountain
review: This is an average+ rating garden with some good views and worth to spend 2-3 hours. it has a nice and attractive artificial water fall and museum. museum price were high and not worth. Kids had some rides and enjoyed boating.

title: Good Flowers and Natural Beauty
review: It was really good experience in the Garden, different variety of followers were available, nice trees, wax museum, Food was average.

title: Well maintained and beautiful
review: Very well maintained garden and very beautiful. The flowers were in full blossom. Small waterfall in the park makes it a good attraction. Better than visiting kempty fall.

title: Not worth the money
review: This is one of the spots propagated as sightseeing destination s, but to be true it is not worth a pence, i see ppl spending 100's of rs to visit this place, waste of time and money, only if you have 3-6 yrs old kids one can  visit, i like to explore every corner and roads so was on foot savoring shops,houses and cafes !

title: A small park - just a walk away from LBSNAA
review: Take an evening walk of a few minutes from Lal Bahadur Shastri National Academy of Administration a.k.a LBSNAA Mussoorie and you reach this small park  known as Company Garden.It has a nominal entry fee. There are flowers in hot houses. There are some rides for kids and the usual candy floss, hot corn, coffee, tea and noodles sold. Good for a stroll

title: Beautiful garden and wax museum
review: This place is approx 3kms from the mall road and I must say you don't regret visiing it. It is a beautifully  maintained garden with lots of beautiful flowers. There is a beautiful man-made waterfall where you can relax and spend good time. There is a wax museum inside which is accessible with separate entry fee.

title: good place for kids
review: Good garden for the kids..They have a lot of swings and rides for the kids. There is also a restaurant inside with lot of options to eat. Good time pass for the kids..You can even take a rickshaw from the mall road to visit this place.

title: Excellent Place for kids
review: The Company Garden at the hill top is one of the main tourists spot in the city. You need to buy tickets to enter the place but its fun place with many activities you can do  inside. Wax museum,waterfall, garden with beautiful flowers.

title: Very good place to visit
review: Nice  garden very well maintained wax museum is in  budding stage ,I think. Beautiful flowers .,nice place to visit . ,

title: Amazing garden
review: One of the best gardens i have ever seen after mughal gardens New Delhi.kudos to every hard work they have put in to preserve this place.A must visit to every one.

title: Fun time
review: You can do lot many activities in company garden like flower watching, boating, kids rides and wax museum.

title: nice place
review: good place for kids they can have boating here, kids zone like bull fighting, other adventure swings.

title: Best place to visit
review: Enjoy the beauty of nature...you will definitely want to visit this place if you love flowers etc...don't forget to click pictures near the waterfall

title: A garden with all chargeable
review: You can visit to see artificial flowers at this garden.But if you want to touch or if you want to take photos you need to pay the money :( !!!

title: Evening in company garden
review: Tooooo crowded

title: Garden with Varity
review: Garden offers variety of options from food court to boating. there are beautiful scenic views full of flowers, fountain and waterfall. Overall a good experience

title: Colourful Garden
review: A well maintained Garden full of colourful flower beds, definitely a must visit place in Mussoorie. It has huge expanse of wellmanicured lawns, Flower beds, a small food Court and rides for children. Many professional Photographers dress you up in the Traditional wear and take pictures

title: Great Place to relax and for kids
review: This is a wonderful place to relax and there are plenty of things for the kids to do. Only wish we were not so hounded by the photographers.

title: nice location with nice flowers
review: The place is nice with beautiful garden which can be the best place to take pics... the garden has soothing ambience and also the activities over there are good for family,,... not many place to visit in mussorie but this is definitely the best one ...the car parking charges are very stiff which is 100/- dont know the reason for such charges///

title: Average garden
review: Average garden. But the way to this garden is awesome. Photography place.small Boating place. And some amusement park with some ride.

title: Its just an average garden
review: There is nothing really special about the place its just an average garden.  Overall not worth the visit

title: Main Attraction is Wax Museum
review: One of the main attraction of company garden is Wax Museum. Second attraction is artificial waterfall. Kids enjoy performing lot of activities and fun rides.

title: Very good garden in a hill top
review: Company garden in Missouri is a very good garden in this hill station.Not only it is frequented by locals but by tourists as well. Beautiful flowers, roses,variety of plants fill the hearts of the tourists with pleasure and satisfaction.Added attraction is a fall from the hill which flows through the garden in to a pool.That is a tourists delight.The water channel down the slope has many small boats plying for the benefit/please of the young men and children.Eateries are there for the visitors to relish local as well as north/south Indian foods.Very good place to relax.

title: quite average but good flowers
review: Very small place and does not have much to see. However the flowers were quite good. The  restaurant was quite average and can be avoided.

title: variety of flowers
review: its a nice garden well maintained with variety of species of plants. very nominal enry fee too. nice place in mussorie to relax. intresting if you are a botony student

title: Good place to spend time
review: The Company Garden is a well maintained garden.  It will  not fall into the great or breath taking gardens category but still a place to visit in Mussoorie.  There are not many place to visit during the day so its worth the visit.  There is an amusement area for the children.  Newly married, to be married would love this place cos it offers good place for taking pictures.  If one could hire a cycle rickshaw to this place it will really be a romantic ride

title: Average place to see
review: If u have lots of time then u can visit but there is nothing much to see. One advantage is there that you will get some good food.

title: nice bloom accompanied by camera wielding touts
review: Located about 6 kilometers from the City Centre, this Garden has a good collection of flowering plants, especially roses. The main negative is the number of touts who chase visitors with their cameras, offering to take pictures in the garden or in the local traditional dress.

title: peace and harmony
review: though a small place but well maintained and developed. gives to peace and quiet away from hustle and bustle of mussoorie. the small artificially developed waterfall adds to the picturesque place and is photo enthusiasts favorite.small lake with its boats is a must ride for children. hope they avoid further commercialization like they did with kempty fall.

title: Amazingly beautiful place
review: Company Garden is a beautifully manicured garden with varieties of flowers in full bloom. A must visit place in Mussoorie. A treasure trove of beautiful Roses and other flowers I do not know the name of.

title: Reasonable garden
review: The garden is a decent one - not extra-ordinary.

title: kids playtime.
review: The games are very few and the garden is ok. wish there were more games for kids. the overall experience was average.

title: Good scenic place to visit
review: It is located 6 km from mussoorie.

title: Also known as Municipal Garden,fun for kids
review: Its a usual garden, nothing extra ordinary, just has a few fun rides for kids,small pound for boating and a wax museum. Don't try the food here,the food joints are not clean,Maggie n Omelets are the safest choice here. The wax museum is not that great either. Photographers keep on asking you to get clicked in different attire n postures. Not too far from mall road so you can visit it once.

title: Vibrant display  of flowers!
review: Lovely garden. You can get there by cycle ricks only which is quite a nice experience too. Lots of lovely flowers. It can get a bit crowded so getting a pic of yourself might be a challenge. Lots of local photographers to bug you to sign up for their 'professional' pictures. We tried one and was fooled. I guess it might just be your luck.

title: Wonderful flower show.
review: Nice place to feel the nature in form of trees, plants, attractive flowers and hill views. It is a good place for photography with wonderful background.

title: Mr.Bhavesh Dodhia
review: Most beautiful place to visit in Mussoorie very well maintained good work by the locals...

title: Flowers and Photo
review: It is develop by Municipality of Mussoorie, not too much attractive.. please visit in Evening like 4-5 PM, you have to pay 50 rs for Parking and 18 rs each for entry.. so its not worth and place is very far from city, visit if you have extra time.. otherwise average place.

title: Nice evening
review: We visited this place enrout to mall road back from visiting kempty falls..There is a nominal entry ticket the garden has rows and rows of flower beds..arranged in treacle garden style ..There are couple of swings down as well as a boating area..There is food court as well which has a variety of food outlets. .A nice place near the mall road to spend an evening with a loves one in peace the view and the cool breeze makes it a nice loving place for a beautiful evening ..

title: Beautiful gardens, good for kids
review: Beautiful gardens, well maintained, plenty of activities for kids - toy train, boat ride, an artificial waterfall, photos can be taken in traditional Garhwali costumes. Nice nursery with loads of beautiful flowers.

title: Worth the visit
review: Nice Tourist Place, It has the food court and is the perfect place to go while returning from Kempty Falls. There is also a wax museum inside.

title: Nursery was good
review: We stayed in Mall Road and took rickshaw to reach company garden. Up and down and waiting together cost 300. Even few ppl walked to reach garden. Entry fee is 18 per head. Nursery was good with variety for flowers. Other than that remaining was not good. The mini waterfalls was under maintenance on the day we went which was quite disappointing. We saw there was a wax museum inside garden. Entry for museum is 100 per head. It was total waste of money. Not worth for money. Other than that it was just for time pass

title: Pretty Garden
review: It's a pretty garden with full bloomed flowers...well-maintained. But do not expect anything extraordinary and fancy. Just spend some peaceful time amidst flowers and click pics!

title: Pretty dumb place
review: its just an average park... pretty tough to get there in the first place ... Any major city will have such a park ... pretty dumb place to visit ... Do it if you are alot of people and nowhere to go

title: Nothing to see really
review: Don't waste time going there. The journey to the place is quite scenic though. Maybe you can take a rickshaw and just take round trip to the company garden without entering it. The artificial lake they talk about is smaller than most swimming pools.

title: Time waste
review: Don'T wate you valuable time in Mussorie visiting these places you will have nuisance by photographers shop keepers best to have in your hotels balcony and enjoy the weather very average park

title: Nice place with lots and lots of roses
review: Place is good.

title: Calm Company Garden
review: Simple seasonal park in Mussourie with vast area for resting,more horticulture engage and nice pleasant visit

title: Worth a visit for the flower garden
review: A very well maintained garden cum amusement park very close to the hill city. It hosts a lake with boating facilities, children play area, artificial waterfalls, food plaza and an overpriced wax museum.

title: Must Visit if you are in Mussoorie
review: Good timepass place. Also good if you have kids. small waterfall and beautiful flowers are the main attraction of this place. Boating is also good but in a small area.

title: breathtaking views
review: 6 km walking distance from mall,so we decided  to walk again,it was worth walking ,we met tibet people there and enjoyed fresh and nature views

title: Only worth visiting when the flowers bloom
review: It's a place to visit bst in may n June when the flowers are all blooming. It's quite a sight to see the bloom. It also has a boating lake n also a nursery. Currently a wax museum is also opened

title: Must visit if with children
review: If you have kids under the age of 10, then do goto this place. Take the cycle from the Mussoorie Library stand. They have fixed rates as per government rules.

title: Best if you have extra time .
review: full of greens and flower .properly maintained by government. perfect for healthy seatout during day and evening also.safe and calm .i was  visited tis in evening and found very good temperature.perfect timing's are 11 am to 6 pm.in a day

title: Nice place
review: Beautiful place. The way to this garden is very nice. It becomes crowded sometimes. There are plenty food stalls. There are a few rides for kids too.

title: Beautifully maintained garden
review: Loved the garden and all the beautiful flowers. Would recommend nature lovers to visit this place. Unique Himalayan flowers are on display.

title: timepass
review: Is a good place for passing an hour or so. Kids will enjoy with lots of rides on offer. only problem  is the conveyance if you wish to stay for a bit longer than you have to hire a taxi which costs a lot more.

title: Company garden
review: You can  spend 2 hours with kids in company garden only . Not more than that. Its average type garden. Bull type jhoola is out of order.

title: Good for photography
review: Good for photography. Wax museum is over priced. It's an OK museum. Rides are good for kids and reasonable. Enjoyed being here

title: Excellent and clean garden. Visit in Spring to see flowers.
review: 1. Visit this place in the Spring season. You will get to see a lot of flowers.

title: Also known as Municipal Garden
review: Now artificial Garden, Garden has a vast colorful collection of flowers and plants, the garden aria large variety of flora and birds, situated in the Happy Valley, also known as Municipal Garden, we click beautiful picture hear…

title: shikara boating, flowers garden  ,post wedding shoots and rides . photography awsome pics.
review: i m going with own wife my best moment in this place photoshoot pre and post wedding shoot option local shops gardens different types of flowers and famous national and international personalities mom statue in this museum . shikara boating i like it in company garden , rides

title: Company Garden
review: Beautiful gardens, however the boating and wax museum is complete waste of time. Rickshaw are available from Ropeway (Jhulagarh) and Library (Gandhi Chowk). The rickshaws go there on to and fro basis, costs Rs 180 for two persons as per the rate chart, however negotiable upto Rs 150. It's on the way to Kempty Falls.

title: Nice maintained Gardens with beautiful views
review: I was quite impressed with maintenance of Company Gardens and we all enjoyed our time there. Good to go towards evening and enjoy the greenery. A must go in Mussoorie.

title: Decently maintained
review: parking can be an issue in peak season.. lots of kids activity. Nice place to sit around, small boating area..

title: An excellent place to enjoy the floral beauty of the city.
review: An excellent place to enjoy the floral beauty of the city. A well maintained park with a variety for colorful flowers.

title: Well kept garden manned by female security.
review: The flowers and trees are well looked after. They have a nursery with variety of plants ,a food court and a very small lake for boating. Families can come & spend time with their children.but was expecting a better park and garden.

title: Neat garden
review: A small garden with a artificial pond and waterfall, lots of games, and a telescope to watch the peak points at Mussoorie

title: Small but maintained well
review: We visited this place as part of our recent mussorrie trip. Nothing special but u can enjoy a few activities of your as well as kids' interest like balloon shooting, archery, kids rides, a very small pond to do boating in, and a vendor with telescope who'll show u some local peak points with details. The place is good to spend an bour or two but beware, everything is paid (even using washroom of average built will cost u some bucks). Overall good to visit if u r in mussorrie, specially with kids.

title: Beautiful and Serene
review: This is a very nice Garden to visit with young children as there is ample space for them to run around and a few paid rides too. The pathways are also very nice with lots of steps and a small waterfall at the end of the garden. There is also a cafe inside the garden which serves delicious hot chai and hand cut french fries, which was really nice to have, while enjoying the view from the window as it was pretty cold. There is a small entry fee to the park and it is pretty accessible if you have elderly people with you as well.

title: Nice place near Mall Road
review: It's a nice place to visit. You can easily get a rickshaw from gun hill point to this place don't go via by a taxi you will miss the beauty in the way.

title: Paradise for kids
review: Kids enjoyed the garden.Beautiful flowers and trees & Water fall. Small pond for boating. Wax Museum is worth visiting. Amusement Rides for kids. Many food outlets.

title: Not worth
review: We went there with out small kids of 5 & 1 year....

title: Must Visit with kids
review: Little away from hustle bustle of Mall awesome ride to Company Garden with lot of attractions for all age groups especially kids and teens... Don't miss it

title: Good for kids
review: Well maintained lawns with several activities and food options. Administration has done a good job. There are few rides and boating option. Several points for taking pictures.

title: Not my kinda place
review: An artificial garden with artificial water ways etc. And attractions like a wax museum where you can make out the person only by reading the placard.

title: Cleanest place in mussoorie
review: The only clean place in mussoorie. Worth visiting for the greenery, thr fountailn at the center and the nice little water fall.

title: Good for a relaxing evening with nature
review: Good for photoshoots and a relaxing time amidst flowers and greenery. Lot of variety of flowers and plants to be explored

title: Place worth to visit
review: Very nice ambience and relaxing atmosphere. One can enjoy boating in small artificial lake and then enjoy good quality food in food court located within the company garden. overall this place is worth to visit.

title: Small but well maintained
review: It's a small garden which is well maintained. It would take just 15 minutes to take a round. As this place is very small it's get little noisy.

title: Great place for kids
review: Good Amusement park games and food options available. Must visit for families with kids. Spend 3 hours max.

title: Quite and Adventurous
review: Enjoyable place, beautiful garden, boating, food joints plus rides for kids. A small but beautiful waterfall.

title: Snow ,snow and more snow
review: I had been to this place slightly after peak winter was over and yet this place was loaded with snow .It appeared as if a white sheet covered the whole garden. People of all age revelled in making snow balls and threw them at each other.

title: Too much hyped
review: If you have been to Botanical Gardens in ooty and Coonor then this Garden will

title: Good fun for kids
review: When you visit Company garden, you are reminded of your own childhood trips to hillstations. Seems like nothing has changed in these places. A must visit place for kids. It offers boating, gun shooting, ring games, and fun rides. There is a decent waterfall and a small nursery. In the age of smart phones, you still cant miss the instant costume pic for your child. There is a wax museum which is average. There is no decent eating place but you will not starve as there is maggi all around.

title: Don't waste time there
review: Nothing great to see there except paratha outside the garden. Its just simple garden. Small pond where they offer boating. One artificial water fall.

title: Very Good place for Family
review: Visited company garden with Family , this is good place provide many good spots for clicking family or selfies, it offers many fun rides for the Kids , this also has a Was museum but the wax statues are not great for the price of ticket they ask for (can be avoided). It has a eatery also which serves all kind of food.

title: Good place for kids
review: It is a simple garden with an artificial waterfall, pond, boating and few rides for the kids. nice place to click some selfies and photos. There is a wax museum as well but we did not visit. The Food court has lot of options.

title: Good entertainment
review: The garden is about 4 km in a upwardly road from Library chowk. We got down on our way back from Kempty falls at a point from where the garden is only 2 km & walkable. However, better option is to take a car ( or Ricksaw) from Library to & fro. One can spend two/ three hours in the garden which has a good nursery , a small spring and lot of flowers. A nice toy train, toad train, limited boat ride, other fun for kids are major attractions. The K Dev wax museum is an added attraction, though not so popular. As a whole a good spot to visit.

title: About garden
review: it is a wonderful garden. you see here the natural beauty. you can feel here like heaven.it is very very beautiful

title: Ideal Place for Picnic
review: An ideal place for picnic with lots of options for children to remain busy and the variety of trees which gives peace to the mind.

title: Better than gun hill and Kempty
review: The place is next to library and you can trek your way. The entry fee is modest 17rs. The garden has a boating and wax museum inside. There is also a water stream which looks better than Kempty falls!

title: Dil Garden-Garden at Company Garden
review: For all flower and botanical lovers. This place is very mesmerizing once the garden is full of verities of flowers. One should visiting there in b/w Dec - FEB to view the full scale view of flowers and smell the fragrance.

title: nice place to visit if u like gardens
review: its a nice place to visit if you like being in middle of nature. small garden with rides for kids and lots of dhaba style eating places. not great but visit if you don't have anything better to do

title: Nice place for the romantically inclined!...irrespective of age!
review: A very charming place for young and old.

title: Good place for hangouts
review: The place is on the way of Kempty fall from Mussorie. It is very near 2 km from library. The place is good to visit during evening in summers and whole day in winters. It has got good amount of botanical species and nice views of mountains.

title: Nice place to spent some time
review: good place and managed well, i spent good time with my family and had good food too. nice walk around area

title: Spend some time with beautiful flowers!!!
review: All types of flowers...very well maintained garden. You can find variety of flowers. You can get some good pictures inside. Food court is available and food is good. Games for kids and boating may be interesting for kids.

title: Beautiful Garden in Mussoorie
