review: This is beautiful graden which you can visit on the way or coming back from Campty Falls. There is nominal entry ticket and you can spend quality time with your family in this garden. There is also one artificial waterfall inside garden.

title: Calm and soothing place
review: We visited the place in the evening and walked around 1-2 km from the zero point where we were dropped off by the taxi on the way back from Kempti falls. Nominal ticket is applicable for entry. There is a small waterfall inside. Also boating is available. It houses a big nursery for plants. Overall, a lovely place for nature lovers.

title: Does not offer much but could be because of month I have visited
review: I personally didn't liked it but I may be wrong. You can go there one time but I cannot find it a place where you can spend more than 40 min.

title: Beautiful garden
review: Its a very Beautiful garden & close to kempty fall.good for flower & nature lovers. There is an artificial waterfall and a few rides for children.A person must visit this place.

title: Not too bad if you are with children.
review: nothing outstanding if you have been to a botanical garden. But good if you are with children. It has some rides and food court . Lush green and has a waterfall.

title: nice place
review: it is one of the establised listed tourist place of mussoorie.Cycle rikshaw takes Rs.250 from mall road and approachable place from cars.sufficient parking place for all kind of vehicles.Company garden has many sections like flower display,many keinus for childs,many restaurants,wax museum,fountains etc and a nice place to spend time.Needs 2 hrs min.

title: Excellent place to visit
review: I always went company garden whenever i visit mussoorie. It is nice place , having food court , attractive view . A person must visit this place.

title: Nice place to sit and relax
review: Nice place to visit.. Not easily accessible and u need to hire a cab to reach here.. Make sure to club the same with george everest which is a 5/5 rating place.. Nice variety of flowers and pleasant surrounding .. Have a food outlet..

title: This should be renamed company dumping garden
review: Not sure why they charged us 100/- for parking and 18/- for entry when all you see inside are dry leaves on the lawns, urine smelling water falls and dirty restaurants and walkways.

title: its okk
review: its an okk kind of place, a garden with greenhouse and small boating lake and a wax museum in it, if you are on a day trip to mussoorie this can be skipped.

title: Good Garden In British Style
review: it is an average place and is only for kids.Adults will not enjoy it. There is an artificial waterfall and a few rides which have an extra charge after the entry charge. The wax museum is not so good. Photographers are a pain in a*s there.If you D

title: Awesome place..
review: So chilled weather got a few snaps in good weather and location.. Nice water falls built within..Took a long ride walk in the garden felt like a second honeymoon...

title: A good place to spend an evening
review: This place will not disappoint you. It is just 5km from Mussoorie on the Mussoorie - Kempty road.

title: Wonderful place
review: This is best place for visit. If you have small children you can enjoy more.this is best place for photography. You can enjoy boating, rides, museum, flowers, rabbits are for photography, and best is water fall here.

title: Must see
review: Do visit this when in Mussoorie. Very pretty garden with a small waterfall and a boat with Shikhara ride.

title: Avoidable..
review: Company Garden at Mussoorie has lost it charm. It resembles to any Municipal garden of an Indian city. Totally Avoidable in my opinion

title: beautiful and scenic
review: Close to nature, it has a variety of flowers and plants. An amazing experience for plant lovers. Have plenty of nice places to shoot pics.

title: Good visit
review: Famous tourist place for families and couples. Is accessible via rickshaw from Mall Road. Is great way to kill time.

title: A complete park !
review: Complete with rides and games for all. Boating on a small but beautiful lake. a mini waterfall. A good foodcourt. spaces for relaxation. Kids will love it ! Acomplete package

title: Company Garden
review: Very beautiful place, plenty of trees, this place gives a real peace and you spend time with nature.

title: Not an Garden at all
review: This is place accessible from cycle rickshaw available near mall road.

title: good place to visit
review: you can do boating or can just sit and eat maggie. you can also go to a wax museum. place is very cold so try to have appropriate clothes.

title: Well maintained garden
review: The company garden is small but well maintained. There is an artificial waterfall created within the garden which had become a spot for local photographers to sell instant photos to tourists. One can enjoy the cool climate and the awesome view of the snow clad mountains visible from here.

title: municipal garden
review: the municipal or company garden is a chilling retreat for young couples. a huge garden with a colonial touch.

title: Lovely Colorful Garden
review: Since we stayed close by, we walked upto Company Garden. They have entrance fee. This garden is very neat and well maintained. We were enchanted by the beautiful colorful flowers and the overall landscape of this place.

title: Must visit
review: Company garden is must visit in mussorie if having kids along with you.

title: Not my choice
review: This is not for singles or friend. its better for family with little kids.  One can take rickshaws from Mall Road which charges Rs 100/ person to take and bring u back and gives u 1 hour of stay in the garden. I did not liked the garde as has nothing to see just small man made lake with fee boats offering a ride. One person renting binocular to see far away villages. And restaurants.  There were some kids merry go rounds,etc.  The things u fine in a family park near you....  Not worth going....

title: Must watch....something for everyone
review: beautifull garden.....It has boating..small waterfall. Games for children...wax museum...lovely view of the mountains.

title: Beautiful
review: Absolutely amazing place. Beautiful n scenic location. Lovely flowers. Must go when in mussoorie. We had gone there in october n it was very foggy, which added to the beauty of this place. Very well maintained n kept by the govt authorities.

title: Treacherous journey and an OK garden
review: We booked a full day cab and the cabbie took a short cut to avoid traffic. Some parts of this route were under construction and quite treacherous. There is a nag devta mandir on the way.

title: Hygiene spot to visit, nothing great
review: The artificial falls was nice, the rest of the things in the garden were pretty usual and mundane. The boating channel was so small that it seemed it was a misfit in the park. All the eateries and restaurants there serve veg food.

title: Better to visit post Monsoon
review: This is a Garden specially develop for attracting tourist but as my visit was in Dec 14 I missed the landscaping they did with colourful and decorative flowers of different Variety . If you miss this then nothing much to see in the apart from a romantic walk with your partner if you are with. Kids may enjoy the artificial small waterfall.  A restaurant is there in the garden not much of a grade in taste.

title: Floowers
review: Great Collection of Flowers and view from one point is great.. you can see the other part of the city

title: Nice place to roam around. The wax museum is good.
review: Its a nice place to hang around. It has nice variety of flowers. The wax museum is good. The rides are ok.

title: Ordinary
review: This comes as a part of sightseeing in Mussourie but in a place where nature's bliss is aplenty, a man made garden is of much less importance. Have enough time and you can make a brief visit but if time is a constraint, there is no point to visit this man made garden with a small artificial falls. Overall pretty ordinary option. Better spend more time in walking around the Mall.

title: Average, visit if you have enough time
review: Company Garden is close to the mall  Road. You can either decide to walk the distance (Approx 2KM i guess) or you can hire a rickshaw. It's a reasonably well maintained small garden with lots of flowers, lawn, artificially made waterfall and an artificial lake. Personally I didn't like it much. Nature's beauty is at abundance everywhere in Mussoorie & Landor, you do not need to visit an artificial garden for that. I liked Ecopark at Dhanaulti, way better.

title: Good place to visit
review: Mussourie has very limited places to visit. Among them this is a must visit. They have recently introduced boating and adventure sports for the children.

title: A good place in Mussourie
review: We went there just for a walk. Its a huge garden with lots of flowers and ample greenery. The place has a small pond for boating too. Overall a good place to visit if you are having time.

title: Good place for kids
review: Multiple play option for small kids.(Till 10 years.). Food in the food court is very good. Has a wax museum also. But most of them doesn't resemble the original. Overall you can spend two hours in the surrounding.

title: Average place
review: We visited on 14th november.Company garden is an average place as there are very less flowers....food is gud in a restaurant and wax museum is gud otherwise an average place

title: Well maintained garden!
review: It is a beautiful garden and wonderfully maintained.Lots of rides and a must visit place for the ones who love photography!Eateries and rides are all there inside the park.Greenery and flowers are treat to the eyes!

title: Nice garden
review: We went in the winter so not much in bloom. It was quiet and I could see where the grounds would be lovely in the spring.  Looks like a fun place for kids.

title: A great place to spend a couple of hours
review: Its a park. A good, well maintained park.

title: Garden
review: Located at approx. 6 kms from mussorie, this one is beautiful park with a small lake for boating, a waterfall, swings, some shops for and a beautiful  garden with variety of flowers.  Enjoy the nice view.

title: A FLORAL PARK WITH FEW ACTIVIES
review: the company garden is at a little distance from the mall road.

title: A Good Place to Spend Some Time !
review: This Picnic spot has a beautiful garden & an artificial mini lake with boating facilities. It is located at a distance of  4 kms if one takes main road & only 2 kms on foot via the convent road. Good place to spend some time.

title: Good for Family with kids
review: Good place to hang around with kids. The place is developed for kids only with some good choice for foods. Good time pass.

title: Nice Garden to visit,
review: Nice Garden to visit, to take pictures, to eat, to see waterfall and visit Wax Museum, lot of fun can be done with family.

title: Small but beautiful.
review: Located just near Lal Bahadur Shastri Academy for Administration, this is a beautiful park and houses a wax museum worth visit.

title: One of best spots in Mussourie
review: This is a very well maintained garden in the town by the local government.  Originally this garden was made by a local British beer manufacturing company. There is a small pond which is good for kids nithing to write about. But the wax museum is superb. Have not seen such art in the country at very nominal tickets. The garden has nursery too. The flowers are facinating. Photographers take nice snaps. Must visit this place.

title: average garden
review: one of the places to visit in mussouri. average garden with lots of flowers, lawns, an artificial waterfall.

title: JUST OKAY
review: This park is well maintained and clean. It is the best place for children. There are few rides with cheap rate.The restaurant of the ark is good. You can come here by Rickshaw.

title: A beautiful Paradise
review: If you are in Mussoorie and do visit this place with you family or loved ones. But do take out some time and visit . This place need some quality time to appreciate its beauty . The lovely water fall, the greenery , the kids area with rides at very reasonable prices. They also have a wax museum though a small one which can be visited once.. Just go with good time in your hand and enjoy it . Its only 18 rupees per head entry

title: Good outing for families and kids
review: 1) Very near to mall road, you will get rickshaw's to this place for around ₹50/person

title: nice flowers
review: Although we visited there during offseason we still saw lot of varieties of flowers in different colors. The garden is well maintained. There is an artificial waterfall which adds the attraction. The fun games inside the garden are not that impressive. Still this is a good place to spend a couple of hours in the afternoon.

title: Finally a well maintained and clean tourist spot in Mussoorie
review: Company garden is worth a visit when in Mussoorie. Beautiful garden in the lap of deodar laden mountains creates an ever lasting memory of the trip....colourful spread of begonias and other wide variety of flowers and plants adorns the place, the charisma created by the cascade leaves a soothing effect and rowing the boat in the lake makes appetite to indulge in the food served at the Copper Grill.

title: Perfect place for kids
review: The park is well maintained. There is a boat ride and many other fun rides for kids and adults. A must visit place if you are having kids otherwise also good to spend time.

title: good for both family and friends on a trip
review: various games and boating on the lake is a very good experience specially in the winter season . try some snacks out too

title: Nice garden for family
review: One can visit company garden along with family to enjoy rides and the lawns which are well maintained

title: Nothing Special for all the Hype the taxi wallah gave! Cant make out why its called Company Garden!
review: It was average park..with some boating and Food court thrown in.Not very clean either.

title: Just a normal garden
review: It was a typical garden with nothing special to offer, apart from the wax museum. Which was so horrible that it was amusing...

title: A One time watchable
review: It is beautiful and one time visitable garden.The beautiful flowers, grounds and scenes around are admirable. A loveable place for children as there are lots of activities for them.

title: Huge makeover
review: Good place to enjoy with yr kids. Must visit this place for the beautiful flowers some nice weather and delicious paranthas and noodles.

title: A very silent place
review: Not much to see inside has got a few good photo points. When we went it was raining there was a wax museum and also boating inside but didnt see the boating it is similar to one of those in ooty botanical garden

title: Company garden
review: Nice place with vibrant colourful flowers, an artificial lake, waterfall,nursery, play zone for kids and beautiful wax museum.

title: A wonderful time with family
review: Very beautiful...very clean.....lot of rides for kids.......A wonderful food court.......Variety of beautiful flowers.....A beautiful fountain and waterfall........A complete and good combination of all for a wonderful time with family.........Really memorable and wonderful experience.

title: Masuri trip
review: I visited Company Garden in October. There are flowers of many varieties. There are also many types of rides. There was also a fall , a restaurant and a Maggie point. I along with my family enjoyed there very much.

title: Good place however lake is very small
review: Lal tibba is another place which is good to visit. The lake here is quite small but place is nice and peaceful, especially the garden has very good flowers.

title: Good flowery and waxy
review: Apart from the garden wax museum is nice. Parking is a big problem. Can take rickshaws from mall road

title: You can miss it
review: Not much to see here... Go there only if you have nothing else to do. Some outdated boating but well kept gardens.

title: lovely place
review: good place to go and have quality time beautiful garden with a fables view of hills have wax museum as well a must watch place

title: Nice place
review: Overall a nice place to spend some time but not something which I would mark as a must visit as such. The artificial waterfall is the highlight of the place. The lake is too small for much fun. The garden is good to spend some time.

title: Beautiful location
review: We visited the place in second week of October. Its beautiful place will lots of flowers. Nicely maintained. Enjoyed the photography with beautiful background of flowers.

title: Nice time for the kids
review: The new rides are good. But I miss the old swings from my childhood.

title: Well worth a visit
review: No longer the Botanical Gardens established by the British in the early 1800s (hence the name "company"), but still a nice place to visit. One can catch a cycle rickshaw from Library Bazaar and past the entrance to Happy Valley. There is a nice vege restaurant and various shops and activities, including boating and a nice (though fake) waterfall. There is also a flourishing nursery and lovely lawns. Not much sunshine penetrates the big trees so it is quite cool when not summer time. Rs 18 per person to enter.

title: Excellent
review: Simply Wow....The garden is awesome if you have a DSLR...The main attraction of this garden is some wonderful flowers...If you love flowers and photography, you will spend some nice time with flowers and your camera....

title: flowers every where !
review: What a place ! On the hill top and very well maintained. Nice restaurants to have food and snacks.

title: Garden with lots of colourful flower
review: Its a very good garden with lots of colourful flower. Some good active for children with DJ and fun activity.

title: Nice garden
review: It's a nice well maintained garden.... i specially like the rikshaw ride from library chowk to company garden ... because for the pleasant view and great weather... inside company garden you can also find some rides to enjoy... there are only few rides for adults.... but they are great .... all other rides are for small kids.... great place for family with kids... overall nice experience..

title: Company Garden near Mussoorie
review: Company Garden is about 4 Kms from Mall Road in Mussoorie, one can take cycle rickshaw till the garden as walking might take time and energy.

title: 260 bucks for a cycle rickshaw! wasteful expense
review: Took a cycle rickshaw from the mall! 50 bucks per person per way.So 100 bucks for 2 people going and 100 bucks fro trip. Plus 60 rs for 1 hour waiting. 4 kKms of distance from library end of mussorie. Boating in artificial lake is also very expensive. Rather mussorie jheel has cheaper boating facilities! Highly overhyped destination. Avoid as far as possible! At least it's bearable than kempty fall.

title: Skip this if you have shortage of time.
review: I went there from Kempty falls but its just a garden with an artificial small water fall, where you can click pictures(again the same picture everywhere). Also, its has some rides for kids. So If you have kids from 3 year and above, and you have time, you can go, otherwise you can skip this.

title: Serene and beautiful
review: It is located almost 2 km from mall road. We went here in the evening. The garden is quite well kept and perfect for photographs.

title: Good Place
review: Its about 3-4 kms away from mall road..and worth a visit if you have free time..lots of flowers..overall  had a food time..

title: Waste of time
review: Please do not waste your precious time and money to visit this so called garden unless you are from a desert area where a garden is a a luxury. The cab people have formed an union to protect only their commercial interests and not the ones of the tourists and charge very heavily. This garden is about five kilometers away from Gandhi chowk. So no point in visiting this garden paying so much for conveyance. There is a entry fee of Rs. 18/- per head which is sheer waste. However if you visit this garden even after going through my review, please do not visit the wax museum which is located inside the garden unless and until you would like to see the cartoons of popular figures.

title: Well maintained & amazing flora/fauna
review: The place has some great views & full credit to the gardeners who maintain the place. We visited with some mist around & was a lovely view & experience. Would recommend people with small kids to carry raincoats.

title: Lots of greenery....nicely landscaped
review: The entry into the garden makes you feel like you are in the middle of a beautiful green forest. Its very soothing, more so when you visit it in the months of aug-sep. There are varieties of flora you can witness throughout. Going still farther, there is a small cute waterfall, with a small bridge over it and stones placed beautifully all over--a good location for pictures i must say. Climbing a few steps down, you get to see a small lake, with facilities of boating. Restaurants are also available inside to quench your hunger. There are also different rides available for kids like giant wheel, columbus,bull ride, etc. Overall, its a must visit if you are in mussorie.

title: Beautiful Garden
review: Garden is well maintained, there are rides for children, boating, rabbits & restaurant. Many things in a small packet.

title: This place is specailly for kids.
review: Well, if you like flowers and garden then visit and its a nice place for children as its a fun zone for them and they will surely enjoyed it but make sure you need atleast 90 mins there.

title: Peace at its Best !
review: I started from my hotel near mall road and asking the localites since the weather was so good, decided to take a walk. For non-walkers you have the option of mini-vans moving and rickshaw.

title: company of beatiful flowers
review: Company garden is almost four kilometer from musoorie . Company garden is surrounded by many type of flowers and have good view and picture frindely.

title: Superb place
review: Well planted flowers and a great nursery. Appreciate the efforts in keeping the place so clean and green with seasonal flowers

title: Good place
review: Nice place for family and for lunch and boating. Its a place where u can do photo sessions. There's a lot to do for kids there. There are games and rides etc.

title: To strictly visit in case kids travelling with you
review: Nice collections of flowers. Little far away from city. Lots of fun for kids with trains and other amusement games. Food in restaurant is also good

title: Beautiful garden
review: Visited the place with parents. Great place in Mussoorie. Garden is well maintained and you will find varieties of flowers.

title: KIDS CORNER AND PHOTOGRAPHER'S DELIGHT
review: Photo photo and photo a place where you will love to get photographed the most and in case you have photography sense you keep on clicking, a lot to do for kids along with boating rides and games take eatables with you as its expensive and not so good quality there

title: Good for the traveler kind of person
review: Walking distance of 5 k.m to garden could be a good experience for a person . Not much things of attraction but one can find complete silence there

title: Beautiful Garden
review: Well maintained. Visited Company Bagh after school days...I must say its so much better now.

title: Not a must visit place in Mussoorie in this season
review: A short drive from the town its an okay garden with a wide variety of flowers and a few rides for kids. There is boating in a swimming pool size lake which is avoidable. The wax museum is over priced at Rs 50 per entry.

title: Good place to relax...
review: It's a beautiful garden, place for relax and also a lovely place for honeymooners....

title: Beautiful place, with lots of flowers and green plants
review: Nice place to unwind, if you're a flower lover. Although, we felt the flowers were repetitive, and there was not too much variety, the place is still quite beautiful. There are some other activities, like rides for kids, and small man made lake for boating (though the water is very dirty). Good place to spend 2-3 hours.

title: Best tourist place in Mussorie !!!
review: One of the best things you can enjoy in Mussorie if you are a true nature lover.  You will find excellent range of flowers there.  lots of rides for kids, boating.  You can enjoy food near boat rides and overlooking the scenic beauty of mountains.  and the best part is, they have a wax museum there now, which has wax statues of lots of famous people like Obamas, MJ, Angelina Jolie, Mr Bean etc.

title: Good garden
review: Good garden its fully children's location fall,food and jhools..good location near by kamti fall.fun zone for children's.

title: not to miss
review: if you are couple or you are with kids, it is the best place to visit in mussoorie. full of flowers, greenery, water, rides. little bit of eateries. reasonable fee. overall very good place for spending quality time with family. If you are lucky you will get little bit of drizzling. best place.

title: Nice place
review: Wax museum is too good their.Never forget to go there.Bull ride and flowers are so beautiful.Lovely place to visit.

title: Nice Garden
review: Its very well managed, worth visiting. For kids they got rides in there, and yes boating too. Got few restaurant's also in there, good food

title: cool place
review: it's another attraction point for tourist a simple place to visit 30 min walking distance from mall road you enjoy "raste" not more than

title: nice park with a good view of mussorie
review: i visited along with my family, my son liked it very much.. lot of fun filled games and attractions. we clicked snaps and had a excellent time

title: So so...
review: Its just a park in the lap of hills, crowded with different colors of clouds. A good place for kids and couples.

title: Nothing special
review: Nothing special about the place, is a regular garden on a hill. The only real benefit could be to click some pics though

title: Must see.
review: If u r in Mussoorie, u should visit this place. Nice cool garden, with the view to the valley. There is a nice fountain in the middle n many tall trees around with long, hanging branches. There r few eating joints also there.

title: ok experience
review: Nice view. some nice clicks we found there. over all average place to visit. you can spend 1 hour easily there

title: Nice place for kids
review: Nice place for kids and plants lovers otherwise otherwise just another garden.

title: beautiful!
review: There were many beautiful flowers and sceneries to see at the company garden.  I loved every moment of it.

title: Neat and nice
review: Very good place to go to, especially with kids.  Other than the fact that it is a well-maintained garden, there are several play areas for the children including a small boating lake.  There are several - actually, more than necessary - eating places in the park.  Their Food Court is rather nice with a very large sitting area.

title: Memorable Maggie of the company bagh.
review: we also visit this company bagh, here at end of the company bagh a small lake for boating, when we were here in the lake, suddenly the heavy rain started, we all enjoyed so much, and there also have a lil canteen from there after rain we took maggie, that was one the awesome maggie in my life. lots of flowers in this bagh we took so much pics here with flowers and a one jharna also there that was also giving attraction to us.

title: Fine
review: One time visiting place. Everything is man made but picturesque. Well connected with Mall road, one can take rickshaw or cab. Cycling could be more romantic.

title: Can see better things in Mussoorie
review: You shall visit this place only if you have nothing else to do, there are plenty of parks in your own city which will be better. Does not even have a decent trek. All said, it has some play area for kids and restaurants.

title: Okay
review: Nice place to visit for a short while with a lot of activities to do like boating in the man made lake

title: Must Visit
review: Again a very romantic place in Mussoorie with a abudence of natural beauty. Food court is also very good

title: Nice place for photo with flowers and waterfall
review: Varied and beautiful flowers

title: Nice prak
review: Good for visit especially with Kids and family, offers good view of valley as well. One of the most famous destination there. a bit out of town so without vehicle its difficult to visit there

title: Stupid place if you are not a 1 year old kid
review: We wasted our time going there. Please do not visit unless you are a family with a kid. Nothing to see really, Mussoorie has a lot better things to offer. You can find a big local crowd there, I guess due to the less number of places to visit. It's a waste of money and time.

title: Worth a visit to see what might have been.
review: A well cared for garden slightly marred by people selling photography of clients in gaudy costume and other sales outlets.

title: Well maintained garden
review: For leisurly moving in flowery garden,this is a good place. Approach to company garden, is realy good drive,even one may walk with valley view. Cycle rickshaw also available.Only problem is street photographers,invading your privacy every minute.

title: Beautiful surprize
review: Its a  nice garden with small rides for children. The flowers are awsome. The view from restaurant is amazing. Therez also a small lake where you can go for boating. The waterfall is the highlight. Overall a very nice experience with family.

title: Cute, but that's about it!
review: The garden is cute but doesn't have much to offer other than the kiddos. Thought the Maggie & the bhel made by the local vendors was very tasty.

title: Nice for children and parents pocket
review: This garden is made for kids and more over 6 rides are thier for kids. The price given by them is perfect only 20 rupees which suitable for pocket

title: A different Mussorie
review: Situated about 4 kms from Mall road, company garden is a good place to experience chilled evenings.

title: A MUST Visit for family with kids
review: Family with kids / children must not miss this garden. There are lots of entertainment possibilities , well maintained garden , good food joints and shopping place.

title: Beautiful place to spend time
review: I simply loved this garden. It has so much to offer in such a small place. In general I don't much enjoy visiting gardens because they r more or less similar but this one is quite different  There was waterfalls, beautiful landscaping, a small pond for boating,few restaurants and lot more to see in such a small place that u don't get tired and enjoy everything.

title: A nice place to visit  both for elderly and kids
review: The Munucipal Garden best known as Company Bagh is well maintained by local adminstration. There is lot of enjoyment for kids. One should visit this place whenever in Mussoorie as it gives great surroundings and very very flowery looks much different from a normal garden.

title: Not Worth
review: Nearly 3 km from the Mussoorie township this place is near LBS academy for IAS officers. Rickshaw or taxi is available to reach here. However there is nothing much to appreciate. An artificial small pond with some pedal boats and ill maintained garden. There is giant wheel for children. Not recommended.

title: Nicely maintained!
review: The park is at convenient distance from Mall. It is very diligently maintained except for the small boating lake. Those who are fond of gardening may see varieties of blooming species and get information about their cultivation. There are several things everyone may enjoy amidst scenic beauty and pleasant weather.

title: ok
review: nicely maintained where you get to breath fresh air in crowded mussorie. food court serves decent food though hyegeine in washrooms is an issue

title: Lots of flowers for picture taking
review: A medium sized stepped garden that has few lawns lined with nice flowering plants, a fountain, a small waterfall, a mini water body for boating and many food outlets. For children, there are good options of rides and games too. The entry ticket is Rs 18 per adult but the municipal tax for cars is Rs 100.

title: osm
review: love to visit that place at the top of the hill.....

title: Beautiful Flowers
review: it have good scenic beauty, located on top, boating experience as well.

title: Beautiful Park!
review: The park is beautiful but the way you reach is the best. Try to reach Park through rickshaw! It is only Rs.300. Wind is so divine and pleasant. As park, it is properly maintained. There are beautiful flowers, Artificial waterfall and lake. Lots of rides and eating joints. But Rickshaw will wait for only 1 hour 30 minutes so plan properly.

title: Beautiful only because of nature.
review: Someone should really really clean this place up. You can't have plastic bottles & packets floating in your waterfall & call it a garden.

title: Beautiful Garden
review: I recommend to goto this place while going to Kempty fall and if you have 2-3 extra hours. There are good flowers and a very small water fall adds to it.

title: Worth visiting
review: We went there on rickshaw in first week of July.it was awesome ride. New experience for whole of the family. Entry fee of the garden is unjustified especially for young children. The decor of the garden is average. More of commercial place than a quiet romantic garden. Can be tried by bored family tourists!

title: nothing new
review: Its a small garden. nothing much to enjoy. restaurant inside is over priced. there was small lake without any maintenance.

title: Beautiful and well maintained park.
review: A must visit in your itinerary if you love nature and also a very good place for kids, your little ones will love this place.

title: nice outing
review: very closely situated from mussoorie.. rickshawalas have fixed rates for the whole trip.  and the best way to reach here.. feel the fresh air..

title: Just OK
review: For Kids only. Take a rickshaw and visit this place. Its like a botanical garden and kids can enjoy a lot while adults can sip coffee.

title: Just okay
review: The garden is just okay, flowers and grass are well maintained, though the overall garden area is very small. We went with our son, he enjoyed a lot because of a lot of child rides being present.

title: BEUTIFUL
review: We took rickshaw from Mall Road and visited Company Garden Mussoorie.It is nice,little and beautiful garden in the outskirts of Mussoorie in the hilly area.. There are beautiful flowers, waterfall,artificial lake, few rides,boating and restaurant inside it.One could enjoy here and capture few photographs.

title: Lovely garden u must see...
review: Usually visiting a garden doesn't seem that good an option if you r not a hard core nature lover...but trust me this is one garden I fell in love with..so many beautiful flowers...amazing spots to get urself clicked specially that artificial waterfall...and then u have food joints inside the garden...

title: Very well maintained park
review: Good place for a half day outing specially with children. Well maintained park with lots of flowers, waterfall and a small lake with boating facility. Children thoroughly enjoyed the rides. Clean food court serving delicious stuff with good variety.

title: amazing place
review: this was an amazing experience,garden is scattered in a huge area,many types of gaming activities tempting the visitor.food quality was not up to the mark.it can be much better.boating is also there,parents can rest over there good lush greenry all over the garden

title: Nice garden
review: The garden is nice. the upkeep work was going when I visited. The garden has few rides for kids and a place to eat.

title: Beautiful Garden
review: Company Garden is one of the major highlights of Mussoorie. The journey to the place starts from Mall Road by cycle rickshaw. The place is 3 kms from Mall road. The to and fro journey including waiting time of 1 hour costs Rs. 300/- which is quite reasonable. On the way you will come across the IAS Academy. The garden is really very well maintained with beautiful flowers all around. It has a peddle boating pond and small rides for kids. The place is a must to visit.

title: A beautiful garden in Mussorie
review: One can visit the Municipal garden by car after visiting the Kempty falls. There is another  alternative - hiring a rickshaw from the mall road. The Garden boasts beautiful landscape gardening and a picturesque artificial water fall - ideal location for clicking the camera. There are professional photographers hovering all around, who deliver the photos immediately.

title: Worth a visit
review: Crowded but nice. Maintained well..lots of flowers. Kids have fun. Try and walk down to enjoy the scenery.

title: Very Nice With thousands of Flowers
review: Very Nice Place to hang on...Rose garden,boating,food,Photo Shoot ,Dragon Swing ..overall very good...

title: Well Maintained
review: There is nothing specially go there to see but is a good place to just sit and get some sunlight in winters. The entire garden lawn was covered with leaves shed by the trees. After 4pm there is very little sunlight coming thru though

title: Awesomely Beautiful
review: One of the most beautiful gardens I have ever seen in my life....colorful, romantic, British, has rides for children with restaurant, Waterfalls, boating..it was like a Mini-world in itself. My Mommy-daddy were here for here honeymoon, and then 22 after they took us the place n trust me it is as meant for family as for couples....it is indeed romantic and fun!!

title: A Must visit
review: I have been to this place many times and every time I going indulge in some different activity. When I was unmarried I had enjoyed boating here, when I got married, we took pics and pics of views and exotic flowers, when I took my kids, they enjoyed the toy train and small amusement park.

title: Beautiful place.
review: A kind of garden one always wants to be in. Excellent place to relax and enjoy the nature. very well maintained and clean. There are a lot of activities and rides for children and many places to eat and relax. Must visit.

title: hyped place
review: this is not at all worth watching. a wastage of time and money both to watch this place.i have been this place in june ,2015. this is a bit small garden.

title: Awesome Company Garden
review: Brilliant. I had a bad hotel but luckily it was near company garden. The garden has 5-6 rides and was really a good experience but be cautious about the Columbus ride is dangerous. At Rs. 20/- each it was good. then they have created a small pond wherein you can do some boating as well.

title: Very Good Garden
review: Garden is awesome. It is kept very neat and clean. You have artificial waterfall & lake in the mid of the garden. Its an ideal place to capture some really good photographs. Professional photographers are also there in the park asking you to click your photographs from them. Flowers of this park are too good. And u have rides for children which is 20 rs per head. So ur kids will also have a real good time there also. Some small food joints are there also in the park.

title: Nice Flowers
review: Nice garden with so many activities for children, Food court in the middle. Don't take food from dhaabas exactly near the entrance its very bad in taste and unhygienic too.

title: ok
review: ok type of a place but would like to mark it as a tourist trap. food was pathetic, lake quite small for boating and only plus point were the rides.

title: Lovely place especially if u like flowers
review: we wanted to spend about 30 min in the Garden but ended up spending almost 2 hrs. There are so many different colored roses and the size is like what i have never seen before.

title: Good place to visit
review: It was a nice experience with a mixture of nyc view , games , shopping , shikara ride.....it was a amazing time pass

title: Good outing
review: The place has a wel maintained garden with a large variety of plants and trees. A small lake has provision for paddle boating.

title: AMAZING PLACE
review: Must visit!! great place, lovely view and such beautiful flowers and water fountains, it was worth going there with my family :) it is well maintained and thee fee is reasonable and inside theres boating, eateries and so many flowers!!!!

title: Perfect place for Camera Pics
review: Nice lovely place to shoot, Garden has very good nursery and variety of flowers. It has artificial waterfall and small boating area. Overall small & nice place to spend few hours.

title: Good place to visit
review: Company Garden is a must visit place in Mussoorie.A decent place for Groups & Families.Its not very far from Mall road.You can get Rickshaw from Mall road for Company garden.

title: Enjoyed
review: Beautiful Waterfall, Fountains, Flowers, Fun Rides for kids....but very small lake area for boating. overall worth a visit...

title: Good place for kids..
review: The garden provide attractions for grown ups as well as kids.  You can boat, ride the kid rides and get your photos clicked in fancy dresses.  The fast food joint provides a good variety of snacks and food.

title: Akin to Mapro Garden Mahabaleshwar
review: Flowers aplenty look really good. The food court needs improvising though. Activities for kids were pretty basic and dated concepts.

title: A good place for children
review: I had been in this Garden for 2 hour with my twin kids, who were very much excited to see this Garden. They enjoyed with different colors of flowers, since they are in class one to identify name of flowers with color was there most liking followed by sliding.

title: Great place for kids
review: This place has changed now, I was here 15 yes ago and was expecting broken benches and hut restaurant. Fortunately it is close to the hotel we were staying. We came walking and enjoyed it well. Garden is well kept and have lot of activities for small kids. Eating out places are in abundance and reasonably priced too. Restaurant has good view of valley.

title: Bollywood set
review: The whole place looked like a Bollywood set- a waterfall, small bridge, flowers all around and a pack of photographers hounding you, not letting even a moment's peace to enjoy the surroundings.

title: Great Garden
review: It Is One Of The Excellent Garden Located In Mussorie It Has Artificial Waterfall Musical Waterfall And All Sort Of Things That A Garden should Have  Great Garden Visit To This Garden Should Not Be Missed

title: Mussoorie Holidays
review: It is Garden with small pond (too small) with boats. As such Mussoorie has very limited site seeing so you can visit if you have ample time. Nothing Great. You don't mind miss this if you find time too short.

title: Only flowers. ...nothing else
review: A small artificial waterfall. ...lots of beautiful flowers. ..few shops..boating. .all r good..overall good..

title: Boring
review: There is nothing to do at this place except walking a lot. Magic show, small zoo are all boring. restaurant is also not serving anything interesting. You can avoid visiting this place.

title: Nice garden, you can spend 2-3 hours if you like gardening!
review: Garden with lot of flowers, small boating lake, games for kids! Little waterfall for clicking pics, try to go in the evening!

title: Botanical Garden
review: The route to reach garden is fantastic. All green,green and green everywhere. Varieties of trees,flowers and fauna. Garden nicely maintained, varieties of season flowers,roses. Very nice and quiet place to hang out. Kids can enjoys some rides and boating also.

title: Wonderful place to visit
review: Must visit when you are at Mussoorie. Wide spread of flowers and excellent Nursery. Treat to eyes. Artificial waterfall, rides and a pond with restaurant next to it makes the place a complete package for visit of an hour or two.

title: nice time with kids
review: You can enjoy the park if you go with your kids. otherwise you can skip this.  The park has a nice man made waterfall which is a spot where you can take your pic.

title: Beautiful flowers
review: There are lot of flowers, you can see at this place . I love this place . It was a good experience for me.  Just go there and enjoy the tress, landscape and a small lake for boating.

title: Nice Garden
review: Well maintained picturistic garden. Pleasant walk around.

title: All the potted plants - geranium, cineraria, cyclamen were in bloom and it was gorgeous.
review: The closer to the tourist season, especially school vacation times, the more crowded it will be. Its small, and can be visited in an hour.

title: An average place
review: This place is quite near to the Mall Road and can be visited anytime of the day. this place is good for small strolls and excellent flowers on display.

title: Excellent Place
review: This is an excellent place with over 5000 variety of flowers and trees etc. It has an artificial waterfall too. Photographers are available. There is a fee of Rs. 18 per person and it's open till 7 pm during summer and till 6 pm during winters.

title: A beautiful  place to watch
review: I visited on 27.04.2015.A garden 3-4 km from Library end of Mall Road.

title: Lovely place to relax amongst greenery and peace.
review: Nice place to go with kids or for young couples. The garden is well maintained, the toy paddle boat facility is very nice. Wish the range of restaurants were better and bar facilities were present.

title: Not for everyone....
review: Company gardens was more for children's entertainment rather than a tourist destination although well maintained and lovely flowers. Price very good!

title: Just a Garden
review: Nothing special - just a small garden among the midst of all the hustle bustle of Mussorie - even here its crowded with people. In India its hard to escape constant presence of humanity everywhere. I would skip it, But it may be a place for little kids to run around among the flowery bushes for a while.

title: had a nice time
review: oh well, this was a place to be. had fun with the family, a nice little a boat ride, tea and maggie. some activities for the kids are there and playing with snow is fun.

title: Just like normal municipality Garden..... time waste
review: This place is picnic spot for kids with variety of flower plants and paddle boats. there is nothing to explore. visiting this place with expectation to view something interesting you will not get anything except kinds roaming with their parents and newly married couples.

title: Amazing park with peace and natural view
review: It has a flower nursery and boating. Also small man made water fall is a great location for great clicks. very peaceful and has a nice restaurant as well

title: A garden with a lake
review: there is hardly anything worth watching in Company Garden. It has a very small lake where boating could be done. The garden is vast but nothing much to do.There is a small water fall worth watching.ONE can see flowers and plants grown in the park. ON AN average park with not much activities,

title: Greenery Calls
review: Its always nice to be one with nature. Company Garden has it all on the platter. Loved boating in the small artificial lake. Sipping a steaming hot lemon-honey-ginger tea in the food-court, sitting by the window offering stunning views of the hills was something I still cannot forget. Yeah... there was ice-fall too...

title: Company Garden, Mussourie
review: Nicely maintained garden few KM away from Gandhi Chowk. One can go by rickshaw from Gandhi Chowk. Nursery in the garden is good. Boat ride facility is there.

title: Must visit place
review: Beautiful big place. Lots and lots of beautiful flowers.

title: Great flowers
review: We happened to visit the company garden in Mussorie during or visit to this hill station.

title: Too Good
review: Company Garden is a break from your hotel  room. Just go there and enjoy the tress, landscape and a small lake for boating.

title: Good place to visit in Spring
review: Since it was spring, garden had full blooming flowers all around. Very well maintained gardens. The small boating lake and petty restaurants are an eyesore.

title: Might have been great when the Britishers were here!!
review: Once again, the parking fees, the entry fees and all other god foresaken fees welcome you to this dilapidated park. It would've been great maybe a century ago. Right now, it just looks like the authorities forgot the maintain it. But there are some small rides and a tiny restaurant in case you're in for it. Not something I'd recommend at all.

title: Horticulture at it's finest
review: A well maintained garden with a lot of variety. Some place to get a whiff of fresh air, surrounded by natural beauty.

title: Its OK
review: There is not really much to do in Company Garden or in all of Mussoorie unless you are there to just chill, I went to this place during my 2 day visit to Mussoorie and it was an ok distraction, just a lot of flora and fauna, however really enjoyed the restaurant food there,  and Columbus ride was ok too.

title: Nice way to spend your day!
review: I would say if you are in Mussourie and have done your round of the mall road and don't want to go any farther, like kempty falls etc., then, Company garden is a nice way to spend your day. You might want relax in the gardens, do a small round of boating (though it's only a small pond), or just have some food or snacks in their nicely built food court.

title: Could have been better
review: Listed as one of the main attractions of Mussouries, it was a little of a disappointment. It could have been better. Maybe families with one children may enjoy this because of the swings, but there is hardly anything else. I overheard a lady at the resort with a small daughter telling the staff that her daughter enjoyed playing on the swings and she was taking her there again.

title: do visit this place if you are with kids
review: kids will love this place also the park is a good place to relax for grown ups. this place is on the tour buses that ply from library chowk. visit and enjoy this place.

title: Nice place for all ages
review: My wife and I visited this lovely place on 08-02-2015, when it was really very cold. Good entertainment like games, fun rides, fountains, waterfalls, boating etc. One main flaw was pathways not properly maintained. Also maps indicating what is where are missing. Otherwise a very beautiful spot for killing time and enjoying oneself.

title: Average in winter but will be excellent in Summer
review: The introduction was paying 100 rup to park the car which was double the entry cost for three adults! Visiting in February, the gardens had little colour but I imaging in summer it wuld be colourful and spectacular. The only colour was in the nursery and some new plants being planted.

title: An awesome experience
review: The company garden is a must-see in Mussoorie, especially for the couples. It is 6 km from the mall road and easily accessible. I always prefer having own vehicle to roam in Mussoorie but getting inside Mall road will attract Rs.150 toll.

title: You can skip it
review: There is nothing much to see in Company Garden. It isn't worth visiting. Some varieties of flowers, one small man-made water fall, one small man-made lake, and one restaurant, which shouldn't have been there ( i mean not worth it).

title: waste of time
review: place is a waste of time. its 5-6 km far from the heart of city, quite boring place. have only flowers around. even if you love watching flowers from the perspective of hobby or science, there isn't much variety.

title: nice greenery garden
review: we are visit company garden with family in October 2014 Diwali time good garden and greenery in garden

title: best place for children in mussorrie
review: Thrilling view, awesome restaurant, playfull rides, boating, hot pakodas are the few attraction of company bagh. Entry fee is rs 18 per adult. There are few rides which costs u rs 20 each. Restaurant is fine, their Chinese food is awesome and rate is reasonable.Boat ride is fine but water should be more clean. Restaurant toilet can be used by person which is clean other toilets need maintenance. families with children can find this place awesome for family outing.

title: Worsted place
review: It just a park with some greenery and a small waterfall.for visit this you have to pay entry of rs 18 per person encluding childer od more than 3 year age and when you enter,you fell cheated because there is nothing special to see.i advise to avoid it if you have limited time for stay in Mussoorie.

title: Children & Family Piknik place
review: Company Garden can be a perfect place for family & children hangout with boating ......................

title: A so so place
review: A place with not much to offer. Swings for kids and a small manmade waterfall.IIt do have variety of flowers. i found snow on my trip there.

title: Dont Go, Waste Of Time
review: Just few flowers, that's it about this place. Food code inside the park is good and food quality and taste is fantastic.

title: Nice but average garden
review: We liked the nice little waterfall, the really high rose bushes (in fact the highest I have ever seen), the views that you get from the restaurant. We had visited right after a whole night of heavy rains, and found no flowers at all and an almost barren, soggy park. It has a small amusement park too.

title: Nice Place To Hang Around
review: Company Garden has always been famous for spending some time along with family members. You can even cook food at your hotel's kitchen and carry it along at Company Garden to have it with family members. Otherwise, you can enjoy delicious Aloo Parantha and Maggie at Company Garden's Food Joint. Also mixed pakoras as worth enjoying. They have grown different and beautiful varieties of flowers at Company Garden.

title: Bit of fun
review: After a long day trekking from Mussoorie to Happy Valley and Kempty fall the previous day, we decided to take it easy and go to Company gardens even though it has fairly average reviews here. I think there is a shorter trek from the library but we took the road here and it is signposted strangely along the way as being anywhere between 1.5 - 6km away from Mussoorie! Its approx 40minute walk, very pleasant, no major up or downhills. There is an 18rupee entrance fee per person. The gardens have a nursery at the top level, not much was in bloom however it is February, then some gardens to stroll around - nothing spectacular. The walk there is probably more scenic than the actual gardens! But nice atmosphere, we had some momos and spring rolls in the restaurant and strolled around the amusements, gathering a large crowd of supporters when Aidan took his turn with the mechanical bull!

title: Enjoy
review: It is a Beautiful , small Garden having Lot of Flowers , a small Water fall, Swings for Kids.

title: OK
review: Compared to the scenic beauty that Mussoorie offers, the Company Garden does not stand out as a great place to visit.

title: we maintained
review: this is a very nice garden in mussoorie....there are a variety of flowers and they are very well  maintained...there is also a small waterfall in the park...you can also do boating inside...there are a number of children rides and also there is a small train ride for the kids as well....the kids can have a nice time..good place for people who have keen interest in flower photography....

title: walk to company garden
review: an early morning walk or later into the evening. Don't forget to have hot paratas at the roadside shop on the way back. Wonderful place for some peace and quiet. You'll find it very romantic. Take a book along and read some poetry. Nothing beats that !

title: Oks type, Not a very great place to visit
review: its just like any other garden,

title: A short trip with your beloved sweetheart can be enjoyed
review: Spend some peaceful time with your beloved sweetheart to enjoy the flora & fauna here.

title: Company Garden Mussoorie
review: Highly overrated visiting point.  Not so good rides.  The kids were just sitting idle here.  The only good thing is that there are good flowers to look around.

title: not that great
review: You can get to this place by taking a rickshaw from the mall road, you have to take a return rickshaw for the same.

title: Only visit for kids
review: Its is very small by my standards of a public park. I went mainly for boating but the lake ( more like a pond) is manmade and very small/dirty. Although we did do a boat ride which my child enjoyed I din't think it was worth the trip. They had a small amusement park area too , we did the big boat ride and mini train. The big boat ride was quite unsafe as there were no belts and the boat inclines almost 70-80 degrees.I would skip this if I dint have a child, definetly.

title: Didn't feel like Garden at all
review: May be it was just before snowfall, so the grass was covered with dead leaves. Photographers behind tourists in digital age.. :-(

title: Very nice place
review: Well maintained, nice place and very calm. Would have loved not to see the kids rides inside this and more space being given to natural landscaping

title: flowers
review: its quite an ok garden with a few varieties of flowers....nothing great

title: Small but elegant
review: A small place as compare to the great garden, but this place has some amazing featured which makes it worth a visit.  Don't try the boating unless you have kids who insist,

title: Very good maintained garden
review: Please make sure that you go in smaller vehicle as tempo traveler and mini bus is not allowed hence you have to walk at least minimum 1.5 KM oneway

title: Lovely ride to a lovely place
review: The best way to get to Company Garden is via rickshaw. It gets extremely cold even when the sun is up. The entire stretch is beautiful. You cross the training centre for successful UPSC scorers and lovely cafes and libraries on the way.

title: Peaceful only early mornings
review: It's like a public garden anywhere. I wonder why tourists go all the way to roam in this average garden, eat paranthas and noodles, and do boating in the tiny artificial pond. Kids play on rides, but it could be a garden anywhere, nothing distinct.

title: Thats good
review: Really very nice and attractive...very well maintained also..good place for 2 hours..very good for children also

title: beautiful park
review: One of the go-to places in Mussoorie. Very well kept and entertaining for few hours. Very family suited.

title: An average garden but good for flower lovers
review: Its a very small garden, decently maintained. You can take a rickshaw from library chowk.

title: Well maintained and very good flowers
review: We went there as family and my kid enjoyed very much. Flowers and view at best. There is restaurant inside company gardens who serves decent food and good cleanness.

title: Nice
review: It's  a nice small park with children rides and boating facility which could be reached by taking cycle rickshaw from gandhi chowk. There are food stalls and paranthas could be tried in cold months. You could also go for photograph in different dresses available on hire.

title: Average Place !!!!
review: There are few attractions in mussorie one can go for and this place is one of them.  Average place but once you are in mussorie you can try out this place. Children will like this place as few rides are there for them and they can enjoy.

title: Pleasant outing
review: Memorable place . The place is maintained nice and good place to relax during your vacation looking for calm and quality time .

title: Go walking..!
review: Hahaha....garden...yes the garden is well maintained....and good timepass though it's  5kms from libarary ..would advice go walking and enjoy the view

title: Plain Garden!!
review: This is simply a garden nothing else. Everything in this is man made(even a waterfall). Go only if want to click few photos with flowers or trees.

title: A good outing For Children
review: A must visit if you are in mussorie and have children along with you though a little far and cannot walk to the place

title: samall garden with boating
review: it place to relax go for boating and get reasonable quality food at the food court in the company garden. entry fee is Rs15 per person

title: Good place to go with kids
review: It's a normal garden with lots of different flowers. There is a small boat ride n some other activities which can be fun for kids. It's a peaceful place n better than kempty falls where you ll see loads of crowd.

title: beautiful flower's
review: this place is located some 5 km from the main market, if you want to visit at this place you need to hire car or cycle rickshaw, you need to hire with return journey as you won't get transport from there to market, this place has good verity of flowers, here you can enjoy boating in small lake, here you will find restaurants serving south Indian fast food and meals also, overall this place is good for visit with small children's, for them to play and enjoy boating rides...

title: A piece of Kashmir in Mussoorie
review: This particular garden is a perfect getaway spot from hustle bustle of the mussoorie streets..beautiful view, relaxing atmosphere and they have a nice restaurant too..kids are well pampered here with all the rides. Don't forget to bring your camera..!

title: Garden
review: Old garden maintained nicely. There is a small dhaba in the garden. Though place is not very shiny but serves very good basic food like parathas, chhole etc.

title: Nice Garden and Views
review: A must visit place if you like flowers or if you are visiting with kids. You can either reach there by car or rickshaw-ride. I preferred rickshaw. If you go by rickshaw, firstly it is quite slow so we will get time with our beloved. Secondly, you can see sight-seen as you are not driving. Rickshaw person will charge Rs 260/- (govt.fixed price)for an hour. There are adventure activities for kids, like Bull-ride, train and glides. There are also good restaurant inside the garden to enjoy good hygienic food.

title: Nice time pass for kids
review: This place lies on the way to kempty fall. You can have a visit here during going to or coming from kempty fall. There are many rides for kids. Food court is really good. There is a small artificial lake for boating. Botanical garden with many species of plants & flowers is worth a walk along. Must visit for 2-3 hrs with kids.

title: Nice Place in Mussorie
review: Nice place to hangout, great view, fall and garden with boating etc.

title: Clean & Beautiful
review: One of the few places that have been maintained well.

title: Garden with photo opputunities
review: It is a nicely maintained garden wihch provides you few good photogenic opportunities, esp in front of the water fall and flowering bushes. For small kids there are few rides/swings and a small lake with boating is also there. Overall a nice place for a family with kids to spend some leisure time.

title: Wonderfull place to be in with kidz while at Mussourie
review: Was pleasantly surprised to visit Company garden after a long time. Excellent landscaping, amazing garden, boat & joy rides for kids, good food, you've got it all at this place. Must visit if you are traveling with kids, they will enjoy every moment of it.

title: Must visit place
review: This is one of the must go places in Mussoorie,  Went here with my family and everyone loved this place.

title: Well kept place
review: The lovely flower nursery is a must see. All woman staff is nice. Photography should be allowed and I disliked that

title: Time Pass
review: Don't go by the name you will be disappointed. This is kind of an amusement park having boat rides and other games to spend time with your friends/family.

title: NOT WHAT I EXPECTED
review: All that you find there is photographer's asking to take pictures of you and that too is very expensive. A small boating place in the garden is terrible.

title: Not the must watch but do watch place
review: Company garden as the name explains about itself that it is garden of English age. Nothing much to see in this place but good place for travelers to click pics. You can have pic in front of waterfall in himachali dress. Best thing is if you can bargain with photographers to click your pics in your camera or mobile. They will charge you some money but that thing will remain in your camera and you can take a hard copy anytime you want in future. You can have nice tea and maggie outside the garden.

title: very good
review: so many differnt flower is found her with well maintain. only problem is no parking facility proper even after take 100 rs charge for parking

title: Calm place to relax
review: It is soothing to find a place in mussorrie where you have a stroll among beautiful flowers, waterfall, Boating. Overall a good place where kids will especially enjoy.

title: Not bad...
review: The company garden is almost 5 Kms away from Library end. It's on Kempty Fall road. One has to take a rickshaw at an exiborant price to reach there. The garden is maintained well. The are decent rides for kids. The photographers will big you there but that is common everywhere in Mussoorie. Overall a nice place. Good food options available too

title: good one to spend couple of hours
review: it is a lovely garden with some beautiful flowers.lots of sports activities which we enjoyed like kids.

title: Nice to spend an hour or two
review: Its really well maintained and we can spend two to three hours. There is man made waterfall also and small lake where they are charging for boating.

title: Very beautifull and colourfull place !
review: I have visited Company garden Mussoorie in 2012. It is a very beautiful place. There are so many variety of flowers there and it is also a good picnic spot. There are also available fun packed activities like boating and bull riding. There is also a restaurant in this garden with good quality of food. I have enjoyed so much there !

title: Nice Garden with beautiful nursery
review: Nice Garden with beautiful nursery. The rides are good for the kids but the boating area is a dud. The space for a baot to roll is far less & seems unnecessary. The garden has some beautiful flowers & a nice creation of Fall.

title: An average park
review: It is a small park and with an artificial fall. Restaurant there is not very good. crowd was not good. there is a small amusement park also for kids .there is a small artificial lake for boating.

title: Walk up the road you will enjoy
review: Not a great place to be. If you have much time in hand and want to enjoy a peaceful walk hand in hand simply walk upto the place. If you enjoy walking - walk up only then. Else take a rickshaw from Library chowk. Company garden is basically a park.

title: GOOD PLACE TO HANG OUT IF WITH KIDS
review: This place offers a range of rides for the small kids. Thus kids can enjoy yhe place a lot.

title: Good palce to visit with kids
review: Nice place. Food available. Boating can also be enjoyed. One can enjoy nature's beauty in man made creation.

title: Garden with view
review: We have visited  in evening. It was pleasure &  kids enjoyed the rides. Visit to food court.  Have  evening tea with view.  It was good time pass.

title: Coulourful park
review: It was more than a simple park and well maintained. You may go there. my baby enjoyed to be there. There is a small waterfall and lake for boating.

title: nothing better than a city park..
review: you reach there after a lot of exertion and time..you again find those small roadside snack bars spread allover and photographers running after you...Inside the park of course there are some good variety of flowers but nothing special...

title: A must visit while in Mussoorie
review: After having appetizing lunch, when the sun is bright one can take a rickshaw (we paid INR 250 for both way from Mall Road) and go on exploring the curves of the roads and lush green shady trees till they reach the Company Gardens. The place is perfectly built to relax in the beauty of nature, although its a average sized park but it has mini versions of everything you need to have a good time and place turns out be worth visiting. Photographers will no doubt follow you everywhere just in case they manage to get you snapped in their camera out of your frustration or an attempt to evade them having let take them photographs and eventually let you have a peaceful time with family. Inside the park, you have a mini fountain, mini waterfall, mini pond with a boat ride too, also there are game stalls but I liked the Bull ride in personal opinion that's a must try if you never have and only watched it on TV, now is the time to ride the bull. They give u 2 rounds of trial in a single ticket so seems a fair deal. There are other games too, and good variety of flowers and place is quite colorful with mild rush during the day time. There's also a greenhouse-type restaurant and open air types, gives u awesome option of time pass.

title: A delightful visit
review: Beautiful scenery, nice dining options in the food court, and some attractions for the kids.

title: Excellent Family Recreational Place
review: It has all the pluses with natural beauty to artifical water fall and lake to mutiple joyrided for kid to excellent food court. Overall best place to hangout in mussourie.

title: must not miss
review: not as big as botanical garden of otty, but you will enjoy your visit. good place for selfie with beautiful flowers.

title: Nice place
review: The garden, very will kept, is a place for the tourists to take photos, have an outing, enjoy boat rides etc.

title: Must Visit
review: I think it is a must visit place, lots of flowers make you refresh. A small lake, few rides for children and good restaurant makes a memorable place.

title: Very Good place with Boating.
review: It is good. But difficult to reach. It has good restaurant also. Artificial Lake and Falls also.

title: nice place to spend min 3 hrs
review: a must visit place of mussoorie..a nice garden well maintained..one small waterfall is also there..on top of that you can find a nice nursery..food outlets as well as a good self service restaurant is there, decorated by some unique and nice flower pots...

title: Garden with beatiful flowers!
review: Company Garden which is also known as Municipal Garden is just 3-4 km from Mussoorie on the way to Kempty Falls. It’s a great place to hang out with children. There are many types of beautiful flowers which will make you feel fresh. Many swings in the park for children. You can enjoy boating also in a small artificial lake, food court which serves nice food with good rates. Overall it’s a must visit in Musssoorie.

title: well maintained garden
review: it is good get away point, however due to shop on the places you will feel disappointed, but the garden has good flower and good grass, i would prefer to walk outside the garden on the track road.

title: Waste of Time
review: small water hole tank with paddle boats, shikara stinking water. Artificial waterfall. A nursery/green house is the only slight good point with lovely flowers in April

title: Very small garden, suitable for kids
review: Its a very small garden with a mini dirty pond ( mini lake ) and too many photographers to harass you. This place is not suitable for anybody coming from a big city, small townies might enjoy it. Place is very famous in mussoorie but worth your time only if you got extra. Its a regular municipality park with an artificial fall.

title: Nice place for couples and families
review: It's nice beautiful place to spend some quality time with your partner or family. You can enjoy the nature and if you love different types of flowers and plants , this is the place for you. Even if you don't have that interest , the company garden is still for you as it provides awesome views and gives you great pics ;)

title: nice recreation spot for kids; has bits of  everything
review: well located and hand rickshaw and car commute possible

title: best palce in mussoorie after mall road
review: Nice collection of trees and flower plants. Activities like guns, boating, magic show for kids and an average restaurant. Most important thing is peace, calmness associated with the palce and natural beauty of plantation. Try to go on foot through short-cut rather than vehicles. Nice walk. Must be a part of trip to mussoorie.

title: Good place to visit
review: Beautiful varieties of flowers, man made waterfall, fountains & a small lake with boating facilities and small rides for children. Dont forget to ride columbus (Rs.20/- most of the ride are at nominal price).  Most important thing is peace, calmness associated with the palce and natural beauty of plantation. The view from this place is really beautiful. Try telescope(Rs.10/-) to view long range mountains  Food court is beautifully decorated with different kind of flowers, but was average and served hot.

title: Nice outing with family
review: Since most of the hill stations do not have lot of tourist attractions, Company Bagh is a nice place for an afternoon. The garden is nice and clean with lot of variety of plants. It has some good rides for the kids to enough with a small lake for boating. Overall a nice place but not a must visit.

title: Beautifully maintained garden
review: Beautiful garden with a small water-fall, an artificial lake with boats, fountains, flowers and a nicely decorated restaurant.

title: Nice garden for timeshare
review: This company garden is developed by the municipality of Mussoorie & has lot of artificial gardens flushed with many varieties of rare flowers. A good place to enjoy with family & friends.

title: Enjoyable moments in Company Gardens
review: One easily reach to company gardens there are 2 options available: Taxi and Rickshaw (Equivalent rates). I opted rickshaw because as expected it provided me close scenic views, cold chilling breeze to enjoy, enjoyable journey to gardens.

title: A Must Visit Place
review: Company Bagh is an excellent place to visit... Its a very big and very well maintained garden with lots of flora & fuanna... This garden has a beautiful water fall also... it also has a very huge food court which serves everything from breakfast to lunch and evening tea & fast food.... The garden has many swings for children.... the charges for these swings are very reasonable... One can ride a swing at a cost of Rs. 20/ only... The entry fee of the garden is Rs. 18/- per head.... The major attraction of Company Bagh is the boating place... One has to shelve out Rs. 75/- per head for a 15 minutes boating.. It has peddled boats also.... there is a small market in the garden with 10-12 shops....I strongly recommend to visit this place...

title: Company Bagh
review: Nice place to visit. There is boating, waterfall and nice garden. The air is fresh and a restaurant is also there. If you have time then go on a cycle rickshaw

title: In the Night Garden
review: This nice little garden lies nestled in a corner on the way to the Kempty Falls. Nothing like what BBC had to offer to their young viewers deal but still an option to relax far from the maddening crowd of Mussourie above. The garden is nice with flowers and some playing area for kids and has stupendous views of the city hills. A few little waterfalls add to the touch and some strolling space will make your wife happy like mine when we went there for our Honeymoon in 2008.

title: beaufifully maintained place
review: We always wanted to stay away from crowds in mussoorie so stayed at cloud end forest resort but came down to visit this place. Very well maintained, full of beautiful flowers, rides and boating for kinds and food court. Nice place for fun and photography.

title: Great!
review: It could be less commercialized but it was great and it has its moments and really nice views!

title: Nice Garden!
review: A 15 min Rickshaw drive from Library!

title: complete waste of time and money
review: its the worst way to spend your time and money. the garden is extremely small and one day must have been nice and quiet. now it has a huge ugly food court and the gardens look like a small attachment.. a fraud played on all tourists....please avoid it.

title: awesome place
review: A must watch place....basically 4 km away from mussoorie...this is a very beautiful garden...A very pleasent place to watch

title: A Garden of Attraction
review: Company Garden is situated on the road to Kempty falls in Mussoorie and has different type of flowere. Inside a restaurant and artificial fountain is also constructed. Flowers can be attractive for nature lovers. The place is neither very fantastic nor ignorable. You have to pay heavy parking fee (they charged us Rs 100/ in March 2013) and entry fee Rs 10/ per head is for the park (Company Bagh). You can choose the sight for photography.

title: Don't take the effort!
review: It is just a glorified tourist spot with a small man made waterfall and a small lake for boating which isnt even the size of a budget hotel's pool! Not worth the effort!

title: Not a bad way to spend a couple of hours
review: It's a lovely large garden. There's not much to do except roam around, see an artificial waterfall, see the natural views that Mussoorie has, eat some (veg) food. It's a 30 minute cycle rick ride away from Mussoorie. Well worth it, and good fun.

title: eye pleasing
review: One of the best gardens I have seen with artificial waterfall,lake,boating and nice food courts and games for children . Go early afternoon as it becomes very chilly in the evening . A must visit but only by autos with cycles as you will enjoy the 4 km ride from the mall with beautiful scenery around.

title: Enjoy company Bagh in  company of your family
review: Enchanting sight of colorful gardens ,exotic waterfalls ,lake n beople cheering while boating make this garden indeed a not to be mised spot for Mussorie tourists . Beautiful visuals of mountain ,valley n Deodars make d visit worth it .With sips of tea or coffee  hot pakoda ,stuffed parathas or maggie one can combat  chill in food court .Swings n games for children provide enough scope for  d little ones .Rs 18 is not a high price for few hrs to enjoy specially when Sun is shining !

title: Time for a break with a good lunch
review: This place has a scenic beauty with good plants & flowers all around. Few options for kids too with swings & not to forget it has a good food option restaurant though food was ok.

title: wow what a place..everything was there..
review: it was a lovely place ...cloudy ..windy...n peaceful place..to much crowed was there..every one was enloying a lot ..there with there family..our team was also enjoying a lot there.....i would say just wow..wow...wow...n wow..such  a beautiful garden..water fall from deearo se..wo bhi tathhar ki..n lake which was beautiful..restaurant.was amazing for a little while..

title: recreate yourself
review: Very well maintained garden shows lot of variety of flowers.

title: Nice Tourist Spot to visit with children
review: A Nice tourist spot with Beautiful varieties of flowers, man made waterfall, fountains & a small lake with boating facilities and small rides for children. It also has food court in its premises. Food taste is average.
