title: Normal
review: It is just like any other garden on the hill. You may stay one hour for light refreshment or enjoy the beautifully decorated plantations there. If you have little time, you may avoid visiting the park.

title: Best avoidable
review: Once the star attraction of Mussoorie as been turned into a total commercial hub. Pay heavy amount for unorganised  parking, entry ticket  and get disappointed. Cheating all around. Ealier it was clean , no ticket, free children rides.Now sabiliy maintained and waste of time. The famous Tibet/chinese  restaurant outside IAS acedemy is also a avoidable as real owner has shifted to USA.

title: Its good place to visit
review: Its a good place to visit and really enjoy the beauty of the garden and small pound where you can enjoy a boat ride with your family.

title: perfect place 2 click
review: a v beautiful garden created by the Britishers.lovely artificial waterfall, blooming nursery, yummy food court and a cute pond for boating purpose.above all a perfect place to click numerous photographs with your co travelers. :)

title: Something different
review: I've visited with friends and we all like this location as its something different from other gardens we've visited, attractive and cool locations..

title: Wheel Caps of our Innova were stolen there
review: Wheel Caps of our Innova were stolen there...We made the owners of the parking lot pay for them after much threats....They took Rs.100 for the parking and that too 200 mtrs. before the actual site...No security there....be cautious

title: Must Visit in Mussoorie
review: While in Mussoorie, it should be in your list to visit places (especially if you have kids with you). Nice Garden with artificial water falls, a small lake with boating facility and a nice restaurant to take care of your taste buds.

title: good place
review: a very nice place to spent time with family..it has got a few rides for the kids, a small lake for boating, quite a sceinc view and a very quite and calm place to be.

title: No company in the Garden
review: Nothing great about this place.If you have time on your side one might visit it for some fresh air.Majority of the rickshaw drivers want to take you there.

title: A treat for kids
review: Its a must visit if u are in Mussoorie with kids , the boat ride, the swings and the flowers make this place wonderful.

title: Poor maintenance
review: There is poor maintenance all over the place. The cycle rickshaw ride to and fro was more enjoyable. I would recommend the cycle rickshaw to a taxi ride.

title: Nothing great
review: Company garden was just like any other garden you will come across in your city. After walking around, we spent time in the restaurant inside the garden. The food was good.

title: Plant-lovers' delight
review: except that there are lot of jokers, posing in front of every random flower. There is a nice collection of flowers, ferns, cacti, and many other plants. There is nearly no name or species information given though.

title: company garden
review: We visited Company Garden on 8 June 2013. It is a big garden.There is a beautiful artificial waterfall that has been made there. For kids, there are some rides. One of the rides preferred by kids is in the shape of a dragon. There are reasonably priced restaurants inside with average to good food. Boating can be enjoyed there as well. This place is easily accessible by mall road. We preferred to go by cycle rickshaw, the rates are Rs 50 per person. The rates are mentioned there at the stands so no problems at all. We took the same rickshaw for the to and fro ride. It was a beautiful ride with the wind on our faces, the valley on one side and the mountains on the other side. On the way you can stop the rickshaw and pick up freshly made roasted corn. On the whole, it is a nice place to visit with kids.

title: A place worth visiting
review: A must for all travelers visiting Mussoorie.  Once can see beautiful landscapes, Devdar trees, Flowers, Cacti grown in green house.  Kids can enjoy fun rides.

title: Fun visit
review: It is nice park with 4 to 5 fun rides. Food in the self help area in the restaurant is economical and good. Staff was helpful. one may visit this if you have time and kids with you.

title: Company Garden was a nice visit
review: About 7 kms from the hotel we stayed and on the way to Kempty falls. Decent place to take your family. The professional photographers were friendly. You could get a 8 X 10 for Rs 60 !

title: Ok... not so great
review: You have less number of spots to visit in Mussoorie... Hence if you have time, you can visit... Food court is maintained very well..  But the food quality is ok.. not so good...  max of 2 hrs you can spend

title: Average
review: It was not so good as i expected it to be, there were good variety flowers ,i spent hardly 25 min i the garden

title: Tourist Taxi's not allowed
review: Take a cycle rickshaw if you plan and hope to see these gardens.

title: well maintained garden
review: It was like any other Garden you see in a hill station. there was no tourist activity that is specifically planned/ provided that could be remembered after our holidays are over.

title: Great Location!
review: The garden itself is average in terms of horticulture. The waterfall looks quite nice. However what makes this place a must visit is the absolutely beautiful view of the mountains around Mussoorie, and if you are lucky, during dusk distant snow capped peaks of the Himalayas may be visible. I saw them, but very faint. The food Court and the small cafes offer great vies from their windows. Graba window seat and enjoy the coffee!

title: Only place to visit in mussoorie after Mall Road
review: Great place to be and as my subject says, its the only good place after mall road. The falls are good for nothing (atleast for me). Visit in evening time or morning time so that its cool. Also dont forget your camera.

title: Well maintained garden
review: The garden is well maintained and there was good variety of flowers. I went with my kids and they did enjoy the boating facility and few rides available there. Nice place, worth a visit.

title: Beautifull collections of herbal plants
review: It is a huge park with a lot of herbal plants,waterfall and i liked the boating in the small pond. There are many restaurants in the park for food lovers...

title: Good fun all the way
review: Despite the fact that within the ambiance of an idyllic nature-town like Mussoorie, this place is slightly urbane, yet, especially if you have kids with you, this is the most fun place you can find so high up in the hills, paddle boats, mock rodeo ride, what not!

title: One of the few spots in the town itself so where else to go!
review: 1.Garden though small, is well-kept. Soothing hues of flowers welcome you.

title: Over Hyped....
review: About 3 Kms from Mussoorie & Ricksaws takes around 30 minutes (50-60 Rs one way).

title: Beautiful Garden
review: Beautiful Garden with so many flowers and boating in a small artificial pond. few rides for tourists. and one restaurant over there. Overall good experience.

title: Dont go in Winters
review: No flowers as expected during winter season. Dont waste time going here that time. Otherwise heard it's really nice . The property as a whole was big and seemed organized.

title: Full of Flowers
review: Ohh you have to walk long long way to reach there (almost 2kms) or hire cycle rikshaw who will charge you heavily. In a way these rikshw owners earn bread in peak season only and they really work hard for it. The garden is treat of flowers & colors. You can also have children's rides and boating there. There are good restaurants there in park to eat.

title: maintained nicely
review: The Company Garden of Mussoorie is a good tourist attraction where you can spend your afternoon or evening by just coming here and listen to the chirping of birds, have some snacks at the big food court, take beautiful pictures of hills and trees or by doing some boating at the small lake. Children will not get bored here as there are many rides for entertainment of children. There's a small artificial waterfall which is the main attraction in the garden, you can take many good pictures there. Overall it is a very good place.

title: Ok
review: There was a Bollywood movie shooting going on  the day we visited and they occupied half the park. The garden was ok nothing spectacular!

title: Flowers & Gardens all the way
review: Good place to chill in the not so heavy season - during season time this place becomes more of a carnival - loads of fast food - water bodies - well kept gardens !!

title: Waste of time
review: This place is a total waste of time. There is absolutely nothing in Company Garden, not even Flowers to compensate the bad experience. Rather the parking fee of 50 bucks will add to the irritation. Do not go to this place.

title: Awesome place to hangout
review: After the disappointing tour to Kempty Falls, we went to COmpany Garden. And we were happily surprised to see the arrangements there. It was a lovely place to hangout.

title: A very Small Amusement Park
review: Very small amusement Park. The view is also compromised because of the huge fixtures installed. Houses a decent Food Park too.

title: Useless waste of space for travellers & tourists
review: Everybody is going to recommend this place. Bunch of sad rides and wilting plants and noisy local couples apart, nothing much to see or do. Oh, and one filthy pond in which you can paddle boat.

title: Company Bagh
review: The parking rates are very high.Anyhow a good place for children.The eatery is quite cheap.You can get all type of food over there.

title: A Good Maintaind Garden
review: Its a Man Made Garden .........with some of activity to do for attraction and actually commercialization ..........you will have the option for boating some small activities for   kids..... restaurants etc..

title: A jaded garden
review: Rather disappointing. Spoilt by garish children's playground equipment and buildings which are not in line with the gardens.

title: Nice place to hang out.
review: It is a beautiful garden. You will easily get rickshaw from mall road to the garden. I enjoyed this ride except for bad road in patches. The garden is man made. You have shops, lake, small eateries. Overall worth going.

title: Just don't go to toilet
review: How could they charge money for using such a dirty toilet, there was no water, no light, it was too small hardly 3'x3'. Plz gimme a forgetting pill to forget that place.

title: garden & jhula.
review: it was a nice place to hangout a famous company garden you can do lts here boating,local dress photos,jhula a wheel good restaurants friendly peoples,

title: Great place to spend time
review: We went to this place after having our breakfast and decided to spend a max. of 01 hour and then move forward to Kempty Falls but once we reached there we met a couple who strictly advised us not to waste our time going to Kempty as it has lost it's glory.

title: fine place
review: Can go if u r a first time visitor to mussorie, nothing so scenic to see and in fact its far from city need a fair amount of time if u go by walking

title: What is the point of a garden?
review: Gardens are to enjoy nature and quiet contemplation, but imagine the experience one would have if they were being constantly buggered about if you'd like to have a photo clicked, or the noise of people screaming while enjoying various rides in the vicinity of the garden (Didn't get the concept of the 2 things being combined in any case!).

title: Good Attraction
review: The water fall in this sight seeing point is worth capturing on your cameras. The food joint is massive and I feel the lower floor could be utilized to provide a recreation attraction like maybe a skating rink. The garden is well kept.

title: Place worth visiting specially in spring.
review: Though it is little away from the main town but the maintenance is good. The restaurant serves good food. The waterfall is worth seeing. Lot of variety of plants and flowers.

title: Pleasant place to amble.
review: About a 3km walk from Mussoorie town centre, this is a pleasant enough place. Boat rides for kids, costume hawkers and a decent waterfall.

title: Small nice garden
review: Garden is small one but with loads of flowers and plants, nice change if you are from metros or big cities. You can spend about an hour or so in this garden. Best option is to walk from the mall road to this place.

title: nothing great
review: we reached there after a long rickshaw ride. A very small garden, beautiful though but maybe i expected more. the view is very good.

title: A place of beauty!
review: People place with colorful flowers, artificial lake for boating , a tiny falls  where one can click snaps.

title: company garden dissapointment
review: As it was rainy season there were no flowers and the boating facility was pathetic not what was expected

title: Average
review: It is a nice place but nothing unique about it. I mean if you come from places where there are such gardens you can give it a miss. It is okay if you want to click some pics with flowers.

title: The Garden has improved..Sad Food Court and Parking
review: This place has improved, nice gardens, well kept, a waterfall now and good scenery with good amusement facilities for small childrn. Can easily spend 2-3 hours here.

title: Nothing special. just a garden
review: Nothing special. just a garden.Nothing special. just a garden.Nothing special. just a garden.Nothing special. just a garden

title: Take a rickshaw upto the garden ... enjoy the views
review: The garden is nothing out of the ordinary ... well maintained though, has a small lake where boating takes place. Most of the rides inside are for children and are out of order.

title: Avoid it.
review: If you've not seen something green or a puddle, then go there

title: Good for family with kids
review: This garden consists of flowers of many varieties, a really small pond (named LAKE) with costly boating facility and some good fast food eating options including newly opened big food court (serve variety of good quality food). You can also enjoy your photo clicking by professional with Garhwali dresses.

title: Good place to visit
review: Staying at a hotel on the Mall road? You can take a rickshaw ride to Company Garden. There is a good collection of hill trees with awesome flowering. Neat grass lawns, a small lake where you can do some boating. Do spend some time there with family.

title: Good Place for Childerens
review: If you are visiting mussorrie with children then this place is must visit as it is having a lot of rides for children including boating.

title: Horrible & exploited
review: A beautiful garden has been reduced to worst kind of diwali mela with photographers & hawkers chasing you all the time. The grass and pond is now trash bin of plastic & empty chips packets, loud music and traffic jams

title: Place to play around
review: This place is more like a play ground in nature's palm. One thing you can prefer to reach here is hand pulley from Mussoorie chowk and you could really feel the most memorable just in a romeo and juliet way. Once you reach there, after bypassing few photographers chasing you to get yourself clicked, you will enter the arena of green garden with beautiful flowers if it is right season for them to gloom. I noticed my daughter was on seventh cloud at this place. It has lot more to play around for her. Boating is another attraction here but I din't liked it much, may be its kinda kiddish to me, but your kids will love it (costs approx  50 for 10-15 minutes per head). Then you enjoy some manual rides their like marry-go-round. to-fro-ship etc, shooting with air pistols, bull ride. Inside Company garden their is a small covered area with variety of flowers and you can learn about their scientific names (not my choice). And nonetheless for foodies , you can have plenty of vendors to serve you any kind of food (my fav is to have omlette at any colder place).  Don't forget to click your family photograph or loved ones in various suites posing king, queen, dacoit, local attire and many more. It will remind you of the place indeed. Happy journey.

title: Bestest Place with Natural Beauty surrounded by flower bed   all around.
review: Everything excellent and well managed by the Management.Food court is added beauty.rides and Boating added to awesome cliks.the rates of all items were very geniune and affordable.worth visiting place for about4 hrs with proper parking and eatables.

title: Flowers...
review: We went there by a rickshaw and took a walk while returning. It was 5 km from our hotel. It is a nice place, a garden as it says with a nursery.... too many flowers, roses of different kinds.. flowering and non-flowering plants. There is boating for family crowd... two restaurants also. The best part was the return walk... There were benches on the road, for taking a break. We felt we were visting some old British town..Enjoyed every bit... :)

title: Nice garden at hill station
review: This is nice garden on road coming back from Kempty fall. However it is better to come from Gandhi chowk from mall road as there are rickshaws available to come here. We had to walk long distance of around 1.5 km when taxi dropped us on main road. It is very inconvenient but nice beauty around.

title: Great place to unwind
review: A neat and decent place with many rides for kids to enjoy. the cafe inside the garden is very well managed with good choice of food. the food is quite reasonably priced and the quality is fine.

title: One Time Visit
review: This place is ok for one time visit...I am not sure why this place is listed as tourist attraction... It is like any other garden/park... There is nothing great about this park... Kids can enjoy the ride, but thats it... One can skip this place if running short of time....

title: Was ok, atleast what's left of it
review: The myriad colored flowers on display at the company garden were a sight to watch. The bright sun made each flower blossom even more. However, all the haggling from the photowala's and the restaurant vendors were a big downer. The aquarium on the premises was another disappointment as half the enclosures were empty.

title: Very nice place
review: Its a must visit place once you are in Mussorie, one needs approx 2-3 hours to enjoy this place, it has fountains, rides, food court, water fall.. etc etc..

title: can't leave without getting your pic clicked
review: The place is nice but you cannot enjoy it because of the perpetually irritating hawkers, who won't leave you a for a second in peace. I think the authorities need to do something about them

title: flower vally
review: realy nice place ..i like it........................

title: A Calm and beautiful Garden to Relax And Unwind
review: the garden is well maintained,clean and great place to just unwind and enjoy mother nature.

title: relax every bit
review: The garden had great flowers and it was a good place to relax. The food court was good and the service was much better than most other places in the mall road. There are some places for kids to enjoy such as the rides and boating.

title: Very Average
review: Used to be a much better park. Not so well maintained anymore, has a artificial water body for boating - the water is a theme park for diseases. One artificial water fall for clicking pics, a small nursery and that's that. Could be a much better place with a little effort from local administration.

title: Good if visiting with kids
review: Nothing great but kids may enjoy as it has swings and boating etc. My son had a good time here so good for me.

title: Useless place
review: Nothing to see, badly maintained place. My house garden is better. Drove down around 4Kms to the stink of company garden. Barren grass, useless boat ride of 30 feet by 30 feet pond with dirty water. Would never want to visit again on any other trip here.

title: Nature at its best
review: The Company Garden is a real treat to visit on a nice sunny afternoon. The varieties of plants and flowers on display is vast to say the least. The children have a nice time on the toy trains and other rides and there is a little lake with paddle boats. The food was palatable also. Overall a nice place to visit with your family especially if there are little children with you

title: Doesnt deserve the hype
review: We went to mussorie for our summer holidays . From the time we landed in the place we were pestered about going to company garden. We did not want to travel by a ricksaw as it would be un ethical to see some one physically pull you , up the hill.so we decided to walk from our room .

title: Great place for kids
review: Amazing place, well maintainted, beautiful flowers

title: Nice Garden
review: Done a Boating, roam around, nice falls, etc nice food

title: timepass
review: since i have travelled to many wonderful places, this place seems to be too average for me. for people who have never been out, this may trly seem like a heaven. nice view of the hills and valleys, well maintained park with hot tea and pakoras to catch on. with family you can spend a couple of hours relaxing here.

title: A very British garden
review: Ample parking space, lots & lots of flowers of all hues. The in garden restaurant is reasonably priced but the food is just so so.

title: An okayish place
review: Nothing great, it's just one more place for tourists to tick off from their list. The garden seemed more like an open food plaza with so many food stalls/restaurants dotting that place.

title: Good to be here once.  Though it is not as lush green as it used to be.
review: What I disliked was the Photographers running after you to dress up and get photographed.  This was quite irritating.

title: Just a Normal Park with Show-Off Water-fall, only for a photographers
review: -COMPLETELY WASTE of MONEY.

title: Nature at it best
review: Mussoorie with its green hills & varied flora & fauna, is a fascinating hill resort and a fabulous honeymoon spot. Mussoorie is one of the best place to visit in Uttarakhand. Here weather can change at any time. You have to always be with your umbrella. The best part of mussoorie is the beauty of the place.

title: Just a Garden, Normal
review: Nothing great about this garden. Its normal garden like others. You will lose nothing if you are not able to visit this place. Nothing great about this garden. Its normal garden like others. You will lose nothing if you are not able to visit this place.

title: Great place to relax and watch the world go by.
review: Catch a bicycle rickshaw (approx 150 rs) to the company gardens and relax!   Nice plants, fountains and a lake with some good places to get food and drink and watch the world go by.  Lovely chilled atmosphere, nice view of the hills from the food court.

title: much hype bt needs an overhauling
review: You need to be ready for this artificial garden. earlier it was a natural place bt now looks more like an artificial municipality park.

title: For Flower lovers
review: The Gardens are well maintained, but do not choose to go by a Rikshaw. That is too costly and time taking. You may be told that taxis are not allowed but Taxis actually go there

title: soothing to the eyes
review: enjoyed boating there and also the landscaped manicured gardens. Access road was in bad condition.

title: Not maintained well
review: The Garden is not well maintained and there is nothing much that you can expect from here. There are a couple of entertainment options for the kids but they are hardly functional.

title: Must visit!
review: Lovely place to stroll about in the sun and grab a bite. Though we drove there, do take the cycle rickshaw, especially if you are with your partner. It's a charming ride with a cool breeze blowing through the pine trees that line the road there.

title: OverRated
review: This is one of the places in mussoorie which is really over rated. Ask anyone in mussoorie about places to visit , and Company Garden would be the first thing on their mouth after Kempty. This place is not maintained well. I being from mussoorie have seen various phases in its development and even today its not as good as it should be. IT does boast a boat ride but thats not worth the pain of travelling 5 kms from the city...  But yes if you are free and have no place to visit, you can take a walk to Company garden ..

title: No more an attraction!
review: The garden could have been beautiful once. But the commercialisation has almost ruined it.
